The current time is 2025-12-28 09:50:31.\nYour team member:\nMike: Team Leader, Manage a team to assist users\nAlice: Product Manager, Create a Product Requirement Document or market research/competitive product research.\nBob: Architect, design a concise, usable, complete software system. output the system design.\nAlex: Engineer, Take on game, app, web development and deployment.\nDavid: DataAnalyst, Take on any data-related tasks, such as data analysis, machine learning, deep learning, web browsing, web scraping, web searching, terminal operation, document QA & analysis, etc.\n\n\nYour role is to determine the appropriate response category for the given request.\n\n# Response Categories\n## QUICK: \nFor straightforward questions or requests that can be answered directly. This includes common-sense inquiries, legal or logical questions, basic math, short coding tasks, multiple-choice questions, greetings, casual chat, daily planning, and inquiries about you or your team.\n\n## SEARCH\nFor queries that require retrieving up-to-date or detailed information. This includes time-sensitive or location-specific questions like current events or weather. Use this only if the information isn\'t readily available.\nIf a file or link is provided, you don\'t need to search for additional information.\n\n## TASK\nFor requests that involve tool utilizations, computer operations, multiple steps or detailed instructions. Examples include software development, project planning, or any task that requires tool usage.\n\n## AMBIGUOUS\nFor requests that are unclear, lack sufficient detail, or are outside the system\'s capabilities. Common characteristics of AMBIGUOUS requests:\n\n- Incomplete Information: Requests that imply complex tasks but lack critical details  (e.g., "Redesign this logo" without specifying design requirements).\n- Vagueness: Broad, unspecified, or unclear requests that make it difficult to provide a precise answer. \n- Unrealistic Scope: Overly broad requests that are impossible to address meaningfully in a single response (e.g., "Tell me everything about...").\n- Missing files: Requests that refer to specific documents, images, or data without providing them for reference. (when providing a file, website, or data, either the content, link, or path **must** be included)\n\n**Note:** Before categorizing a request as TASK:\n1. Consider whether the user has provided sufficient information to proceed with the task. If the request is complex but lacks essential details or the mentioned files\' content or path, it should fall under AMBIGUOUS.\n2. If the request is a "how-to" question that asks for a general plan, approach or strategy, it should be categorized as QUICK.\n\n\n# Example\n\n1. Request: "How do I design an online document editing platform that supports real-time collaboration?"\nThought: This is a direct query about platform design, answerable without additional resources. \nResponse Category: QUICK.\n\n2. Request: "What\'s the difference between supervised and unsupervised learning in machine learning?"\nThought: This is a general knowledge question that can be answered concisely. \nResponse Category: QUICK.\n\n3. Request: "Please help me write a learning plan for Python web crawlers"\nThought: Writing a learning plan is a daily planning task that can be answered directly.\nResponse Category: QUICK.\n\n4. Request: "Can you help me find the latest research papers on deep learning?"\nThought: The user needs current research, requiring a search for the most recent sources. \nResponse Category: SEARCH.\n\n5. Request: "Build a personal website that runs the Game of Life simulation."\nThought: This is a detailed software development task that requires multiple steps. \nResponse Category: TASK.\n\n6. Request: "Summarize this document for me."\nThought: The request mentions summarizing a document but doesn\'t provide the path or content of the document, making it impossible to fulfill. \nResponse Category: AMBIGUOUS.\n\n7. Request: "Summarize this document for me \'/data/path/docmument.pdf\'." \nThought: The request mentions summarizing a document and has provided the path to the document. It can be done by reading the document using a tool then summarizing it.\nResponse Category: TASK.\n\n8. Request: "Optimize this process." \nThought: The request is vague and lacks specifics, requiring clarification on the process to optimize.\nResponse Category: AMBIGUOUS.\n\n9. Request: "Change the color of the text to blue in styles.css, add a new button in web page, delete the old background image."\nThought: The request is an incremental development task that requires modifying one or more files.\nResponse Category: TASK.\n\n'}, {'role': 'user', 'content': '[Message] from User to Mike: \n\nBased on the following use case, write a complete program in Java. DONT omit any necessary info such as path, link, environment, programming language, framework, requirement, constraint from original content to team members because you are their sole info source.\nPay close attention to new user message, review the conversation history, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to respond to the user directly, DON\'T ask your team members.\nPay close attention to messages from team members. If a team member has finished a task, do not ask them to repeat it; instead, mark the current task as completed.\nNote:\n1. If the requirement is a pure DATA-RELATED requirement, such as web browsing, web scraping, web searching, web imitation, data science, data analysis, machine learning, deep learning, text-to-image etc. DON\'T decompose it, assign a single task with the original user requirement as instruction directly to Data Analyst.\n2. If the requirement is developing a software, game, app, or website, excluding the above data-related tasks, you should decompose the requirement into multiple tasks and assign them to different team members based on their expertise. The standard software development process has four steps: creating a Product Requirement Document (PRD) by the Product Manager -> writing a System Design by the Architect -> creating tasks by the Project Manager -> and coding by the Engineer. You may choose to execute any of these steps. When publishing message to Product Manager, you should directly copy the full original user requirement.\n2.1. If the requirement contains both DATA-RELATED part mentioned in 1 and software development part mentioned in 2, you should decompose the software development part and assign them to different team members based on their expertise, and assign the DATA-RELATED part to Data Analyst David directly.\n2.2. For software development requirement, estimate the complexity of the requirement before assignment, following the common industry practice of t-shirt sizing:\n - XS: snake game, static personal homepage, basic calculator app\n - S: Basic photo gallery, basic file upload system, basic feedback form\n - M: Offline menu ordering system, news aggregator app\n - L: Online booking system, inventory management system\n - XL: Social media platform, e-commerce app, real-time multiplayer game\n - For XS and S requirements, you don\'t need the standard software development process, you may directly ask Engineer to write the code. Otherwise, estimate if any part of the standard software development process may contribute to a better final code. If so, assign team members accordingly.\n3.1 If the task involves code review (CR) or code checking, you should assign it to Engineer.\n4. If the requirement is a common-sense, logical, or math problem, you should respond directly without assigning any task to team members.\n5. If you think the requirement is not clear or ambiguous, you should ask the user for clarification immediately. Assign tasks only after all info is clear.\n6. It is helpful for Engineer to have both the system design and the project schedule for writing the code, so include paths of both files (if available) and remind Engineer to definitely read them when publishing message to Engineer.\n7. If the requirement is writing a TRD and software framework, you should assign it to Architect. When publishing message to Architect, you should directly copy the full original user requirement.\n8. If the receiver message reads \'from {team member} to {\'<all>\'}, it indicates that someone has completed the current task. Note this in your thoughts.\n9. Do not use the \'end\' command when the current task remains unfinished; instead, use the \'finish_current_task\' command to indicate completion before switching to the next task.\n10. Do not use escape characters in json data, particularly within file paths.\n11. Analyze the capabilities of team members and assign tasks to them based on user Requirements. If the requirements ask to ignore certain tasks, follow the requirements.\n12. If the the user message is a question, use \'reply to human\' to respond to the question, and then end.\n13. Instructions and reply must be in the same language.\n14. Default technology stack is Vite, React, MUI, Tailwind CSS. Web app is the default option when developing software. If use these technology stacks, ask the engineer to delopy the web app after project completion.\n15. You are the only one who decides the programming language for the software, so the instruction must contain the programming language.\n16. Data collection and web/software development are two separate tasks. You must assign these tasks to data analysts and engineers, respectively. ```json
[
    {
        "command_name": "Editor.write",
        "args": {
            "path": "/home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/tourist-account-system/docs/system_design.md",
            "content": "## Implementation approach\n\n我们将采用分层架构设计，使用Java Spring Boot框架构建一个RESTful API服务，处理旅游账户数据修改功能。系统将包含以下技术栈：\n\n1. **Spring Boot 3.x** - 主流Java后端框架，提供快速开发能力\n2. **Spring Data JPA** - 数据持久化层，与数据库交互\n3. **Hibernate Validator** - 数据验证框架，确保输入数据的有效性\n4. **Lombok** - 减少样板代码，提高代码可读性\n5. **SLF4J + Logback** - 日志记录，便于调试和监控\n6. **Spring Security** - 安全认证，确保只有登录的旅行社操作员可以访问\n7. **Connection Pool (HikariCP)** - 数据库连接池，提高性能\n8. **Java 17+** - LTS版本，提供现代语言特性\n\n关键设计决策：\n- 使用DTO模式分离API层和业务层数据\n- 实现乐观锁机制防止并发修改冲突\n- 添加连接中断重试机制处理与ETOUR服务器的通信问题\n- 设计可扩展的验证框架，支持字段级验证规则\n- 实现审计功能，记录所有账户修改操作\n\n## File list\n\n以下是项目的主要文件结构：\n\n```\ntourist-account-system/\n├── pom.xml\n├── src/main/java/com/etour/\n│   ├── TouristAccountSystemApplication.java\n│   ├── config/\n│   │   ├── SecurityConfig.java\n│   │   ├── AuditConfig.java\n│   │   └── ETOURConnectionConfig.java\n│   ├── dto/\n│   │   ├── TouristDTO.java\n│   │   ├── TouristUpdateRequest.java\n│   │   ├── TouristResponse.java\n│   │   └── ValidationErrorDTO.java\n│   ├── entity/\n│   │   ├── Tourist.java\n│   │   ├── AgencyOperator.java\n│   │   ├── AuditLog.java\n│   │   └── Address.java\n│   ├── repository/\n│   │   ├── ValidationService.java\n│   │   ├── ValidationServiceImpl.java\n│   │   ├── AuditService.java\n│   │   └── ETOURConnectionService.java\n│   ├── controller/\n│   │   ├── TouristController.java\n│   │   ├── ErrorController.java\n│   │   └── AgencyController.java\n│   ├── validation/\n│   │   ├── TouristValidator.java\n│   │   ├── EmailValidator.java\n│   │   ├── PhoneValidator.java\n│   │   └── PasswordValidator.java\n│   ├── exception/\n│   │   ├── GlobalExceptionHandler.java\n│   │   ├── ETourConnectionException.java\n│   │   ├── TouristNotFoundException.java\n│   │   ├── src/main/resources/\n│   ├── application.yml\n│   ├── application-dev.yml\n│   ├── application-prod.yml\n│   └── logback-spring.xml\n└── src/test/java/com/etour/\n    ├── controller/TouristControllerTest.java\n    ├── service/TouristServiceTest.java\n    └── validation/TouristValidatorTest.java\n```\n\n## Data structures and interfaces\n\n```mermaid\nclassDiagram\n    %% 实体类\n    class Tourist {\n        +Long id\n        +String firstName\n        +String lastName\n        +String email\n        +String phoneNumber\n        +LocalDate dateOfBirth\n        +Address address\n        +String nationality\n        +String passportNumber\n        +LocalDateTime createdAt\n        +LocalDateTime updatedAt\n        +Integer version\n        +Boolean active\n        +getFullName() String\n        +updateFrom(TouristUpdateRequest request) void\n        +validate() boolean\n    }\n    \n    class Address {\n        +String street\n        +String city\n        +String state\n        +String postalCode\n        +String country\n        +getFullAddress() String\n    }\n    \n    class AgencyOperator {\n        +Long id\n        +String username\n        +String agencyName\n        +String email\n        +String phone\n        +Boolean loggedIn\n        +Boolean isActive() boolean\n        +login() void\n        +logout() void\n    }\n    \n    class AuditLog {\n        +Long id\n        +String actionType\n        +String entityType\n        +Long entityId\n        +String oldValue\n        +String newValue\n        +String operatorId\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\n        +String ipAddress\n        +createLog(String action, Object entity, Object oldValue, Object newValue, String operatorId) AuditLog\n    }\n    \n    %% DTO类\n    class TouristDTO {\n        +Long id\n        +String fullName\n        +String email\n        +String phoneNumber\n        +String nationality\n        +String passportNumber\n        +LocalDate dateOfBirth\n        +String address\n        +Boolean active\n        +static fromEntity(Tourist tourist) TouristDTO\n    }\n    \n    class TouristUpdateRequest {\n        +String firstName\n        +String lastName\n        +String email\n        +String phoneNumber\n        +LocalDate dateOfBirth\n        +Address address\n        +String nationality\n        +String passportNumber\n        +validate() void\n    }\n    \n    class TouristResponse {\n        +Boolean success\n        +String message\n        +TouristDTO data\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\n        +static success(TouristDTO data) TouristResponse\n        +static error(String message) TouristResponse\n    }\n    \n    %% 服务接口\n    interface TouristService {\n        +List~TouristDTO~ searchTourists(String searchTerm) List~TouristDTO~\n        +TouristDTO getTouristById(Long id) TouristDTO\n        +TouristResponse updateTourist(Long id, TouristUpdateRequest request, String operatorId) TouristResponse\n        +TouristResponse confirmUpdate(Long touristId, Long auditLogId, String operatorId) TouristResponse\n        +Boolean deleteTourist(Long id, String operatorId) boolean\n    }\n    \n    class TouristServiceImpl {\n        -TouristRepository touristRepository\n        -ValidationService validationService\n        -AuditService auditService\n        -ETOURConnectionService etourConnectionService\n        +searchTourists(String searchTerm) List~TouristDTO~\n        +getTouristById(Long id) TouristDTO\n        +updateTourist(Long id, TouristUpdateRequest request, String operatorId) TouristResponse\n        +confirmUpdate(Long touristId, Long auditLogId, String operatorId) TouristResponse\n        +deleteTourist(Long id, String operatorId) boolean\n    }\n    \n    interface ValidationService {\n        +ValidationResult validateTouristData(TouristUpdateRequest request) ValidationResult\n        +Boolean isEmailValid(String email) boolean\n        +Boolean isPhoneValid(String phone) boolean\n        +Boolean isPassportValid(String passport) boolean\n    }\n    \n    class ValidationServiceImpl {\n        -TouristValidator touristValidator\n        -EmailValidator emailValidator\n        -PhoneValidator phoneValidator\n        -PasswordValidator passwordValidator\n        +validateTouristData(TouristUpdateRequest request) ValidationResult\n        +isEmailValid(String email) boolean\n        +isPhoneValid(String phone) boolean\n        +isPassportValid(String passport) boolean\n    }\n    \n    interface ETOURConnectionService {\n        +Boolean connectToETOUR() boolean\n        +Boolean isConnectionAlive() boolean\n        +sendDataToETOUR(Object data) boolean\n        +retryConnection(Integer maxRetries) boolean\n    }\n    \n    %% 仓库接口\n    interface TouristRepository {\n        +List~Tourist~ findBySearchTerm(String searchTerm) List~Tourist~\n        +Optional~Tourist~ findById(Long id) Optional~Tourist~\n        +Tourist save(Tourist tourist) Tourist\n        +void deleteById(Long id) void\n        +Long countActiveTourists() Long\n    }\n    \n    interface AgencyRepository {\n        +Optional~AgencyOperator~ findById(Long id) Optional~AgencyOperator~\n        +Optional~AgencyOperator~ findByUsername(String username) Optional~AgencyOperator~\n        +AgencyOperator save(AgencyOperator operator) AgencyOperator\n        +Boolean isLoggedIn(Long operatorId) boolean\n    }\n    \n    %% 控制器\n    class TouristController {\n        -TouristService touristService\n        +ResponseEntity~List~TouristDTO~~ searchTourists(@RequestParam String searchTerm) ResponseEntity~List~TouristDTO~~\n        +ResponseEntity~TouristDTO~ getTourist(@PathVariable Long id) ResponseEntity~TouristDTO~\n        +ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~ updateTourist(@PathVariable Long id, @Valid @RequestBody TouristUpdateRequest request, @RequestHeader String operatorId) ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~\n        +ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~ confirmUpdate(@PathVariable Long touristId, @PathVariable Long auditLogId, @RequestHeader String operatorId) ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~\n    }\n    \n    class ErrorController {\n        +ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~ handleValidationException(ValidationException ex) ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\n        +ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~ handleTouristNotFoundException(TouristNotFoundException ex) ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\n        +ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~ handleETourConnectionException(ETourConnectionException ex) ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\n    }\n    \n    %% 验证器\n    class TouristValidator {\n        -ValidationService validationService\n        +ValidationResult validate(TouristUpdateRequest request) ValidationResult\n        +Boolean validateRequiredFields(TouristUpdateRequest request) boolean\n        +Boolean validateBusinessRules(TouristUpdateRequest request) boolean\n    }\n    \n    class ValidationResult {\n        +Boolean isValid\n        +List~String~ errors\n        +Boolean hasErrors() boolean\n        +void addError(String error) void\n        +String getErrorMessage() String\n    }\n    \n    %% 异常类\n    class ETourConnectionException {\n        +String connectionUrl\n        +Integer statusCode\n        +String errorMessage\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\n        +getConnectionStatus() String\n    }\n    \n    class TouristNotFoundException {\n        +Long touristId\n        +String searchCriteria\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\n    }\n    \n    class ValidationException {\n        +List~String~ validationErrors\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\n        +String fieldName\n    }\n    \n    %% 配置类\n    class ETOURConnectionConfig {\n        +String serverUrl\n        +Integer timeoutSeconds\n        +Integer maxRetries\n        +Integer retryDelayMillis\n        +String apiKey\n        +Boolean isProduction\n    }\n    \n    %% 关系\n    Tourist \"1\" -- \"1\" Address\n    TouristServiceImpl --> TouristRepository\n    TouristServiceImpl --> ValidationService\n    TouristServiceImpl --> AuditService\n    TouristServiceImpl --> ETOURConnectionService\n    TouristController --> TouristService\n    ValidationServiceImpl --> TouristValidator\n    ValidationServiceImpl --> EmailValidator\n    TouristValidator --> ValidationService\n    Tourist \"1\" -- \"*\" AuditLog : has\n    AgencyOperator \"1\" -- \"*\" AuditLog : performed by\n    TouristUpdateRequest ..> Tourist : converts to\n    TouristDTO <.. Tourist : converts from\n```\n\n## Program call flow\n\n```mermaid\nsequenceDiagram\n    participant FE as Frontend/Angular UI\n    participant TC as TouristController\n    participant TS as TouristServiceImpl\n    participant VS as ValidationServiceImpl\n    participant TV as TouristValidator\n    participant EV as EmailValidator\n    participant REPO as TouristRepository\n    participant AUDIT as AuditService\n    participant ECON as ETOURConnectionService\n    participant DTO as TouristDTO\n    participant EX as ExceptionHandler\n    \n    %% 步骤1：从SearchTourist结果中选择游客\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤1：旅行社操作员从列表选择游客\n    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists?searchTerm=\"...\"\n    TC->>TS: searchTourists(searchTerm)\n    TS->>REPO: findBySearchTerm(searchTerm)\n    REPO-->>TS: List~Tourist~\n    TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\n    DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\n    TS-->>TC: List~TouristDTO~\n    TC-->>FE: JSON响应（游客列表）\n    \n    %% 步骤2：加载选中游客数据并显示在可编辑表单\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤2：加载选中游客数据\n    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists/{id}\n    TC->>TS: getTouristById(id)\n    TS->>REPO: findById(id)\n    alt 游客存在\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\n        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\n        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\n        TS-->>TC: TouristDTO\n        TC-->>FE: 游客详细信息\n    else 游客不存在\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional.empty()\n        TS-->>EX: throw TouristNotFoundException\n        EX-->>FE: 404错误响应\n    end\n    \n    %% 步骤3：编辑表单字段并提交\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤3：编辑并提交修改\n    FE->>TC: PUT /api/tourists/{id}\n    TC->>TS: updateTourist(id, request, operatorId)\n    \n    %% 步骤4：验证信息（如果不完整则触发Errored用例）\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤4：验证信息\n    TS->>VS: validateTouristData(request)\n    VS->>TV: validate(request)\n    TV->>VS: ValidationResult\n    VS->>EV: isEmailValid(request.email)\n    EV-->>VS: boolean\n    \n    alt 验证失败\n        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (invalid)\n        TS-->>EX: throw ValidationException\n        EX-->>FE: 400验证错误响应\n        Note over FE,EX: 激活Errored用例\n        FE->>TC: 显示错误信息并要求重新输入\n    else 验证成功\n        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (valid)\n        \n        %% 检查ETOUR连接\n        TS->>ECON: connectToETOUR()\n        alt 连接中断\n            ECON-->>TS: false (connection failed)\n            TS->>ECON: retryConnection(3)\n            alt 重试成功\n                ECON-->>TS: true\n            else 重试失败\n                ECON-->>TS: false\n                TS-->>EX: throw ETourConnectionException\n                EX-->>FE: 503服务不可用\n                Note over FE,EX: 中断连接处理\n                break\n            end\n        else 连接正常\n            ECON-->>TS: true\n        end\n        \n        %% 数据验证和审计记录\n        TS->>REPO: findById(id)\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\n        TS->>AUDIT: createPreUpdateAuditLog(tourist, operatorId)\n        AUDIT-->>TS: AuditLog\n        \n        %% 更新游客数据\n        TS->>TS: tourist.updateFrom(request)\n        TS->>REPO: save(tourist)\n        REPO-->>TS: 更新的Tourist\n        \n        %% 步骤5：确认操作\n        Note over FE,EX: 步骤5：请求操作确认\n        TS->>TC: TouristResponse (needs confirmation, auditLogId)\n        TC-->>FE: 响应（需要确认，包含auditLogId）\n        \n        %% 用户确认操作\n        FE->>TC: POST /api/tourists/{id}/confirm/{auditLogId}\n        TC->>TS: confirmUpdate(touristId, auditLogId, operatorId)\n        \n        %% 步骤6：存储修改后的数据\n        Note over FE,EX: 步骤6：存储修改的数据\n        TS->>AUDIT: confirmAuditLog(auditLogId)\n        TS->>ECON: sendDataToETOUR(updatedTourist)\n        ECON-->>TS: boolean (success)\n        \n        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(updatedTourist)\n        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\n        TS->>TC: TouristResponse.success(touristDTO)\n        TC-->>FE: 成功响应（更新后的游客数据）\n        \n        %% 退出条件：系统报告更新信息\n        Note over FE,EX: 退出：系统报告更新后的游客账户信息\n        FE->>FE: 显示成功消息和更新后的账户详情\n    end\n```\n\n## Anything UNCLEAR\n\n1. **ETOUR服务器接口规格**：不清楚ETOUR服务器API的具体格式、认证方式和数据格式要求。需要进一步明确接口规范才能实现完整的集成。\n\n2. **搜索功能依赖**

[
    {
        "command_name": "Editor.write",
        "args": {
            "path": "/home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/tourist-account-system/docs/system_design.md",
            "content": "## Implementation approach\n\n我们将采用分层架构设计，使用Java Spring Boot框架构建一个RESTful API服务，处理旅游账户数据修改功能。系统将包含以下技术栈：\n\n1. **Spring Boot 3.x** - 主流Java后端框架，提供快速开发能力\n2. **Spring Data JPA** - 数据持久化层，与数据库交互\n3. **Hibernate Validator** - 数据验证框架，确保输入数据的有效性\n4. **Lombok** - 减少样板代码，提高代码可读性\n5. **SLF4J + Logback** - 日志记录，便于调试和监控\n6. **Spring Security** - 安全认证，确保只有登录的旅行社操作员可以访问\n7. **Connection Pool (HikariCP)** - 数据库连接池，提高性能\n8. **Java 17+** - LTS版本，提供现代语言特性\n\n关键设计决策：\n- 使用DTO模式分离API层和业务层数据\n- 实现乐观锁机制防止并发修改冲突\n- 添加连接中断重试机制处理与ETOUR服务器的通信问题\n- 设计可扩展的验证框架，支持字段级验证规则\n- 实现审计功能，记录所有账户修改操作\n\n## ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\n        +ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~ handleETourConnectionException(ETourConnectionException ex) ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\n    }\n    \n    %% validateRequiredFields(TouristUpdateRequest request) boolean\n        +Boolean validateBusinessRules(TouristUpdateRequest request) boolean\n    }\n    \n    class ValidationResult {\n        +Boolean isValid\n        +List~String~ errors\n        +Boolean hasErrors() boolean\n        +void addError(String error) void\n        +String getErrorMessage() String\n    }\n    \n    %% 异常类\n    class ETourConnectionException {\n        +String connectionUrl\n        +Integer statusCode\n        +String errorMessage\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\n        +getConnectionStatus() String\n    }\n    \n    class TouristNotFoundException {\n        +Long touristId\n        +String searchCriteria\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\n    }\n    \n    class ValidationException {\n        +List~String~ validationErrors\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\n        +String fieldName\n    }\n    \n    %% 配置类\n    class ETOURConnectionConfig {\n        +String serverUrl\n        +Integer timeoutSeconds\n        +Integer maxRetries\n        +Integer retryDelayMillis\n        +String apiKey\n        +Boolean isProduction\n    }\n    \n    %% 关系\n    Tourist \"1\" -- \"1\" Address\n    TouristServiceImpl --> TouristRepository\n    TouristServiceImpl --> ValidationService\n    TouristServiceImpl --> AuditService\n    TouristServiceImpl --> ETOURConnectionService\n    TouristController --> TouristService\n    ValidationServiceImpl --> TouristValidator\n    ValidationServiceImpl --> EmailValidator\n    TouristValidator --> ValidationService\n    Tourist \"1\" -- \"*\" AuditLog : has\n    AgencyOperator \"1\" -- \"*\" AuditLog : performed by\n    TouristUpdateRequest ..> Tourist : converts to\n    TouristDTO <.. Tourist : converts from\n```\n\n## Program call flow\n\n```mermaid\nsequenceDiagram\n    participant FE as Frontend/Angular UI\n    participant TC as TouristController\n    participant TS as TouristServiceImpl\n    participant VS as ValidationServiceImpl\n    participant TV as TouristValidator\n    participant EV as EmailValidator\n    participant REPO as TouristRepository\n    participant AUDIT as AuditService\n    participant ECON as ETOURConnectionService\n    participant DTO as TouristDTO\n    participant EX as ExceptionHandler\n    \n    %% 步骤1：从SearchTourist结果中选择游客\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤1：旅行社操作员从列表选择游客\n    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists?searchTerm=\"...\"\n    TC->>TS: searchTourists(searchTerm)\n    TS->>REPO: findBySearchTerm(searchTerm)\n    REPO-->>TS: List~Tourist~\n    TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\n    DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\n    TS-->>TC: List~TouristDTO~\n    TC-->>FE: JSON响应（游客列表）\n    \n    %% 步骤2：加载选中游客数据并显示在可编辑表单\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤2：加载选中游客数据\n    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists/{id}\n    TC->>TS: getTouristById(id)\n    TS->>REPO: findById(id)\n    alt 游客存在\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\n        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\n        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\n        TS-->>TC: TouristDTO\n        TC-->>FE: 游客详细信息\n    else 游客不存在\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional.empty()\n        TS-->>EX: throw TouristNotFoundException\n        EX-->>FE: 404错误响应\n    end\n    \n    %% 步骤3：编辑表单字段并提交\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤3：编辑并提交修改\n    FE->>TC: PUT /api/tourists/{id}\n    TC->>TS: updateTourist(id, request, operatorId)\n    \n    %% 步骤4：验证信息（如果不完整则触发Errored用例）\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤4：验证信息\n    TS->>VS: validateTouristData(request)\n    VS->>TV: validate(request)\n    TV->>VS: ValidationResult\n    VS->>EV: isEmailValid(request.email)\n    EV-->>VS: boolean\n    \n    alt 验证失败\n        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (invalid)\n        TS-->>EX: throw ValidationException\n        EX-->>FE: 400验证错误响应\n        Note over FE,EX: 激活Errored用例\n        FE->>TC: 显示错误信息并要求重新输入\n    else 验证成功\n        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (valid)\n        \n        %% 检查ETOUR连接\n        TS->>ECON: connectToETOUR()\n        alt 连接中断\n            ECON-->>TS: false (connection failed)\n            TS->>ECON: retryConnection(3)\n            alt 重试成功\n                ECON-->>TS: true\n            else 重试失败\n                ECON-->>TS: false\n                TS-->>EX: throw ETourConnectionException\n                EX-->>FE: 503服务不可用\n                Note over FE,EX: 中断连接处理\n                break\n            end\n        else 连接正常\n            ECON-->>TS: true\n        end\n        \n        %% 数据验证和审计记录\n        TS->>REPO: findById(id)\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\n        TS->>AUDIT: createPreUpdateAuditLog(tourist, operatorId)\n        AUDIT-->>TS: AuditLog\n        \n        %% 更新游客数据\n        TS->>TS: tourist.updateFrom(request)\n        TS->>REPO: save(tourist)\n        REPO-->>TS: 更新的Tourist\n        \n        %% 步骤5：确认操作\n        Note over FE,EX: 步骤5：请求操作确认\n        TS->>TC: TouristResponse (needs confirmation, auditLogId)\n        TC-->>FE: 响应（需要确认，包含auditLogId）\n        \n        %% 用户确认操作\n        FE->>TC: POST /api/tourists/{id}/confirm/{auditLogId}\n        TC->>TS: confirmUpdate(touristId, auditLogId, operatorId)\n        \n        %% 步骤6：存储修改后的数据\n        Note over FE,EX: 步骤6：存储修改的数据\n        TS->>AUDIT: confirmAuditLog(auditLogId)\n        TS->>ECON: sendDataToETOUR(updatedTourist)\n        ECON-->>TS: boolean (success)\n        \n        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(updatedTourist)\n        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\n        TS->>TC: TouristResponse.success(touristDTO)\n        TC-->>FE: 成功响应（更新后的游客数据）\n        \n        %% 退出条件：系统报告更新信息\n        Note over FE,EX: 退出：系统报告更新后的游客账户信息\n        FE->>FE: 显示成功消息和更新后的账户详情\n    end\n```\n\n## Anything UNCLEAR\n\n1. Implementation approach\\n\\n我们将采用分层架构设计，使用Java Spring Boot框架构建一个RESTful API服务，处理旅游账户数据修改功能。系统将包含以下技术栈：\\n\\n1. **Spring Boot 3.x** - 主流Java后端框架，提供快速开发能力\\n2. **Spring Data JPA** - 数据持久化层，与数据库交互\\n3. **Hibernate Validator** - 数据验证框架，确保输入数据的有效性\\n4. **Lombok** - 减少样板代码，提高代码可读性\\n5. **SLF4J + Logback** - 日志记录，便于调试和监控\\n6. **Spring Security** - 安全认证，确保只有登录的旅行社操作员可以访问\\n7. **Connection Pool (HikariCP)** - 数据库连接池，提高性能\\n8. **Java 17+** - LTS版本，提供现代语言特性\\n\\n关键设计决策：\\n- 使用DTO模式分离API层和业务层数据\\n- 实现乐观锁机制防止并发修改冲突\\n- 添加连接中断重试机制处理与ETOUR服务器的通信问题\\n- 设计可扩展的验证框架，支持字段级验证规则\\n- Data structures and interfaces\\n\\n```mermaid\\nclassDiagram\\n    %% 实体类\\n    class Tourist {\\n        +Long id\\n        +String firstName\\n        +String lastName\\n        +String email\\n        +String phoneNumber\\n        +LocalDate dateOfBirth\\n        +Address address\\n        +String nationality\\n        +String passportNumber\\n        +LocalDateTime createdAt\\n +static fromEntity(Tourist tourist) TouristDTO\\n    }\\n    \\n    class TouristUpdateRequest {\\n        +String firstName\\n        +String lastName\\n        +String email\\n        +String phoneNumber\\n        +LocalDate dateOfBirth\\n        +Address address\\n        +String nationality\\n        +String passportNumber\\n        +validate() void\\n    }\\n    \\n    class  +static error(String message) TouristResponse\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 服务接口\\n    interface TouristService {\\n        +List~TouristDTO~ searchTourists(String searchTerm) List~TouristDTO~\\n \\n    %% 仓库接口\\n    interface TouristRepository {\\n        +List~Tourist~ findBySearchTerm(String searchTerm) List~Tourist~\\n        +Optional~Tourist~ findById(Long id) Optional~Tourist~\\n @RequestHeader String operatorId) ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~\\n        +ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~ confirmUpdate(@PathVariable Long touristId, @PathVariable Long auditLogId, @RequestHeader String operatorId) ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ErrorController {\\n        +ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~ handleValidationException(ValidationException ex) ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\\n        +ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~ handleTouristNotFoundException(TouristNotFoundException ex) ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\\n        +ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~ handleETourConnectionException(ETourConnectionException ex) ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 验证器\\n    class TouristValidator {\\n boolean\\n        +Boolean validateBusinessRules(TouristUpdateRequest request) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ValidationResult {\\n        +Boolean isValid\\n        +List~String~ errors\\n        +Boolean hasErrors() boolean\\n        +void addError(String error) void\\n        +String getErrorMessage() String\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 异常类\\n    class ETourConnectionException {\\n        +String validationErrors\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n        +String fieldName\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 配置类\\n    class ETOURConnectionConfig {\\n        +String serverUrl\\n        +Integer timeoutSeconds\\n        +Integer maxRetries\\n        +Integer retryDelayMillis\\n        +String apiKey\\n        +Boolean isProduction\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 关系\\n    Tourist \\"1\\" -- \\"1\\" Tourist : converts from\\n```\\n\\n## Program call flow\\n\\n```mermaid\\nsequenceDiagram\\n    participant FE as Frontend/Angular UI\\n    participant TC as TouristController\\n    participant TS as TouristServiceImpl\\n    participant VS as ValidationServiceImpl\\n    participant TV as TouristValidator\\n    participant EV as EmailValidator\\n    participant REPO as TouristRepository\\n    participant AUDIT as AuditService\\n    participant ECON as ETOURConnectionService\\n    participant DTO as TouristDTO\\n    participant EX as ExceptionHandler\\n    \\n    %% 步骤1：从SearchTourist结果中选择游客\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤1：旅行社操作员从列表选择游客\\n    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists?searchTerm=\\"...\\"\\n    TC->>TS: searchTourists(searchTerm)\\n    TS->>REPO: findBySearchTerm(searchTerm)\\n    REPO-->>TS: List~Tourist~\\n    TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n    DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n    TS-->>TC: List~TouristDTO~\\n    TC-->>FE: JSON响应（游客列表）\\n    \\n    %% 步骤2：加载选中游客数据并显示在可编辑表单\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤2：加载选中游客数据\\n    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists/{id}\\n    TC->>TS: getTouristById(id)\\n    TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n    alt 游客存在\\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n        TS-->>TC: TouristDTO\\n        TC-->>FE: 游客详细信息\\n    else 游客不存在\\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional.empty()\\n        TS-->>EX: throw TouristNotFoundException\\n        EX-->>FE: 404错误响应\\n    end\\n    \\n    %% 步骤3：编辑表单字段并提交\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤3：编辑并提交修改\\n    FE->>TC: PUT /api/tourists/{id}\\n    TC->>TS: updateTourist(id, request, operatorId)\\n    \\n    %% 步骤4：验证信息（如果不完整则触发Errored用例）\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤4：验证信息\\n    TS->>VS: validateTouristData(request)\\n    VS->>TV: validate(request)\\n    TV->>VS: ValidationResult\\n    VS->>EV: isEmailValid(request.email)\\n    EV-->>VS: boolean\\n    \\n    alt 验证失败\\n        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (invalid)\\n        TS-->>EX: throw ValidationException\\n        EX-->>FE: 400验证错误响应\\n        Note over FE,EX: 激活Errored用例\\n        FE->>TC: 显示错误信息并要求重新输入\\n    else 验证成功\\n        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (valid)\\n        \\n        %% 检查ETOUR连接\\n        TS->>ECON: connectToETOUR()\\n        alt 连接中断\\n            ECON-->>TS: false (connection failed)\\n            TS->>ECON: retryConnection(3)\\n            alt 重试成功\\n                ECON-->>TS: true\\n            else 重试失败\\n                ECON-->>TS: false\\n                TS-->>EX: throw ETourConnectionException\\n                EX-->>FE: 503服务不可用\\n                Note over FE,EX: 中断连接处理\\n                break\\n            end\\n        else 连接正常\\n            ECON-->>TS: true\\n        end\\n        \\n        %% 数据验证和审计记录\\n        TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n        TS->>AUDIT: createPreUpdateAuditLog(tourist, operatorId)\\n        AUDIT-->>TS: AuditLog\\n        \\n        %% 更新游客数据\\n        TS->>TS: tourist.updateFrom(request)\\n        TS->>REPO: save(tourist)\\n        REPO-->>TS: 更新的Tourist\\n        \\n        %% 步骤5：确认操作\\n        Note over FE,EX: 步骤5：请求操作确认\\n        TS->>TC: TouristResponse (needs confirmation, auditLogId)\\n        TC-->>FE: 响应（需要确认，包含auditLogId）\\n        \\n        %% 用户确认操作\\n        FE->>TC: POST /api/tourists/{id}/confirm/{auditLogId}\\n        TC->>TS: confirmUpdate(touristId, auditLogId, operatorId)\\n        \\n        %% 步骤6：存储修改后的数据\\n        Note over FE,EX: 步骤6：存储修改的数据\\n        TS->>AUDIT: confirmAuditLog(auditLogId)\\n        TS->>ECON: sendDataToETOUR(updatedTourist)\\n        ECON-->>TS: boolean (success)\\n        \\n        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(updatedTourist)\\n        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n        TS->>TC: TouristResponse.success(touristDTO)\\n        TC-->>FE: 成功响应（更新后的游客数据）\\n        \\n        %% 退出条件：系统报告更新信息\\n        Note over FE,EX: 退出：系统报告更新后的游客账户信息\\n        FE->>FE: 显示成功消息和更新后的账户详情\\n    end\\n```\\n\\n## Anything UNCLEAR\\n\\n1. **ETOUR服务器接口规格**：不清楚ETOUR服务器API的具体格式、认证方式和数据格式要求。需要进一步明确接口规范才能实现完整的集成。\\n\\n2. **搜索功能依赖**\n\n## json decode error\nExpecting value: line 1 column 1 (char Spring Boot框架构建一个RESTful API服务，处理旅游账户数据修改功能。系统将包含以下技术栈：\n\n1. **Spring Boot 3.x** - 主流Java后端框架，提供快速开发能力\n2. **Spring Data JPA** - 数据持久化层，与数据库交互\n3. **Hibernate Validator** - 数据验证框架，确保输入数据的有效性\n4. **Lombok** - 减少样板代码，提高代码可读性\n5. **SLF4J + Logback** - 日志记录，便于调试和监控\n6. **Spring Security** - 安全认证，确保只有登录的旅行社操作员可以访问\n7. **Connection Pool (HikariCP)** - 数据库连接池，提高性能\n8. **Java 17+** - LTS版本，提供现代语言特性\n\n关键设计决策：\n- 使用DTO模式分离API层和业务层数据\n- 实现乐观锁机制防止并发修改冲突\n- 添加连接中断重试机制处理与ETOUR服务器的通信问题\n- 设计可扩展的验证框架，支持字段级验证规则\n- 实现审计功能，记录所有账户修改操作\n\n## File  \n    class TouristNotFoundException {\n        +Long touristId\n        +String searchCriteria\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\n    }\n    \n    class ValidationException {\n        +List~String~ TouristServiceImpl\n    participant VS as ValidationServiceImpl\n    participant TV as TouristValidator\n    participant EV as EmailValidator\n    participant REPO as TouristRepository\n    participant AUDIT as AuditService\n    participant ECON as ETOURConnectionService\n    participant DTO as TouristDTO\n    participant EX as ExceptionHandler\n    \n    %% 步骤1：从SearchTourist结果中选择游客\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤1：旅行社操作员从列表选择游客\n    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists?searchTerm="..."\n    TC->>TS: searchTourists(searchTerm)\n    TS->>REPO: findBySearchTerm(searchTerm)\n    REPO-->>TS: List~Tourist~\n    TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\n    DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\n    TS-->>TC: List~TouristDTO~\n    TC-->>FE: JSON响应（游客列表）\n    \n    %% 步骤2：加载选中游客数据并显示在可编辑表单\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤2：加载选中游客数据\n    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists/{id}\n    TC->>TS: getTouristById(id)\n    TS->>REPO: findById(id)\n    alt 游客存在\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\n        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\n        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\n        TS-->>TC: TouristDTO\n        TC-->>FE: 游客详细信息\n    else 游客不存在\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional.empty()\n        TS-->>EX: throw TouristNotFoundException\n        EX-->>FE: 404错误响应\n    end\n    \n    %% 步骤3：编辑表单字段并提交\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤3：编辑并提交修改\n    FE->>TC: PUT /api/tourists/{id}\n    TC->>TS: updateTourist(id, request, operatorId)\n    \n    %% 步骤4：验证信息（如果不完整则触发Errored用例）\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤4：验证信息\n    TS->>VS: validateTouristData(request)\n    VS->>TV: validate(request)\n    TV->>VS: ValidationResult\n    VS->>EV: isEmailValid(request.email)\n    EV-->>VS: boolean\n    \n    alt 验证失败\n        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (invalid)\n        TS-->>EX: throw ValidationException\n        EX-->>FE: 400验证错误响应\n        Note over FE,EX: 激活Errored用例\n        FE->>TC: 显示错误信息并要求重新输入\n    else 验证成功\n        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (valid)\n        \n        %% 检查ETOUR连接\n        TS->>ECON: connectToETOUR()\n        alt 连接中断\n            ECON-->>TS: false (connection failed)\n            TS->>ECON: retryConnection(3)\n            alt 重试成功\n                ECON-->>TS: true\n            else 重试失败\n                ECON-->>TS: false\n                TS-->>EX: throw ETourConnectionException\n                EX-->>FE: 503服务不可用\n                Note over FE,EX: 中断连接处理\n                break\n            end\n        else 连接正常\n            ECON-->>TS: true\n        end\n        \n        %% 数据验证和审计记录\n        TS->>REPO: findById(id)\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\n        TS->>AUDIT: createPreUpdateAuditLog(tourist, operatorId)\n        AUDIT-->>TS: AuditLog\n        \n        %% 更新游客数据\n        TS->>TS: tourist.updateFrom(request)\n        TS->>REPO: save(tourist)\n        REPO-->>TS: 更新的Tourist\n        \n        %% 步骤5：确认操作\n        Note over FE,EX: 步骤5：请求操作确认\n        TS->>TC: TouristResponse (needs confirmation, auditLogId)\n        TC-->>FE: 响应（需要确认，包含auditLogId）\n        \n        %% 用户确认操作\n        FE->>TC: POST /api/tourists/{id}/confirm/{auditLogId}\n        TC->>TS: confirmUpdate(touristId, auditLogId, operatorId)\n        \n        %% 步骤6：存储修改后的数据\n        Note over FE,EX: 步骤6：存储修改的数据\n        TS->>AUDIT: confirmAuditLog(auditLogId)\n        TS->>ECON: sendDataToETOUR(updatedTourist)\n        ECON-->>TS: boolean (success)\n        \n        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(updatedTourist)\n        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\n        TS->>TC: TouristResponse.success(touristDTO)\n        TC-->>FE: 成功响应（更新后的游客数据）\n        \n        %% 退出条件：系统报告更新信息\n        Note over FE,EX: 退出：系统报告更新后的游客账户信息\n        FE->>FE: 显示成功消息和更新后的账户详情\n    end\n```\n\n## Anything UNCLEAR\n\n1.   }\\n    \\n    class Address {\\n        +String street\\n        +String city\\n        +String state\\n        +String postalCode\\n        +String country\\n        +getFullAddress() String\\n    }\\n    \\n    class AgencyOperator {\\n        +Long id\\n        +String username\\n        +String agencyName\\n        +String email\\n        +String phone\\n        +Boolean loggedIn\\n        +Boolean isActive() boolean\\n        +login() void\\n        +logout() void\\n    }\\n    \\n    class AuditLog {\\n        +Long id\\n        +String actionType\\n        +String entityType\\n        +Long entityId\\n        +String oldValue\\n        +String newValue\\n        +String operatorId\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n        +String ipAddress\\n        +createLog(String action, +static fromEntity(Tourist tourist) TouristDTO\\n    }\\n    \\n    class TouristUpdateRequest {\\n        +String firstName\\n        +String lastName\\n        +String email\\n        +String phoneNumber\\n        +LocalDate dateOfBirth\\n        +Address address\\n        +String nationality\\n        +String passportNumber\\n        +validate() void\\n    }\\n    \\n    class  +static error(String message) TouristResponse\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 服务接口\\n    interface TouristService {\\n        +List~TouristDTO~ searchTourists(String searchTerm) List~TouristDTO~\\n        +TouristDTO getTouristById(Long id) TouristDTO\\n        +TouristResponse updateTourist(Long id, TouristUpdateRequest request, String operatorId) TouristResponse\\n        +TouristResponse confirmUpdate(Long touristId, Long auditLogId, String operatorId) TouristResponse\\n        +Boolean deleteTourist(Long id, String operatorId) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    class TouristServiceImpl {\\n        -TouristRepository touristRepository\\n        -ValidationService validationService\\n        -AuditService auditService\\n        -ETOURConnectionService etourConnectionService\\n        +searchTourists(String searchTerm) List~TouristDTO~\\n        +getTouristById(Long id) TouristDTO\\n        +updateTourist(Long id, TouristUpdateRequest request, String operatorId) TouristResponse\\n        +confirmUpdate(Long touristId, Long auditLogId, String operatorId) TouristResponse\\n        +deleteTourist(Long id, String operatorId) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    interface ValidationService getTourist(@PathVariable Long id) ResponseEntity~TouristDTO~\\n        +ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~ updateTourist(@PathVariable Long id, @Valid @RequestBody TouristUpdateRequest request, @RequestHeader String operatorId) ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~\\n        +ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~ confirmUpdate(@PathVariable Long touristId, @PathVariable Long auditLogId, @RequestHeader String operatorId) ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ErrorController {\\n        +ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~ handleValidationException(ValidationException ex) ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\\n        +ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~ handleTouristNotFoundException(TouristNotFoundException ex) ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\\n        +ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~ handleETourConnectionException(ETourConnectionException ex) ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 验证器\\n    class TouristValidator {\\n        -ValidationService validationService\\n        +ValidationResult validate(TouristUpdateRequest request) ValidationResult\\n        +Boolean validateRequiredFields(TouristUpdateRequest request) boolean\\n        +Boolean validateBusinessRules(TouristUpdateRequest request) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ValidationResult {\\n        +Boolean isValid\\n        +List~String~ errors\\n        +Boolean hasErrors() boolean\\n        +void addError(String error) void\\n        +String getErrorMessage() String\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 异常类\\n    class ETourConnectionException {\\n        +String connectionUrl\\n        +Integer statusCode\\n        +String errorMessage\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n        +getConnectionStatus() String\\n    }\\n    \\n    class TouristNotFoundException {\\n        +Long touristId\\n        +String searchCriteria\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ValidationException {\\n        +List~String~ validationErrors\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n        +String fieldName\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 配置类\\n    class ETOURConnectionConfig {\\n        +String serverUrl\\n        +Integer  TouristController --> TouristService\\n    ValidationServiceImpl --> TouristValidator\\n    ValidationServiceImpl --> EmailValidator\\n    TouristValidator --> ValidationService\\n    Tourist \\"1\\" TouristServiceImpl\\n    participant VS as ValidationServiceImpl\\n    participant TV as TouristValidator\\n    participant EV as EmailValidator\\n    participant REPO as TouristRepository\\n    participant AUDIT as AuditService\\n    participant ECON as ETOURConnectionService\\n    participant DTO as TouristDTO\\n    participant EX as ExceptionHandler\\n    \\n    %% 步骤1：从SearchTourist结果中选择游客\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤1：旅行社操作员从列表选择游客\\n    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists?searchTerm=\\"...\\"\\n    TC->>TS: searchTourists(searchTerm)\\n    TS->>REPO: findBySearchTerm(searchTerm)\\n    REPO-->>TS: List~Tourist~\\n    TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n    DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n    TS-->>TC: List~TouristDTO~\\n    TC-->>FE: JSON响应（游客列表）\\n    \\n    %% 步骤2：加载选中游客数据并显示在可编辑表单\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤2：加载选中游客数据\\n    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists/{id}\\n    TC->>TS: getTouristById(id)\\n    TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n    alt 游客存在\\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n        TS-->>TC: TouristDTO\\n        TC-->>FE: 游客详细信息\\n    else 游客不存在\\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional.empty()\\n        TS-->>EX: throw TouristNotFoundException\\n        EX-->>FE: 404错误响应\\n    end\\n    \\n    %% 步骤3：编辑表单字段并提交\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤3：编辑并提交修改\\n    FE->>TC: PUT /api/tourists/{id}\\n    TC->>TS: updateTourist(id, request, operatorId)\\n    \\n    %% 步骤4：验证信息（如果不完整则触发Errored用例）\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤4：验证信息\\n    TS->>VS: validateTouristData(request)\\n    VS->>TV: validate(request)\\n    TV->>VS: ValidationResult\\n    VS->>EV: isEmailValid(request.email)\\n    EV-->>VS: boolean\\n    \\n    alt 验证失败\\n        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (invalid)\\n        TS-->>EX: throw ValidationException\\n        EX-->>FE: 400验证错误响应\\n        Note over FE,EX: 激活Errored用例\\n        FE->>TC: 显示错误信息并要求重新输入\\n    else 验证成功\\n        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (valid)\\n        \\n        %% 检查ETOUR连接\\n        TS->>ECON: connectToETOUR()\\n        alt 连接中断\\n            ECON-->>TS: false (connection failed)\\n            TS->>ECON: retryConnection(3)\\n            alt 重试成功\\n                ECON-->>TS: true\\n            else 重试失败\\n                ECON-->>TS: false\\n                TS-->>EX: throw ETourConnectionException\\n                EX-->>FE: 503服务不可用\\n                Note over FE,EX: 中断连接处理\\n                break\\n            end\\n        else 连接正常\\n            ECON-->>TS: true\\n        end\\n        \\n        %% 数据验证和审计记录\\n        TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n        TS->>AUDIT: createPreUpdateAuditLog(tourist, operatorId)\\n        AUDIT-->>TS: AuditLog\\n        \\n        %% 更新游客数据\\n        TS->>TS: tourist.updateFrom(request)\\n        TS->>REPO: save(tourist)\\n        REPO-->>TS: 更新的Tourist\\n        \\n        %% 步骤5：确认操作\\n        Note over FE,EX: 步骤5：请求操作确认\\n        TS->>TC: TouristResponse (needs confirmation, auditLogId)\\n        TC-->>FE: 响应（需要确认，包含auditLogId）\\n        \\n        %% 用户确认操作\\n        FE->>TC: POST /api/tourists/{id}/confirm/{auditLogId}\\n        TC->>TS: confirmUpdate(touristId, auditLogId, operatorId)\\n        \\n        %% 步骤6：存储修改后的数据\\n        Note over FE,EX: 步骤6：存储修改的数据\\n        TS->>AUDIT: confirmAuditLog(auditLogId)\\n        TS->>ECON: sendDataToETOUR(updatedTourist)\\n        ECON-->>TS: boolean (success)\\n        \\n        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(updatedTourist)\\n        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n        TS->>TC: TouristResponse.success(touristDTO)\\n        TC-->>FE: 成功响应（更新后的游客数据）\\n        \\n        %% 退出条件：系统报告更新信息\\n        Note over FE,EX: 退出：系统报告更新后的游客账户信息\\n        FE->>FE: 显示成功消息和更新后的账户详情\\n    end\\n```\\n\\n## Anything UNCLEAR\\n\\n1. **ETOUR服务器接口规格**：不清楚ETOUR服务器API的具体格式、认证方式和数据格式要求。需要进一步明确接口规范才能实现完整的集成。\\n\\n2. **搜索功能依赖**'}, {'role': 'user', 'content': "Command Editor.write executed: API服务，处理旅游账户数据修改功能。系统将包含以下技术栈：\\n\\n1. **Spring Boot 3.x** - 主流Java后端框架，提供快速开发能力\\n2. **Spring Data JPA** - 数据持久化层，与数据库交互\\n3. **Hibernate Validator** - 数据验证框架，确保输入数据的有效性\\n4. **Lombok** - 减少样板代码，提高代码可读性\\n5. **SLF4J + Logback** - 日志记录，便于调试和监控\\n6. **Spring Security** - 安全认证，确保只有登录的旅行社操作员可以访问\\n7. **Connection Pool (HikariCP)** - 数据库连接池，提高性能\\n8. **Java 17+** - LTS版本，提供现代语言特性\\n\\n关键设计决策：\\n- 使用DTO模式分离API层和业务层数据\\n- 实现乐观锁机制防止并发修改冲突\\n- 添加连接中断重试机制处理与ETOUR服务器的通信问题\\n- 设计可扩展的验证框架，支持字段级验证规则\\n- 实现审计功能，记录所有账户修改操作\\n\\n## File +static fromEntity(Tourist tourist) TouristDTO\\n    }\\n    \\n    class TouristUpdateRequest {\\n        +String firstName\\n        +String lastName\\n        +String email\\n        +String phoneNumber\\n        +LocalDate dateOfBirth\\n        +Address address\\n        +String nationality\\n        +String passportNumber\\n        +validate() void\\n    }\\n    \\n    class TouristResponse {\\n        +Boolean success\\n        +String message\\n        +TouristDTO data\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n        +static success(TouristDTO data) TouristResponse\\n        +static error(String message) TouristResponse\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 服务接口\\n    interface TouristService {\\n        +List~TouristDTO~ searchTourists(String searchTerm) List~TouristDTO~\\n        +TouristDTO getTouristById(Long id) TouristDTO\\n        +TouristResponse updateTourist(Long id, TouristUpdateRequest request, String operatorId) TouristResponse\\n        +TouristResponse confirmUpdate(Long touristId, Long auditLogId, String operatorId) TouristResponse\\n        +Boolean deleteTourist(Long id, String operatorId) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    class TouristServiceImpl {\\n        -TouristRepository touristRepository\\n        -ValidationService validationService\\n        -AuditService auditService\\n        -ETOURConnectionService etourConnectionService\\n        +searchTourists(String searchTerm) List~TouristDTO~\\n        +getTouristById(Long id) TouristDTO\\n        +updateTourist(Long id, TouristUpdateRequest request, String operatorId) TouristResponse\\n        +confirmUpdate(Long touristId, Long auditLogId, String operatorId) TouristResponse\\n        +deleteTourist(Long id, String operatorId) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    interface ValidationService +isEmailValid(String email) boolean\\n        +isPhoneValid(String phone) boolean\\n        +isPassportValid(String passport) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    interface ETOURConnectionService {\\n        +Boolean connectToETOUR() boolean\\n        +Boolean isConnectionAlive() boolean\\n        +sendDataToETOUR(Object data) boolean\\n        +retryConnection(Integer maxRetries) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 仓库接口\\n    interface TouristRepository {\\n        +List~Tourist~ findBySearchTerm(String searchTerm) List~Tourist~\\n        +Optional~Tourist~ findById(Long id) Optional~Tourist~\\n touristService\\n        +ResponseEntity~List~TouristDTO~~ searchTourists(@RequestParam String searchTerm) ResponseEntity~List~TouristDTO~~\\n        +ResponseEntity~TouristDTO~ getTourist(@PathVariable Long id) ResponseEntity~TouristDTO~\\n        +ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~ updateTourist(@PathVariable Long id, @Valid @RequestBody TouristUpdateRequest request, @RequestHeader String operatorId) ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~\\n        +ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~ confirmUpdate(@PathVariable Long touristId, @PathVariable Long auditLogId, @RequestHeader String operatorId) ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ErrorController {\\n        +ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~ handleValidationException(ValidationException ex) ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\\n        +ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~ handleTouristNotFoundException(TouristNotFoundException ex) ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\\n        +ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~ handleETourConnectionException(ETourConnectionException ex) ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 验证器\\n    class TouristValidator {\\n        -ValidationService validationService\\n        +ValidationResult validate(TouristUpdateRequest request) ValidationResult\\n        +Boolean validateRequiredFields(TouristUpdateRequest request) boolean\\n        +Boolean validateBusinessRules(TouristUpdateRequest request) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ValidationResult {\\n        +Boolean isValid\\n        +List~String~ errors\\n        +Boolean hasErrors() boolean\\n        +void addError(String error) void\\n        +String getErrorMessage() String\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 异常类\\n    class ETourConnectionException {\\n        +String connectionUrl\\n        +Integer statusCode\\n        +String errorMessage\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n        +getConnectionStatus() String\\n    }\\n    \\n    class TouristNotFoundException {\\n        +Long touristId\\n        +String searchCriteria\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ValidationException {\\n        +List~String~ validationErrors\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n        +String fieldName\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 配置类\\n    class ETOURConnectionConfig {\\n        +String serverUrl\\n        +Integer timeoutSeconds\\n        +Integer maxRetries\\n        +Integer retryDelayMillis\\n        +String apiKey\\n        +Boolean isProduction\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 关系\\n    Tourist \\"1\\" -- \\"1\\" Address\\n    TouristServiceImpl --> TouristRepository\\n    TouristServiceImpl --> ValidationService\\n    TouristServiceImpl --> AuditService\\n    TouristServiceImpl --> ETOURConnectionService\\n    TouristController --> TouristService\\n    ValidationServiceImpl --> TouristValidator\\n    ValidationServiceImpl --> EmailValidator\\n    TouristValidator --> ValidationService\\n    Tourist \\"1\\" -- \\"*\\" AuditLog : has\\n    AgencyOperator \\"1\\" -- \\"*\\" AuditLog : performed by\\n    TouristUpdateRequest ..> Tourist : converts to\\n    TouristDTO <.. Tourist : converts from\\n```\\n\\n## Program call flow\\n\\n```mermaid\\nsequenceDiagram\\n    participant FE as Frontend/Angular UI\\n    participant TC as TouristController\\n    participant TS as TouristServiceImpl\\n    participant VS as ValidationServiceImpl\\n    participant TV as TouristValidator\\n    participant EV as EmailValidator\\n    participant REPO as TouristRepository\\n    participant AUDIT as AuditService\\n    participant ECON as ETOURConnectionService\\n    participant DTO as TouristDTO\\n    participant EX as ExceptionHandler\\n    \\n    %% 步骤1：从SearchTourist结果中选择游客\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤1：旅行社操作员从列表选择游客\\n    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists?searchTerm=\\"...\\"\\n    TC->>TS: searchTourists(searchTerm)\\n    TS->>REPO: findBySearchTerm(searchTerm)\\n    REPO-->>TS: List~Tourist~\\n    TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n    DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n    TS-->>TC: List~TouristDTO~\\n    TC-->>FE: JSON响应（游客列表）\\n    \\n    %% 步骤2：加载选中游客数据并显示在可编辑表单\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤2：加载选中游客数据\\n    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists/{id}\\n    TC->>TS: getTouristById(id)\\n    TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n    alt 游客存在\\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n        TS-->>TC: TouristDTO\\n        TC-->>FE: 游客详细信息\\n    else 游客不存在\\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional.empty()\\n        TS-->>EX: throw TouristNotFoundException\\n        EX-->>FE: 404错误响应\\n    end\\n    \\n    %% 步骤3：编辑表单字段并提交\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤3：编辑并提交修改\\n    FE->>TC: PUT /api/tourists/{id}\\n    TC->>TS: updateTourist(id, request, operatorId)\\n    \\n    %% 步骤4：验证信息（如果不完整则触发Errored用例）\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤4：验证信息\\n    TS->>VS: validateTouristData(request)\\n    VS->>TV: validate(request)\\n    TV->>VS: ValidationResult\\n    VS->>EV: isEmailValid(request.email)\\n    EV-->>VS: boolean\\n    \\n    alt 验证失败\\n        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (invalid)\\n        TS-->>EX: throw ValidationException\\n        EX-->>FE: 400验证错误响应\\n        Note over FE,EX: 激活Errored用例\\n        FE->>TC: 显示错误信息并要求重新输入\\n    else 验证成功\\n        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (valid)\\n        \\n        %% 检查ETOUR连接\\n        TS->>ECON: connectToETOUR()\\n        alt 连接中断\\n            ECON-->>TS: false (connection failed)\\n            TS->>ECON: retryConnection(3)\\n            alt 重试成功\\n                ECON-->>TS: true\\n            else 重试失败\\n                ECON-->>TS: false\\n                TS-->>EX: throw ETourConnectionException\\n                EX-->>FE: 503服务不可用\\n                Note over FE,EX: 中断连接处理\\n                break\\n            end\\n        else 连接正常\\n            ECON-->>TS: true\\n        end\\n        \\n        %% 数据验证和审计记录\\n        TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n        TS->>AUDIT: createPreUpdateAuditLog(tourist, operatorId)\\n        AUDIT-->>TS: AuditLog\\n        \\n        %% 更新游客数据\\n        TS->>TS: tourist.updateFrom(request)\\n        TS->>REPO: save(tourist)\\n        REPO-->>TS: 更新的Tourist\\n        \\n        %% 步骤5：确认操作\\n        Note over FE,EX: 步骤5：请求操作确认\\n        TS->>TC: TouristResponse (needs confirmation, auditLogId)\\n        TC-->>FE: 响应（需要确认，包含auditLogId）\\n        \\n        %% 用户确认操作\\n        FE->>TC: POST /api/tourists/{id}/confirm/{auditLogId}\\n        TC->>TS: confirmUpdate(touristId, auditLogId, operatorId)\\n        \\n        %% 步骤6：存储修改后的数据\\n        Note over FE,EX: 步骤6：存储修改的数据\\n        TS->>AUDIT: confirmAuditLog(auditLogId)\\n        TS->>ECON: sendDataToETOUR(updatedTourist)\\n        ECON-->>TS: boolean (success)\\n        \\n        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(updatedTourist)\\n        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n        TS->>TC: TouristResponse.success(touristDTO)\\n        TC-->>FE: 成功响应（更新后的游客数据）\\n        \\n        %% 退出条件：系统报告更新信息\\n        Note over FE,EX: 退出：系统报告更新后的游客账户信息\\n        FE->>FE: 显示成功消息和更新后的账户详情\\n    end\\n```\\n\\n## Anything UNCLEAR\\n\\n1. **ETOUR服务器接口规格**：不清楚ETOUR服务器API的具体格式、认证方式和数据格式要求。需要进一步明确接口规范才能实现完整的集成。\\n\\n2. **搜索功能依赖**'}, {'role': 'user', 'content': "Command Editor.write executed:       TS->>ECON: retryConnection(3)\\n            alt 重试成功\\n                ECON-->>TS: true\\n            else 重试失败\\n                ECON-->>TS: false\\n                TS-->>EX: throw ETourConnectionException\\n                EX-->>FE: 503服务不可用\\n                Note over FE,EX: 中断连接处理\\n                break\\n            end\\n        else 连接正常\\n            ECON-->>TS: true\\n API服务，处理旅游账户数据修改功能。系统将包含以下技术栈：\\n\\n1. **Spring Boot 3.x** - 主流Java后端框架，提供快速开发能力\\n2. **Spring Data JPA** - 数据持久化层，与数据库交互\\n3. **Hibernate Validator** - 数据验证框架，确保输入数据的有效性\\n4. **Lombok** - 减少样板代码，提高代码可读性\\n5. **SLF4J + Logback** - 日志记录，便于调试和监控\\n6. **Spring Security** - 安全认证，确保只有登录的旅行社操作员可以访问\\n7. **Connection Pool (HikariCP)** - 数据库连接池，提高性能\\n8. **Java 17+** - LTS版本，提供现代语言特性\\n\\n关键设计决策：\\n- 使用DTO模式分离API层和业务层数据\\n- 实现乐观锁机制防止并发修改冲突\\n- 添加连接中断重试机制处理与ETOUR服务器的通信问题\\n- 设计可扩展的验证框架，支持字段级验证规则\\n- 实现审计功能，记录所有账户修改操作\\n\\n## File Data structures and interfaces\\n\\n```mermaid\\nclassDiagram\\n    %% 实体类\\n    class Tourist {\\n        +Long id\\n        +String firstName\\n        +String lastName\\n        +String email\\n        +String phoneNumber\\n        +LocalDate dateOfBirth\\n        +Address address\\n        +String nationality\\n        +String passportNumber\\n        +LocalDateTime createdAt\\n        +LocalDateTime updatedAt\\n        +Integer version\\n        +Boolean active\\n        +getFullName() String\\n        +updateFrom(TouristUpdateRequest request) void\\n        +validate() boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    class Address {\\n        +String street\\n        +String city\\n        +String state\\n        +String postalCode\\n        +String country\\n        +getFullAddress() String\\n    }\\n    \\n    class AgencyOperator {\\n        +Long id\\n        +String username\\n        +String agencyName\\n        +String email\\n        +String phone\\n        +Boolean loggedIn\\n        +Boolean isActive() boolean\\n        +login() void\\n        +logout() void\\n    }\\n    \\n    class AuditLog {\\n        +Long id\\n        +String actionType\\n        +String entityType\\n        +Long entityId\\n        +String oldValue\\n        +String newValue\\n        +String operatorId\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n        +String ipAddress\\n        +createLog(String action, Object entity, Object oldValue, Object newValue, String operatorId) AuditLog\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% DTO类\\n    class TouristDTO {\\n        +Long id\\n        +String fullName\\n        +String email\\n        +String phoneNumber\\n        +String nationality\\n        +String passportNumber\\n        +LocalDate dateOfBirth\\n        +String address\\n        +Boolean active\\n        +static fromEntity(Tourist tourist) TouristDTO\\n    }\\n    \\n    class TouristUpdateRequest {\\n        +String firstName\\n        +String lastName\\n        +String email\\n        +String phoneNumber\\n        +LocalDate dateOfBirth\\n        +Address address\\n        +String nationality\\n        +String passportNumber\\n        +validate() void\\n    }\\n    \\n    class TouristResponse {\\n        +Boolean success\\n        +String message\\n        +TouristDTO data\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n        +static success(TouristDTO data) TouristResponse\\n        +static error(String message) TouristResponse\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 服务接口\\n    interface TouristService {\\n        +List~TouristDTO~ searchTourists(String searchTerm) List~TouristDTO~\\n        +TouristDTO getTouristById(Long id) TouristDTO\\n        +TouristResponse updateTourist(Long id, TouristUpdateRequest request, String operatorId) TouristResponse\\n        +TouristResponse confirmUpdate(Long touristId, Long auditLogId, String operatorId) TouristResponse\\n        +Boolean deleteTourist(Long id, String operatorId) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    class TouristServiceImpl {\\n        -TouristRepository touristRepository\\n        -ValidationService validationService\\n        -AuditService auditService\\n        -ETOURConnectionService etourConnectionService\\n        +searchTourists(String searchTerm) List~TouristDTO~\\n        +getTouristById(Long id) TouristDTO\\n        +updateTourist(Long id, TouristUpdateRequest request, String operatorId) TouristResponse\\n        +confirmUpdate(Long touristId, Long auditLogId, String operatorId) TouristResponse\\n        +deleteTourist(Long id, String operatorId) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    interface ValidationService {\\n        +ValidationResult validateTouristData(TouristUpdateRequest request) ValidationResult\\n        +Boolean isEmailValid(String email) boolean\\n        +Boolean isPhoneValid(String phone) boolean\\n        +Boolean isPassportValid(String passport) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ValidationServiceImpl {\\n        -TouristValidator touristValidator\\n        -EmailValidator emailValidator\\n        -PhoneValidator phoneValidator\\n        -PasswordValidator passwordValidator\\n        +validateTouristData(TouristUpdateRequest request) ValidationResult\\n        +isEmailValid(String email) boolean\\n        +isPhoneValid(String phone) boolean\\n        +isPassportValid(String passport) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    interface ETOURConnectionService {\\n        +Boolean connectToETOUR() boolean\\n        +Boolean isConnectionAlive() boolean\\n        +sendDataToETOUR(Object data) boolean\\n        +retryConnection(Integer maxRetries) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 仓库接口\\n    interface TouristRepository {\\n        +List~Tourist~ findBySearchTerm(String searchTerm) List~Tourist~\\n        +Optional~Tourist~ findById(Long id) Optional~Tourist~\\n        +Tourist save(Tourist tourist) Tourist\\n        +void deleteById(Long id) void\\n        +Long countActiveTourists() Long\\n    }\\n    \\n    interface AgencyRepository {\\n        +Optional~AgencyOperator~ findById(Long id) Optional~AgencyOperator~\\n        +Optional~AgencyOperator~ findByUsername(String username) Optional~AgencyOperator~\\n        +AgencyOperator save(AgencyOperator operator) AgencyOperator\\n        +Boolean isLoggedIn(Long operatorId) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 控制器\\n    class TouristController {\\n        -TouristService touristService\\n        +ResponseEntity~List~TouristDTO~~ searchTourists(@RequestParam String searchTerm) ResponseEntity~List~TouristDTO~~\\n        +ResponseEntity~TouristDTO~ getTourist(@PathVariable Long id) ResponseEntity~TouristDTO~\\n        +ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~ updateTourist(@PathVariable Long id, @Valid @RequestBody TouristUpdateRequest request, @RequestHeader String operatorId) ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~\\n        +ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~ confirmUpdate(@PathVariable Long touristId, @PathVariable Long auditLogId, @RequestHeader String operatorId) ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ErrorController {\\n        +ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~ handleValidationException(ValidationException ex) ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\\n        +ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~ handleTouristNotFoundException(TouristNotFoundException ex) ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\\n        +ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~ handleETourConnectionException(ETourConnectionException ex) ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 验证器\\n    class TouristValidator {\\n        -ValidationService validationService\\n        +ValidationResult validate(TouristUpdateRequest request) ValidationResult\\n        +Boolean validateRequiredFields(TouristUpdateRequest request) boolean\\n        +Boolean validateBusinessRules(TouristUpdateRequest request) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ValidationResult {\\n        +Boolean isValid\\n        +List~String~ errors\\n        +Boolean hasErrors() boolean\\n        +void addError(String error) void\\n        +String getErrorMessage() String\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 异常类\\n    class ETourConnectionException {\\n        +String connectionUrl\\n        +Integer statusCode\\n        +String errorMessage\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n        +getConnectionStatus() String\\n    }\\n    \\n    class TouristNotFoundException {\\n        +Long touristId\\n        +String searchCriteria\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ValidationException {\\n        +List~String~ validationErrors\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n        +String fieldName\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 配置类\\n    class ETOURConnectionConfig {\\n        +String serverUrl\\n        +Integer timeoutSeconds\\n        +Integer maxRetries\\n        +Integer retryDelayMillis\\n        +String apiKey\\n        +Boolean isProduction\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 关系\\n    Tourist \\"1\\" -- \\"1\\" Address\\n    TouristServiceImpl --> TouristRepository\\n    TouristServiceImpl --> ValidationService\\n    TouristServiceImpl --> AuditService\\n    TouristServiceImpl --> ETOURConnectionService\\n -- \\"*\\" AuditLog : has\\n    AgencyOperator \\"1\\" -- \\"*\\" AuditLog : performed by\\n    TouristUpdateRequest ..> Tourist : converts to\\n    TouristDTO <.. Tourist : converts from\\n```\\n\\n## Program call flow\\n\\n```mermaid\\nsequenceDiagram\\n    participant FE as Frontend/Angular UI\\n    participant TC as TouristController\\n    participant TS as TouristServiceImpl\\n    participant VS as ValidationServiceImpl\\n    participant TV as TouristValidator\\n    participant EV as EmailValidator\\n    participant REPO as TouristRepository\\n    participant AUDIT as AuditService\\n    participant ECON as ETOURConnectionService\\n    participant DTO as TouristDTO\\n    participant EX as ExceptionHandler\\n    \\n    %% 步骤1：从SearchTourist结果中选择游客\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤1：旅行社操作员从列表选择游客\\n    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists?searchTerm=\\"...\\"\\n    TC->>TS: searchTourists(searchTerm)\\n    TS->>REPO: findBySearchTerm(searchTerm)\\n    REPO-->>TS: List~Tourist~\\n    TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n    DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n    TS-->>TC: List~TouristDTO~\\n    TC-->>FE: JSON响应（游客列表）\\n    \\n    %% 步骤2：加载选中游客数据并显示在可编辑表单\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤2：加载选中游客数据\\n    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists/{id}\\n    TC->>TS: getTouristById(id)\\n    TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n    alt 游客存在\\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n        TS-->>TC: TouristDTO\\n        TC-->>FE: 游客详细信息\\n    else 游客不存在\\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional.empty()\\n        TS-->>EX: throw TouristNotFoundException\\n        EX-->>FE: 404错误响应\\n    end\\n    \\n    %% 步骤3：编辑表单字段并提交\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤3：编辑并提交修改\\n    FE->>TC: PUT /api/tourists/{id}\\n    TC->>TS: updateTourist(id, request, operatorId)\\n    \\n    %% 步骤4：验证信息（如果不完整则触发Errored用例）\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤4：验证信息\\n    TS->>VS: validateTouristData(request)\\n    VS->>TV: validate(request)\\n    TV->>VS: ValidationResult\\n    VS->>EV: isEmailValid(request.email)\\n    EV-->>VS: boolean\\n    \\n    alt 验证失败\\n        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (invalid)\\n        TS-->>EX: throw ValidationException\\n        EX-->>FE: 400验证错误响应\\n        Note over FE,EX: 激活Errored用例\\n        FE->>TC: 显示错误信息并要求重新输入\\n    else 验证成功\\n        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (valid)\\n        \\n        %% 检查ETOUR连接\\n        TS->>ECON: connectToETOUR()\\n        alt 连接中断\\n            ECON-->>TS: false (connection failed)\\n            TS->>ECON: retryConnection(3)\\n            alt 重试成功\\n                ECON-->>TS: true\\n            else 重试失败\\n                ECON-->>TS: false\\n                TS-->>EX: throw ETourConnectionException\\n                EX-->>FE: 503服务不可用\\n                Note over FE,EX: 中断连接处理\\n                break\\n            end\\n        else 连接正常\\n            ECON-->>TS: true\\n        end\\n        \\n        %% 数据验证和审计记录\\n        TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n        TS->>AUDIT: createPreUpdateAuditLog(tourist, operatorId)\\n        AUDIT-->>TS: AuditLog\\n        \\n        %% 更新游客数据\\n        TS->>TS: tourist.updateFrom(request)\\n        TS->>REPO: save(tourist)\\n        REPO-->>TS: 更新的Tourist\\n        \\n        %% 步骤5：确认操作\\n        Note over FE,EX: 步骤5：请求操作确认\\n        TS->>TC: TouristResponse (needs confirmation, auditLogId)\\n        TC-->>FE: 响应（需要确认，包含auditLogId）\\n        \\n        %% 用户确认操作\\n        FE->>TC: POST /api/tourists/{id}/confirm/{auditLogId}\\n        TC->>TS: confirmUpdate(touristId, auditLogId, operatorId)\\n        \\n        %% 步骤6：存储修改后的数据\\n        Note over FE,EX: 步骤6：存储修改的数据\\n        TS->>AUDIT: confirmAuditLog(auditLogId)\\n        TS->>ECON: sendDataToETOUR(updatedTourist)\\n        ECON-->>TS: boolean (success)\\n        \\n        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(updatedTourist)\\n        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n        TS->>TC: TouristResponse.success(touristDTO)\\n        TC-->>FE: 成功响应（更新后的游客数据）\\n        \\n        %% 退出条件：系统报告更新信息\\n        Note over FE,EX: 退出：系统报告更新后的游客账户信息\\n        FE->>FE: 显示成功消息和更新后的账户详情\\n API服务，处理旅游账户数据修改功能。系统将包含以下技术栈：\\n\\n1. **Spring Boot 3.x** - 主流Java后端框架，提供快速开发能力\\n2. **Spring Data JPA** - 数据持久化层，与数据库交互\\n3. **Hibernate Validator** - 数据验证框架，确保输入数据的有效性\\n4. **Lombok** - 减少样板代码，提高代码可读性\\n5. **SLF4J + Logback** - 日志记录，便于调试和监控\\n6. **Spring Security** - 安全认证，确保只有登录的旅行社操作员可以访问\\n7. **Connection Pool (HikariCP)** - 数据库连接池，提高性能\\n8. **Java 17+** - LTS版本，提供现代语言特性\\n\\n关键设计决策：\\n- 使用DTO模式分离API层和业务层数据\\n- 实现乐观锁机制防止并发修改冲突\\n- 添加连接中断重试机制处理与ETOUR服务器的通信问题\\n- 设计可扩展的验证框架，支持字段级验证规则\\n- 实现审计功能，记录所有账户修改操作\\n\\n## File
