Data structures and interfaces\\n\\n```mermaid\\nclassDiagram\\n    %% 实体类\\n    class Tourist {\\n        +Long id\\n        +String firstName\\n        +String lastName\\n        +String email\\n        +String phoneNumber\\n        +LocalDate dateOfBirth\\n        +Address address\\n        +String nationality\\n        +String passportNumber\\n        +LocalDateTime createdAt\\n        +LocalDateTime updatedAt\\n        +Integer version\\n        +Boolean active\\n        +getFullName() String\\n        +updateFrom(TouristUpdateRequest request) void\\n        +validate() boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    class Address {\\n        +String street\\n        +String city\\n        +String state\\n        +String postalCode\\n        +String country\\n        +getFullAddress() String\\n    }\\n    \\n    class AgencyOperator {\\n        +Long id\\n        +String username\\n        +String agencyName\\n        +String email\\n        +String phone\\n        +Boolean loggedIn\\n        +Boolean isActive() boolean\\n        +login() void\\n        +logout() void\\n    }\\n    \\n    class AuditLog {\\n        +Long id\\n        +String actionType\\n        +String entityType\\n        +Long entityId\\n        +String oldValue\\n        +String newValue\\n        +String operatorId\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n        +String ipAddress\\n        +createLog(String action, Object entity, Object oldValue, Object newValue, String operatorId) AuditLog\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% DTO类\\n    class TouristDTO {\\n        +Long id\\n        +String fullName\\n        +String email\\n        +String phoneNumber\\n        +String nationality\\n        +String passportNumber\\n        +LocalDate dateOfBirth\\n        +String address\\n        +Boolean active\\n        +static fromEntity(Tourist tourist) TouristDTO\\n    }\\n    \\n    class TouristUpdateRequest {\\n        +String firstName\\n        +String lastName\\n        +String email\\n        +String phoneNumber\\n        +LocalDate dateOfBirth\\n        +Address address\\n        +String nationality\\n        +String passportNumber\\n        +validate() void\\n    }\\n    \\n    class TouristResponse {\\n        +Boolean success\\n        +String message\\n        +TouristDTO data\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n        +static success(TouristDTO data) TouristResponse\\n        +static error(String message) TouristResponse\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 服务接口\\n    interface TouristService {\\n        +List~TouristDTO~ searchTourists(String searchTerm) List~TouristDTO~\\n        +TouristDTO getTouristById(Long id) TouristDTO\\n        +TouristResponse updateTourist(Long id, TouristUpdateRequest request, String operatorId) TouristResponse\\n        +TouristResponse confirmUpdate(Long touristId, Long auditLogId, String operatorId) TouristResponse\\n        +Boolean deleteTourist(Long id, String operatorId) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    class TouristServiceImpl {\\n        -TouristRepository touristRepository\\n        -ValidationService validationService\\n        -AuditService auditService\\n        -ETOURConnectionService etourConnectionService\\n        +searchTourists(String searchTerm) List~TouristDTO~\\n        +getTouristById(Long id) TouristDTO\\n        +updateTourist(Long id, TouristUpdateRequest request, String operatorId) TouristResponse\\n        +confirmUpdate(Long touristId, Long auditLogId, String operatorId) TouristResponse\\n        +deleteTourist(Long id, String operatorId) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    interface ValidationService {\\n        +ValidationResult validateTouristData(TouristUpdateRequest request) ValidationResult\\n        +Boolean isEmailValid(String email) boolean\\n        +Boolean isPhoneValid(String phone) boolean\\n        +Boolean isPassportValid(String passport) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ValidationServiceImpl {\\n        -TouristValidator touristValidator\\n        -EmailValidator emailValidator\\n        -PhoneValidator phoneValidator\\n        -PasswordValidator passwordValidator\\n        +validateTouristData(TouristUpdateRequest request) ValidationResult\\n        +isEmailValid(String email) boolean\\n        +isPhoneValid(String phone) boolean\\n        +isPassportValid(String passport) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    interface ETOURConnectionService {\\n        +Boolean connectToETOUR() boolean\\n        +Boolean isConnectionAlive() boolean\\n        +sendDataToETOUR(Object data) boolean\\n        +retryConnection(Integer maxRetries) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 仓库接口\\n    interface TouristRepository {\\n        +List~Tourist~ findBySearchTerm(String searchTerm) List~Tourist~\\n        +Optional~Tourist~ findById(Long id) Optional~Tourist~\\n        +Tourist save(Tourist tourist) Tourist\\n        +void deleteById(Long id) void\\n        +Long countActiveTourists() Long\\n    }\\n    \\n    interface AgencyRepository {\\n        +Optional~AgencyOperator~ findById(Long id) Optional~AgencyOperator~\\n        +Optional~AgencyOperator~ findByUsername(String username) Optional~AgencyOperator~\\n        +AgencyOperator save(AgencyOperator operator) AgencyOperator\\n        +Boolean isLoggedIn(Long operatorId) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 控制器\\n    class TouristController {\\n        -TouristService touristService\\n        +ResponseEntity~List~TouristDTO~~ searchTourists(@RequestParam String searchTerm) ResponseEntity~List~TouristDTO~~\\n        +ResponseEntity~TouristDTO~ getTourist(@PathVariable Long id) ResponseEntity~TouristDTO~\\n        +ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~ updateTourist(@PathVariable Long id, @Valid @RequestBody TouristUpdateRequest request, @RequestHeader String operatorId) ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~\\n        +ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~ confirmUpdate(@PathVariable Long touristId, @PathVariable Long auditLogId, @RequestHeader String operatorId) ResponseEntity~TouristResponse~\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ErrorController {\\n        +ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~ handleValidationException(ValidationException ex) ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\\n        +ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~ handleTouristNotFoundException(TouristNotFoundException ex) ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\\n        +ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~ handleETourConnectionException(ETourConnectionException ex) ResponseEntity~Map~String, Object~~\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 验证器\\n    class TouristValidator {\\n        -ValidationService validationService\\n        +ValidationResult validate(TouristUpdateRequest request) ValidationResult\\n        +Boolean validateRequiredFields(TouristUpdateRequest request) boolean\\n        +Boolean validateBusinessRules(TouristUpdateRequest request) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ValidationResult {\\n        +Boolean isValid\\n        +List~String~ errors\\n        +Boolean hasErrors() boolean\\n        +void addError(String error) void\\n        +String getErrorMessage() String\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 异常类\\n    class ETourConnectionException {\\n        +String connectionUrl\\n        +Integer statusCode\\n        +String errorMessage\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n        +getConnectionStatus() String\\n    }\\n    \\n    class TouristNotFoundException {\\n        +Long touristId\\n        +String searchCriteria\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ValidationException {\\n        +List~String~ validationErrors\\n        +LocalDateTime timestamp\\n        +String fieldName\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 配置类\\n    class ETOURConnectionConfig {\\n        +String serverUrl\\n        +Integer timeoutSeconds\\n        +Integer maxRetries\\n        +Integer retryDelayMillis\\n        +String apiKey\\n        +Boolean isProduction\\n    }\\n    \\n    %% 关系\\n    Tourist \\"1\\" -- \\"1\\" Address\\n    TouristServiceImpl --> TouristRepository\\n    TouristServiceImpl --> ValidationService\\n    TouristServiceImpl --> AuditService\\n    TouristServiceImpl --> ETOURConnectionService\\n    TouristController --> TouristService\\n    ValidationServiceImpl --> TouristValidator\\n    ValidationServiceImpl --> EmailValidator\\n    TouristValidator --> ValidationService\\n    Tourist \\"1\\" -- \\"*\\" AuditLog : has\\n    AgencyOperator \\"1\\" -- \\"*\\" AuditLog : performed by\\n    TouristUpdateRequest ..> Tourist : converts to\\n    TouristDTO <.. Tourist : converts from\\n```\\n\\n## Program call flow\\n\\n```mermaid\\nsequenceDiagram\\n    participant FE as Frontend/Angular UI\\n    participant TC as TouristController\\n    participant TS as TouristServiceImpl\\n    participant VS as ValidationServiceImpl\\n    participant TV as TouristValidator\\n    participant EV as EmailValidator\\n    participant REPO as TouristRepository\\n    participant AUDIT as AuditService\\n    participant ECON as ETOURConnectionService\\n    participant DTO as TouristDTO\\n    participant EX as ExceptionHandler\\n    \\n    %% 步骤1：从SearchTourist结果中选择游客\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤1：旅行社操作员从列表选择游客\\n    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists?searchTerm=\\"...\\"\\n    TC->>TS: searchTourists(searchTerm)\\n    TS->>REPO: findBySearchTerm(searchTerm)\\n    REPO-->>TS: List~Tourist~\\n    TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n    DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n    TS-->>TC: List~TouristDTO~\\n    TC-->>FE: JSON响应（游客列表）\\n    \\n    %% 步骤2：加载选中游客数据并显示在可编辑表单\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤2：加载选中游客数据\\n    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists/{id}\\n    TC->>TS: getTouristById(id)\\n    TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n    alt 游客存在\\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n        TS-->>TC: TouristDTO\\n        TC-->>FE: 游客详细信息\\n    else 游客不存在\\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional.empty()\\n        TS-->>EX: throw TouristNotFoundException\\n        EX-->>FE: 404错误响应\\n    end\\n    \\n    %% 步骤3：编辑表单字段并提交\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤3：编辑并提交修改\\n    FE->>TC: PUT /api/tourists/{id}\\n    TC->>TS: updateTourist(id, request, operatorId)\\n    \\n    %% 步骤4：验证信息（如果不完整则触发Errored用例）\\n    Note over FE,EX: 步骤4：验证信息\\n    TS->>VS: validateTouristData(request)\\n    VS->>TV: validate(request)\\n    TV->>VS: ValidationResult\\n    VS->>EV: isEmailValid(request.email)\\n    EV-->>VS: boolean\\n    \\n    alt 验证失败\\n        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (invalid)\\n        TS-->>EX: throw ValidationException\\n        EX-->>FE: 400验证错误响应\\n        Note over FE,EX: 激活Errored用例\\n        FE->>TC: 显示错误信息并要求重新输入\\n    else 验证成功\\n        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (valid)\\n        \\n        %% 检查ETOUR连接\\n        TS->>ECON: connectToETOUR()\\n        alt 连接中断\\n            ECON-->>TS: false (connection failed)\\n            TS->>ECON: retryConnection(3)\\n            alt 重试成功\\n                ECON-->>TS: true\\n            else 重试失败\\n                ECON-->>TS: false\\n                TS-->>EX: throw ETourConnectionException\\n                EX-->>FE: 503服务不可用\\n                Note over FE,EX: 中断连接处理\\n                break\\n            end\\n        else 连接正常\\n            ECON-->>TS: true\\n        end\\n        \\n        %% 数据验证和审计记录\\n        TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n        TS->>AUDIT: createPreUpdateAuditLog(tourist, operatorId)\\n        AUDIT-->>TS: AuditLog\\n        \\n        %% 更新游客数据\\n        TS->>TS: tourist.updateFrom(request)\\n        TS->>REPO: save(tourist)\\n        REPO-->>TS: 更新的Tourist\\n        \\n        %% 步骤5：确认操作\\n        Note over FE,EX: 步骤5：请求操作确认\\n        TS->>TC: TouristResponse (needs confirmation, auditLogId)\\n        TC-->>FE: 响应（需要确认，包含auditLogId）\\n        \\n        %% 用户确认操作\\n        FE->>TC: POST /api/tourists/{id}/confirm/{auditLogId}\\n        TC->>TS: confirmUpdate(touristId, auditLogId, operatorId)\\n        \\n        %% 步骤6：存储修改后的数据\\n        Note over FE,EX: 步骤6：存储修改的数据\\n        TS->>AUDIT: confirmAuditLog(auditLogId)\\n        TS->>ECON: sendDataToETOUR(updatedTourist)\\n        ECON-->>TS: boolean (success)\\n        \\n        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(updatedTourist)\\n        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n        TS->>TC: TouristResponse.success(touristDTO)\\n        TC-->>FE: 成功响应（更新后的游客数据）\\n        \\n        %% 退出条件：系统报告更新信息\\n        Note over FE,EX: 退出：系统报告更新后的游客账户信息\\n        FE->>FE: 显示成功消息和更新后的账户详情\\n    end\\n```\\n\\n## Anything UNCLEAR\\n\\n1. **ETOUR服务器接口规格**：不清楚ETOUR服务器API的具体格式、认证方式和数据格式要求。需要进一步明确接口规范才能实现完整的集成。\\n\\n2. **搜索功能依赖**'}, {'role': 'user', 'content': "Command Editor.write executed: DONT omit any necessary info such as path, link, environment, programming language, framework, requirement, constraint from original content to team members because you are their sole info source.\nPay close attention to new user message, review the conversation history, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to respond to the user directly, DON\'T ask your team members.\nPay close attention to messages from team members. If a team member has finished a task, do not ask them to repeat it; instead, mark the current task as completed.\nNote:\n1. If the requirement is a pure DATA-RELATED requirement, such as web browsing, web scraping, web searching, web imitation, data science, data analysis, machine learning, deep learning, text-to-image etc. DON\'T decompose it, assign a single task with the original user requirement as instruction directly to Data Analyst.\n2. If the requirement is developing a software, game, app, or website, excluding the above data-related tasks, you should decompose the requirement into multiple tasks and assign them to different team members based on their expertise. The standard software development process has four steps: creating a Product Requirement Document (PRD) by the Product Manager -> writing a System Design by the Architect -> creating tasks by the Project Manager -> and coding by the Engineer. You may choose to execute any of these steps. When publishing message to Product Manager, you should directly copy the full original user requirement.\n2.1. If the requirement contains both DATA-RELATED part mentioned in 1 and software development part mentioned in 2, you should decompose the software development part and assign them to different team members based on their expertise, and assign the DATA-RELATED part to Data Analyst David directly.\n2.2. For software development requirement, estimate the complexity of the requirement before assignment, following the common industry practice of t-shirt sizing:\n - XS: snake game, static personal homepage, basic calculator app\n - S: Basic photo gallery, basic file upload system, basic feedback form\n - M: Offline menu ordering system, news aggregator app\n - L: Online booking system, inventory management system\n - XL: Social media platform, e-commerce app, real-time multiplayer game\n - For XS and S requirements, you don\'t need the standard software development process, you may directly ask Engineer to write the code. Otherwise, estimate if any part of the standard software development process may contribute to a better final code. If so, assign team members accordingly.\n3.1 If the task involves code review (CR) or code checking, you should assign it to Engineer.\n4. If the requirement is a common-sense, logical, or math problem, you should respond directly without assigning any task to team members.\n5. If you think the requirement is not clear or ambiguous, you should ask the user for clarification immediately. Assign tasks only after all info is clear.\n6. It is helpful for Engineer to have both the system design and the project schedule for writing the code, so include paths of both files (if available) and remind Engineer to definitely read them when publishing message to Engineer.\n7. If the requirement is writing a TRD and software framework, you should assign it to Architect. When publishing message to Architect, you should directly copy the full original user requirement.\n8. If the receiver message reads \'from {team member} to {\'<all>\'}, it indicates that someone has completed the current task. Note this in your thoughts.\n9. Do not use the \'end\' command when the current task remains unfinished; instead, use the \'finish_current_task\' command to indicate completion before switching to the next task.\n10. Do not use escape characters in json data, particularly within file paths.\n11. Analyze the capabilities of team members and assign tasks to them based on user Requirements. If the requirements ask to ignore certain tasks, follow the requirements.\n12. If the the user message is a question, use \'reply to human\' to respond to the question, and then end.\n13. This operation will NOT modify the content of the lines before or after the given line number. This function can not insert content the end of the file. an existing plan to achieve the goal. A plan consists of one to 3 tasks.\nIf plan is created, you should track the progress and update the plan accordingly, such as Plan.finish_current_task, Plan.append_task, Plan.reset_task, Plan.replace_task, etc.\nWhen presented a current task, tackle the task using the available commands.\nPay close attention to new user message, review the conversation history, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to respond to new user requirement.\nNote:\n1. If you keeping encountering errors, unexpected situation, or you are not sure of proceeding, use RoleZero.ask_human to ask for help.\n2. Carefully review your progress at the current task, if your actions so far has not fulfilled the task instruction, you should continue with current task. Otherwise, finish current task by Plan.finish_current_task explicitly.\n3. Each time you finish a task, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to report your progress.\n4. Don\'t forget to append task first when all existing tasks are finished and new tasks are required.\n5. Avoid repeating tasks you have already completed. And end loop when all requirements are met.\nYou are an autonomous programmer\n\nThe special interface consists of a file editor that shows you 100 lines of a file at a time.\n\nYou can use terminal commands (e.g., cat, ls, cd) by calling Terminal.run_command.\n\nYou should carefully observe the behavior and results of the previous action, and avoid triggering repeated errors.\n\nIn addition to the terminal, I also provide additional tools. \n\nIf provided an issue link, you first action must be navigate to the issue page using Browser tool to understand the issue.\n\nYour must check if the repository exists at the current path. If it exists, navigate to the repository path. If the repository doesn\'t exist, please download it and then navigate to it.\nAll subsequent actions must be performed within this repository path. Do not leave this directory to execute any actions at any time.\n\nNote:\n\n1. If you open a file and need to get to an area around a specific line that is not in the first 100 lines, say line 583, don\'t just use the scroll_down command multiple times. Instead, use the Editor.goto_line command. It\'s much quicker. \n2. Always make sure to look at the currently open file and the current working directory (which appears right after the currently open file). The currently open file might be in a different directory than the working directory! Note that some commands, such as \'create\', open files, so they might change the current open file.\n3. When using Editor.edit_file_by_replace, if there is no exact match, take the difference in indentation into consideration.\n4. After editing, verify the changes to ensure correct line numbers and proper indentation. Adhere to PEP8 standards for Python code.\n5. NOTE ABOUT THE EDIT COMMAND: Indentation really matters! When editing a file, make sure to insert appropriate indentation before each line! Ensuring the code adheres to PEP8 standards. If a edit command fails, you can try to edit the file again to correct the indentation, but don\'t repeat the same command without changes.\n6. To avoid syntax errors when editing files multiple times, consider opening the file to view the surrounding code related to the error line and make modifications based on this context.\n7. Ensure to observe the currently open file and the current working directory, which is displayed right after the open file. The open file might be in a different directory than the working directory. Remember, commands like \'create\' open files and might alter the current open file.\n8. Effectively using Use search commands (`search_dir`, `search_file`, `find_file`) and navigation commands (`open_file`, `goto_line`) to locate and modify files efficiently. The Editor tool can fully satisfy the requirements. Follow these steps and considerations for optimal results:\n\n9. When the edit fails, try to enlarge the range of code.\n10. You must use the Editor.open_file command to open a file before using the Editor tool\'s edit command to modify it. When you open a file, any currently open file will be automatically closed.\n11. Remember, when you use Editor.insert_content_at_line or Editor.edit_file_by_replace, the line numbers will change after the operation. Therefore, if there are multiple operations, perform only the first operation in the current response, and defer the subsequent operations to the next turn.\n11.1 Do not use Editor.insert_content_at_line or Editor.edit_file_by_replace more than once per command list.\n12. If you choose Editor.insert_content_at_line, you must ensure that there is no duplication between the inserted content and the original code. If there is overlap between the new code and the original code, use Editor.edit_file_by_replace instead.\n13. If you choose Editor.edit_file_by_replace, the original code that needs to be replaced must start at the beginning of the line and end at the end of the line\n14. When not specified, you should write files in a folder named "{project_name}_1766886630". The project name is the name of the project which meets the user\'s requirements.\n15. When provided system design or project schedule, you MUST read them first before making a plan, then adhere to them in your implementation, especially in the programming language, package, or framework. You MUST implement all code files prescribed in the system design or project schedule.\n16. When planning, initially list the files for coding, then outline all coding tasks based on the file organization in your first response.\n17. If you plan to read a file, do not include other plans in the same response.\n18. Write only one code file each time and provide its full implementation.\n19. When the requirement is simple, you don\'t need to create a plan, just do it right away.\n20. When using the editor, pay attention to current directory. When you use editor tools, the paths must be either absolute or relative to the editor\'s current directory.\n21. When planning, consider whether images are needed. If you are developing a showcase website, start by using ImageGetter.get_image to obtain the necessary images.\n22. When planning, merge multiple tasks that operate on the same file into a single task. For example, create one task for writing unit tests for all functions in a class. Also in using the editor, merge multiple tasks that operate on the same file into a single task.\n23. When create unit tests for a code file, use Editor.read() to read the code file before planing. And create one plan to writing the unit test for the whole file.\n24. The priority to select technology stacks: Describe in Sytem Design and Project Schedule > Vite, React, MUI and Tailwind CSS > native HTML \n24.1. Spring Boot框架构建一个RESTful API服务，处理旅游账户数据修改功能。系统将包含以下技术栈：\n004|\n005|1. **Spring Boot 3.x** - 主流Java后端框架，提供快速开发能力\n006|2. **Spring Data JPA** - 数据持久化层，与数据库交互\n007|3. **Hibernate Validator** - 数据验证框架，确保输入数据的有效性\n008|4. **Lombok** - 减少样板代码，提高代码可读性\n009|5. **SLF4J + Logback** - 日志记录，便于调试和监控\n010|6. **Spring Security** - 安全认证，确保只有登录的旅行社操作员可以访问\n011|7. **Connection Pool (HikariCP)** - 数据库连接池，提高性能\n012|8. **Java 17+** - LTS版本，提供现代语言特性\n013|\n014|关键设计决策：\n015|- 使用DTO模式分离API层和业务层数据\n016|- 实现乐观锁机制防止并发修改冲突\n017|- 添加连接中断重试机制处理与ETOUR服务器的通信问题\n018|- 设计可扩展的验证框架，支持字段级验证规则\n019|- TouristController\n324|    participant TS as TouristServiceImpl\n325|    participant VS as ValidationServiceImpl\n326|    participant TV as TouristValidator\n327|    participant EV as EmailValidator\n328|    participant REPO as TouristRepository\n329|    participant AUDIT as AuditService\n330|    participant ECON as ETOURConnectionService\n331|    participant DTO as TouristDTO\n332|    participant EX as ExceptionHandler\n333|    \n334|    %% 步骤1：从SearchTourist结果中选择游客\n335|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤1：旅行社操作员从列表选择游客\n336|    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists?searchTerm="..."\n337|    TC->>TS: searchTourists(searchTerm)\n338|    TS->>REPO: findBySearchTerm(searchTerm)\n339|    REPO-->>TS: List~Tourist~\n340|    TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\n341|    DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\n342|    TS-->>TC: List~TouristDTO~\n343|    TC-->>FE: JSON响应（游客列表）\n344|    \n345|    %% 步骤2：加载选中游客数据并显示在可编辑表单\n346|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤2：加载选中游客数据\n347|    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists/{id}\n348|    TC->>TS: getTouristById(id)\n349|    TS->>REPO: findById(id)\n350|    alt 游客存在\n351|        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\n352|        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\n353|        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\n354|        TS-->>TC: TouristDTO\n355|        TC-->>FE: 游客详细信息\n356|    else 游客不存在\n357|        REPO-->>TS: Optional.empty()\n358|        TS-->>EX: throw TouristNotFoundException\n359|        EX-->>FE: 404错误响应\n360|    end\n361|    \n362|    %% 步骤3：编辑表单字段并提交\n363|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤3：编辑并提交修改\n364|    FE->>TC: PUT /api/tourists/{id}\n365|    TC->>TS: updateTourist(id, request, operatorId)\n366|    \n367|    %% 步骤4：验证信息（如果不完整则触发Errored用例）\n368|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤4：验证信息\n369|    TS->>VS: validateTouristData(request)\n370|    VS->>TV: validate(request)\n371|    TV->>VS: ValidationResult\n372|    VS->>EV: isEmailValid(request.email)\n373|    EV-->>VS: boolean\n374|    \n375|    alt 验证失败\n376|        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (invalid)\n377|        TS-->>EX: throw ValidationException\n378|        EX-->>FE: 400验证错误响应\n379|        Note over FE,EX: 激活Errored用例\n380|        FE->>TC: 显示错误信息并要求重新输入\n381|    else 验证成功\n382|        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (valid)\n383|        \n384|        %% 检查ETOUR连接\n385|        TS->>ECON: connectToETOUR()\n386|        alt 连接中断\n387|            ECON-->>TS: false (connection failed)\n388|            TS->>ECON: retryConnection(3)\n389|            alt 重试成功\n390|                ECON-->>TS: true\n391|            else 重试失败\n392|                ECON-->>TS: false\n393|                TS-->>EX: throw ETourConnectionException\n394|                EX-->>FE: 503服务不可用\n395|                Note over FE,EX: 中断连接处理\n396|                break\n397|            end\n398|        else 连接正常\n399|            ECON-->>TS: true\n400|        end\n401|        \n402|        %% 数据验证和审计记录\n403|        TS->>REPO: findById(id)\n404|        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\n405|        TS->>AUDIT: createPreUpdateAuditLog(tourist, operatorId)\n406|        AUDIT-->>TS: AuditLog\n407|        \n408|        %% 更新游客数据\n409|        TS->>TS: tourist.updateFrom(request)\n410|        TS->>REPO: save(tourist)\n411|        REPO-->>TS: 更新的Tourist\n412|        \n413|        %% 步骤5：确认操作\n414|        Note over FE,EX: 步骤5：请求操作确认\n415|        TS->>TC: TouristResponse (needs confirmation, auditLogId)\n416|        TC-->>FE: 响应（需要确认，包含auditLogId）\n417|        \n418|        %% 用户确认操作\n419|        FE->>TC: POST /api/tourists/{id}/confirm/{auditLogId}\n420|        TC->>TS: confirmUpdate(touristId, auditLogId, operatorId)\n421|        \n422|        %% 步骤6：存储修改后的数据\n423|        Note over FE,EX: 步骤6：存储修改的数据\n424|        TS->>AUDIT: confirmAuditLog(auditLogId)\n425|        TS->>ECON: sendDataToETOUR(updatedTourist)\n426|        ECON-->>TS: boolean (success)\n427|        \n428|        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(updatedTourist)\n429|        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\n430|        TS->>TC: TouristResponse.success(touristDTO)\n431|        TC-->>FE: 成功响应（更新后的游客数据）\n432|        \n433|        %% 退出条件：系统报告更新信息\n434|        Note over FE,EX: 退出：系统报告更新后的游客账户信息\n435|        FE->>FE: 显示成功消息和更新后的账户详情\n436|    end\n437|```\n438|\n439|## Anything UNCLEAR\n440|\n441|1. TouristDTO\\n332|    participant EX as ExceptionHandler\\n333|    \\n334|    %% 步骤1：从SearchTourist结果中选择游客\\n335|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤1：旅行社操作员从列表选择游客\\n336|    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists?searchTerm="..."\\n337|    TC->>TS: searchTourists(searchTerm)\\n338|    TS->>REPO: findBySearchTerm(searchTerm)\\n339|    REPO-->>TS: List~Tourist~\\n340|    TS->>DTO: FE,EX: 步骤2：加载选中游客数据\\n347|    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists/{id}\\n348|    TC->>TS: getTouristById(id)\\n349|    TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n350|    alt 游客存在\\n351|        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n352|        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n353|        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n354|        TS-->>TC: TouristDTO\\n355|        TC-->>FE: 游客详细信息\\n356|    else FE,EX: 步骤4：验证信息\\n369|    TS->>VS: validateTouristData(request)\\n370|    VS->>TV: validate(request)\\n371|    TV->>VS: ValidationResult\\n372|    VS->>EV: isEmailValid(request.email)\\n373|    EV-->>VS: boolean\\n374|    \\n375|    alt 验证失败\\n376|        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (invalid)\\n377|        TS-->>EX: throw ValidationException\\n378|        EX-->>FE: 400验证错误响应\\n379|        Note over FE,EX: 激活Errored用例\\n380|        FE->>TC: 显示错误信息并要求重新输入\\n381|    else 验证成功\\n382|        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (valid)\\n383|        \\n384|        %% 检查ETOUR连接\\n385|        TS->>ECON: connectToETOUR()\\n386|        alt 连接中断\\n387|            ECON-->>TS: false (connection failed)\\n388|            TS->>ECON: retryConnection(3)\\n389|            alt 重试成功\\n390|                ECON-->>TS: true\\n391|            else 重试失败\\n392|                ECON-->>TS: false\\n393|                TS-->>EX: throw ETourConnectionException\\n394|                EX-->>FE: 503服务不可用\\n395|                Note over FE,EX: 中断连接处理\\n396|                break\\n397|            end\\n398|        else 连接正常\\n399|            ECON-->>TS: true\\n400|        end\\n401|        \\n402|        %% 数据验证和审计记录\\n403|        TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n404|        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n405|        TS->>AUDIT: createPreUpdateAuditLog(tourist, operatorId)\\n406|        AUDIT-->>TS: (success)\\n427|        \\n428|        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(updatedTourist)\\n429|        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n430|        TS->>TC: TouristResponse.success(touristDTO)\\n431| Make sure to include all necessary functions, classes, and imports. Ensure the code is correct, efficient, and handles edge cases.\n\nUse Case:\nUse case name: ModifyTouristAccountData \nDescription: Change data of a selected account Tourist. \nParticipating Actor: initialization Agency Operator \nEntry Operator conditions: The agency has logged. \nFlow of events User System: \n1. Tourists from the list obtained by activating the use case SearchTourist it selects and activates a function to modify data. \n2 Loads the data selected and displays them in a form allowing the change. \n3 Edit the fields in the form and submit. \n4 Verify the information and asks for confirmation of the change. Where the data is invalid or insufficient, the system activates the use case Errored. \n5 Confirm the operation. \n6. Stores the modified data selected account. \nExit conditions: The system has been reporting the information required by the selected account Tourist. \nInterruption of the connection to the server ETOUR. \nQuality requirements:\n\nRequirements:\n1. API服务，处理旅游账户数据修改功能。系统将包含以下技术栈：\\n004|\\n005|1. **Spring Boot 3.x** - 主流Java后端框架，提供快速开发能力\\n006|2. **Spring Data JPA** - 数据持久化层，与数据库交互\\n007|3. **Hibernate Validator** - 数据验证框架，确保输入数据的有效性\\n008|4. **Lombok** - 减少样板代码，提高代码可读性\\n009|5. **SLF4J + Logback** - 日志记录，便于调试和监控\\n010|6. **Spring Security** - 安全认证，确保只有登录的旅行社操作员可以访问\\n011|7. **Connection Pool (HikariCP)** - 数据库连接池，提高性能\\n012|8. **Java TouristUpdateRequest ..> Tourist : converts to\\n315|    TouristDTO <.. Tourist : converts from\\n316|```\\n317|\\n318|## Program call flow\\n319|\\n320|```mermaid\\n321|sequenceDiagram\\n322|    participant FE as Frontend/Angular UI\\n323|    participant TC as TouristController\\n324|    participant TS as TouristServiceImpl\\n325|    participant VS as ValidationServiceImpl\\n326|    participant TV as TouristValidator\\n327|    participant EV as EmailValidator\\n328|    participant REPO as TouristRepository\\n329|    participant AUDIT as AuditService\\n330|    participant ECON as ETOURConnectionService\\n331|    participant DTO as TouristDTO\\n332|    participant EX as ExceptionHandler\\n333|    \\n334|    %% 步骤1：从SearchTourist结果中选择游客\\n335|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤1：旅行社操作员从列表选择游客\\n336|    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists?searchTerm="..."\\n337|    TC->>TS: searchTourists(searchTerm)\\n338|    TS->>REPO: findBySearchTerm(searchTerm)\\n339|    REPO-->>TS: List~Tourist~\\n340|    TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n341|    DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n342|    TS-->>TC: List~TouristDTO~\\n343|    TC-->>FE: JSON响应（游客列表）\\n344|    \\n345|    %% 步骤2：加载选中游客数据并显示在可编辑表单\\n346|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤2：加载选中游客数据\\n347|    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists/{id}\\n348|    TC->>TS: getTouristById(id)\\n349|    TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n350|    alt 游客存在\\n351|        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n352|        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n353|        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n354|        TS-->>TC: TouristDTO\\n355|        TC-->>FE: 游客详细信息\\n356|    else 游客不存在\\n357|        REPO-->>TS: Optional.empty()\\n358|        TS-->>EX: throw TouristNotFoundException\\n359|        EX-->>FE: 404错误响应\\n360|    end\\n361|    \\n362|    %% 步骤3：编辑表单字段并提交\\n363|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤3：编辑并提交修改\\n364|    FE->>TC: PUT /api/tourists/{id}\\n365|    TC->>TS: updateTourist(id, request, operatorId)\\n366|    \\n367|    %% 步骤4：验证信息（如果不完整则触发Errored用例）\\n368|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤4：验证信息\\n369|    TS->>VS: validateTouristData(request)\\n370|    VS->>TV: validate(request)\\n371|    TV->>VS: ValidationResult\\n372|    VS->>EV: isEmailValid(request.email)\\n373|    EV-->>VS: boolean\\n374|    \\n375|    alt 验证失败\\n376|        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (invalid)\\n377|        TS-->>EX: throw ValidationException\\n378|        EX-->>FE: 400验证错误响应\\n379|        Note over FE,EX: 激活Errored用例\\n380|        FE->>TC: 显示错误信息并要求重新输入\\n381|    else 验证成功\\n382|        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (valid)\\n383|        \\n384|        %% 检查ETOUR连接\\n385|        TS->>ECON: connectToETOUR()\\n386|        alt 连接中断\\n387|            ECON-->>TS: false (connection failed)\\n388|            TS->>ECON: retryConnection(3)\\n389|            alt 重试成功\\n390|                ECON-->>TS: true\\n391|            else 重试失败\\n392|                ECON-->>TS: false\\n393|                TS-->>EX: throw ETourConnectionException\\n394|                EX-->>FE: 503服务不可用\\n395|                Note over FE,EX: 中断连接处理\\n396|                break\\n397|            end\\n398|        else 连接正常\\n399|            ECON-->>TS: true\\n400|        end\\n401|        \\n402|        %% 数据验证和审计记录\\n403|        TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n404|        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n405|        TS->>AUDIT: createPreUpdateAuditLog(tourist, operatorId)\\n406|        AUDIT-->>TS: AuditLog\\n407|        \\n408|        %% 更新游客数据\\n409|        TS->>TS: tourist.updateFrom(request)\\n410|        TS->>REPO: save(tourist)\\n411|        REPO-->>TS: 更新的Tourist\\n412|        \\n413|        %% 步骤5：确认操作\\n414|        Note over FE,EX: 步骤5：请求操作确认\\n415|        TS->>TC: TouristResponse (needs confirmation, auditLogId)\\n416|        TC-->>FE: 响应（需要确认，包含auditLogId）\\n417|        \\n418|        %% 用户确认操作\\n419|        FE->>TC: POST /api/tourists/{id}/confirm/{auditLogId}\\n420|        TC->>TS: confirmUpdate(touristId, auditLogId, operatorId)\\n421|        \\n422|        %% 步骤6：存储修改后的数据\\n423|        Note over FE,EX: 步骤6：存储修改的数据\\n424|        TS->>AUDIT: confirmAuditLog(auditLogId)\\n425|        TS->>ECON: sendDataToETOUR(updatedTourist)\\n426|        ECON-->>TS: boolean (success)\\n427|        \\n428|        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(updatedTourist)\\n429|        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n430|        TS->>TC: TouristResponse.success(touristDTO)\\n431|        TC-->>FE: 成功响应（更新后的游客数据）\\n432|        \\n433|        %% 退出条件：系统报告更新信息\\n434|        Note over FE,EX: 退出：系统报告更新后的游客账户信息\\n435|        FE->>FE: 显示成功消息和更新后的账户详情\\n436|    end\\n437|```\\n438|\\n439|## Anything UNCLEAR\\n440|\\n441|1. **ETOUR服务器接口规格**：不清楚ETOUR服务器API的具体格式、认证方式和数据格式要求。需要进一步明确接口规范才能实现完整的集成。\\n442|\\n443|2. **搜索功能依赖**\''}, {'role': 'assistant', 'content': 'Based on the system design EmailValidator\\n328|    participant REPO as TouristRepository\\n329|    participant AUDIT as AuditService\\n330|    participant ECON as ETOURConnectionService\\n331|    participant DTO as TouristDTO\\n332|    participant EX as ExceptionHandler\\n333|    \\n334|    %% 步骤1：从SearchTourist结果中选择游客\\n335|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤1：旅行社操作员从列表选择游客\\n336|    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists?searchTerm="..."\\n337|    TC->>TS: searchTourists(searchTerm)\\n338|    TS->>REPO: findBySearchTerm(searchTerm)\\n339|    REPO-->>TS: List~Tourist~\\n340|    TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n341|    DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n342|    TS-->>TC: List~TouristDTO~\\n343|    TC-->>FE: JSON响应（游客列表）\\n344|    \\n345|    %% 步骤2：加载选中游客数据并显示在可编辑表单\\n346|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤2：加载选中游客数据\\n347|    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists/{id}\\n348|    TC->>TS: getTouristById(id)\\n349|    TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n350|    alt 游客存在\\n351|        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n352|        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n353|        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n354|        TS-->>TC: TouristDTO\\n355|        TC-->>FE: 游客详细信息\\n356|    else 游客不存在\\n357|        REPO-->>TS: Optional.empty()\\n358|        TS-->>EX: throw TouristNotFoundException\\n359|        EX-->>FE: 404错误响应\\n360|    end\\n361|    \\n362|    %% 步骤3：编辑表单字段并提交\\n363|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤3：编辑并提交修改\\n364|    FE->>TC: PUT /api/tourists/{id}\\n365|    TC->>TS: updateTourist(id, request, operatorId)\\n366|    \\n367|    %% 步骤4：验证信息（如果不完整则触发Errored用例）\\n368|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤4：验证信息\\n369|    TS->>VS: validateTouristData(request)\\n370|    VS->>TV: validate(request)\\n371|    TV->>VS: ValidationResult\\n372|    VS->>EV: isEmailValid(request.email)\\n373|    EV-->>VS: boolean\\n374|    \\n375|    alt 验证失败\\n376|        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (invalid)\\n377|        TS-->>EX: throw ValidationException\\n378|        EX-->>FE: 400验证错误响应\\n379|        Note over FE,EX: 激活Errored用例\\n380|        FE->>TC: 显示错误信息并要求重新输入\\n381|    else 验证成功\\n382|        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (valid)\\n383|        \\n384|        %% 检查ETOUR连接\\n385|        TS->>ECON: connectToETOUR()\\n386|        alt 连接中断\\n387|            ECON-->>TS: false (connection failed)\\n388|            TS->>ECON: retryConnection(3)\\n389|            alt 重试成功\\n390|                ECON-->>TS: true\\n391|            else 重试失败\\n392|                ECON-->>TS: false\\n393|                TS-->>EX: throw ETourConnectionException\\n394|                EX-->>FE: 503服务不可用\\n395|                Note over FE,EX: 中断连接处理\\n396|                break\\n397|            end\\n398|        else 连接正常\\n399|            ECON-->>TS: true\\n400|        end\\n401|        \\n402|        %% 数据验证和审计记录\\n403|        TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n404|        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n405|        TS->>AUDIT: createPreUpdateAuditLog(tourist, operatorId)\\n406|        AUDIT-->>TS: AuditLog\\n407|        \\n408|        %% 更新游客数据\\n409|        TS->>TS: tourist.updateFrom(request)\\n410|        TS->>REPO: save(tourist)\\n411|        REPO-->>TS: 更新的Tourist\\n412|        \\n413|        %% 步骤5：确认操作\\n414|        Note over FE,EX: 步骤5：请求操作确认\\n415|        TS->>TC: TouristResponse (needs confirmation, auditLogId)\\n416|        TC-->>FE: 响应（需要确认，包含auditLogId）\\n417|        \\n418|        %% 用户确认操作\\n419|        FE->>TC: POST /api/tourists/{id}/confirm/{auditLogId}\\n420|        TC->>TS: confirmUpdate(touristId, auditLogId, operatorId)\\n421|        \\n422|        %% 步骤6：存储修改后的数据\\n423|        Note over FE,EX: 步骤6：存储修改的数据\\n424|        TS->>AUDIT: confirmAuditLog(auditLogId)\\n425|        TS->>ECON: sendDataToETOUR(updatedTourist)\\n426|        ECON-->>TS: boolean (success)\\n427|        \\n428|        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(updatedTourist)\\n429|        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n430|        TS->>TC: TouristResponse.success(touristDTO)\\n431|        TC-->>FE: 成功响应（更新后的游客数据）\\n432|        \\n433|        %% 退出条件：系统报告更新信息\\n434|        Note over FE,EX: 退出：系统报告更新后的游客账户信息\\n435|        FE->>FE: 显示成功消息和更新后的账户详情\\n436|    end\\n437|```\\n438|\\n439|## Note over FE,EX: 步骤3：编辑并提交修改\\n364|    FE->>TC: PUT /api/tourists/{id}\\n365|    TC->>TS: updateTourist(id, request, operatorId)\\n366|    \\n367|    %% 步骤4：验证信息（如果不完整则触发Errored用例）\\n368|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤4：验证信息\\n369|    TS->>VS: validateTouristData(request)\\n370|    VS->>TV: validate(request)\\n371|    TV->>VS: ValidationResult\\n372|    VS->>EV: isEmailValid(request.email)\\n373|    EV-->>VS: boolean\\n374|    \\n375|    alt 验证失败\\n376|        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (invalid)\\n377|        TS-->>EX: throw ValidationException\\n378|        EX-->>FE: 400验证错误响应\\n379|        Note over FE,EX: 激活Errored用例\\n380|        FE->>TC: 显示错误信息并要求重新输入\\n381|    else 验证成功\\n382|        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (valid)\\n383|        \\n384|        %% 检查ETOUR连接\\n385|    ECON-->>TS: true\\n391|            else 重试失败\\n392|                ECON-->>TS: false\\n393|                TS-->>EX: throw ETourConnectionException\\n394|                EX-->>FE: 503服务不可用\\n395|    %% 步骤5：确认操作\\n414|        Note over FE,EX: 步骤5：请求操作确认\\n415|        TS->>TC: TouristResponse (needs confirmation, auditLogId)\\n416|        TC-->>FE: 响应（需要确认，包含auditLogId）\\n417|        \\n418| (success)\\n427|        \\n428|        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(updatedTourist)\\n429|        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n430|        TS->>TC: TouristResponse.success(touristDTO)\\n431| an existing plan to achieve the goal. A plan consists of one to 3 tasks.\nIf plan is created, you should track the progress and update the plan accordingly, such as Plan.finish_current_task, Plan.append_task, Plan.reset_task, Plan.replace_task, etc.\nWhen presented a current task, tackle the task using the available commands.\nPay close attention to new user message, review the conversation history, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to respond to new user requirement.\nNote:\n1. If you keeping encountering errors, unexpected situation, or you are not sure of proceeding, use RoleZero.ask_human to ask for help.\n2. Carefully review your progress at the current task, if your actions so far has not fulfilled the task instruction, you should continue with current task. Otherwise, finish current task by Plan.finish_current_task explicitly.\n3. Each time you finish a task, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to report your progress.\n4. Don\'t forget to append task first when all existing tasks are finished and new tasks are required.\n5. Avoid repeating tasks you have already completed. And end loop when all requirements are met.\nYou are an autonomous programmer\n\nThe special interface consists of a file editor that shows you 100 lines of a file at a time.\n\nYou can use terminal commands (e.g., cat, ls, cd) by calling Terminal.run_command.\n\nYou should carefully observe the behavior and results of the previous action, and avoid triggering repeated errors.\n\nIn addition to the terminal, I also provide additional tools. \n\nIf provided an issue link, you first action must be navigate to the issue page using Browser tool to understand the issue.\n\nYour must check if the repository exists at the current path. If it exists, navigate to the repository path. If the repository doesn\'t exist, please download it and then navigate to it.\nAll subsequent actions must be performed within this repository path. Do not leave this directory to execute any actions at any time.\n\nNote:\n\n1. If you open a file and need to get to an area around a specific line that is not in the first 100 lines, say line 583, don\'t just use the scroll_down command multiple times. Instead, use the Editor.goto_line command. It\'s much quicker. \n2. Always make sure to look at the currently open file and the current working directory (which appears right after the currently open file). The currently open file might be in a different directory than the working directory! Note that some commands, such as \'create\', open files, so they might change the current open file.\n3. When using Editor.edit_file_by_replace, if there is no exact match, take the difference in indentation into consideration.\n4. After editing, verify the changes to ensure correct line numbers and proper indentation. Adhere to PEP8 standards for Python code.\n5. NOTE ABOUT THE EDIT COMMAND: Indentation really matters! When editing a file, make sure to insert appropriate indentation before each line! Ensuring the code adheres to PEP8 standards. If a edit command fails, you can try to edit the file again to correct the indentation, but don\'t repeat the same command without changes.\n6. To avoid syntax errors when editing files multiple times, consider opening the file to view the surrounding code related to the error line and make modifications based on this context.\n7. Ensure to observe the currently open file and the current working directory, which is displayed right after the open file. The open file might be in a different directory than the working directory. Remember, commands like \'create\' open files and might alter the current open file.\n8. Effectively using Use search commands (`search_dir`, `search_file`, `find_file`) and navigation commands (`open_file`, `goto_line`) to locate and modify files efficiently. The Editor tool can fully satisfy the requirements. Follow these steps and considerations for optimal results:\n\n9. When the edit fails, try to enlarge the range of code.\n10. You must use the Editor.open_file command to open a file before using the Editor tool\'s edit command to modify it. When you open a file, any currently open file will be automatically closed.\n11. Remember, when you use Editor.insert_content_at_line or Editor.edit_file_by_replace, the line numbers will change after the operation. Therefore, if there are multiple operations, perform only the first operation in the current response, and defer the subsequent operations to the next turn.\n11.1 Do not use Editor.insert_content_at_line or Editor.edit_file_by_replace more than once per command list.\n12. If you choose Editor.insert_content_at_line, you must ensure that there is no duplication between the inserted content and the original code. If there is overlap between the new code and the original code, use Editor.edit_file_by_replace instead.\n13. If you choose Editor.edit_file_by_replace, the original code that needs to be replaced must start at the beginning of the line and end at the end of the line\n14. When not specified, you should write files in a folder named "{project_name}_1766886630". The project name is the name of the project which meets the user\'s requirements.\n15. When provided system design or project schedule, you MUST read them first before making a plan, then adhere to them in your implementation, especially in the programming language, package, or framework. You MUST implement all code files prescribed in the system design or project schedule.\n16. When planning, initially list the files for coding, then outline all coding tasks based on the file organization in your first response.\n17. If you plan to read a file, do not include other plans in the same response.\n18. Write only one code file each time and provide its full implementation.\n19. When the requirement is simple, you don\'t need to create a plan, just do it right away.\n20. When using the editor, pay attention to current directory. When you use editor tools, the paths must be either absolute or relative to the editor\'s current directory.\n21. When planning, consider whether images are needed. If you are developing a showcase website, start by using ImageGetter.get_image to obtain the necessary images.\n22. When planning, merge multiple tasks that operate on the same file into a single task. For example, create one task for writing unit tests for all functions in a class. Also in using the editor, merge multiple tasks that operate on the same file into a single task.\n23. When create unit tests for a code file, use Editor.read() to read the code file before planing. TouristController\\n324|    participant TS as TouristServiceImpl\\n325|    participant VS as ValidationServiceImpl\\n326|    participant TV as TouristValidator\\n327|    participant EV as EmailValidator\\n328|    participant REPO as TouristRepository\\n329|    participant AUDIT as AuditService\\n330|    participant ECON as ETOURConnectionService\\n331|    participant DTO as TouristDTO\\n332|    participant EX as ExceptionHandler\\n333|    \\n334|    %% 步骤1：从SearchTourist结果中选择游客\\n335|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤1：旅行社操作员从列表选择游客\\n336|    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists?searchTerm="..."\\n337|    TC->>TS: searchTourists(searchTerm)\\n338|    TS->>REPO: findBySearchTerm(searchTerm)\\n339|    REPO-->>TS: List~Tourist~\\n340|    TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n341|    DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n342|    TS-->>TC: List~TouristDTO~\\n343|    TC-->>FE: JSON响应（游客列表）\\n344|    \\n345|    %% 步骤2：加载选中游客数据并显示在可编辑表单\\n346|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤2：加载选中游客数据\\n347|    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists/{id}\\n348|    TC->>TS: getTouristById(id)\\n349|    TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n350|    alt 游客存在\\n351|        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n352|        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n353|        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n354|        TS-->>TC: TouristDTO\\n355|        TC-->>FE: 游客详细信息\\n356|    else 游客不存在\\n357|        REPO-->>TS: Optional.empty()\\n358|        TS-->>EX: throw TouristNotFoundException\\n359|        EX-->>FE: 404错误响应\\n360|    end\\n361|    \\n362|    %% 步骤3：编辑表单字段并提交\\n363|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤3：编辑并提交修改\\n364|    FE->>TC: PUT /api/tourists/{id}\\n365|    TC->>TS: updateTourist(id, request, operatorId)\\n366|    \\n367|    %% 步骤4：验证信息（如果不完整则触发Errored用例）\\n368|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤4：验证信息\\n369|    TS->>VS: validateTouristData(request)\\n370|    VS->>TV: validate(request)\\n371|    TV->>VS: ValidationResult\\n372|    VS->>EV: isEmailValid(request.email)\\n373|    EV-->>VS: boolean\\n374|    \\n375|    alt 验证失败\\n376|        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (invalid)\\n377|        TS-->>EX: throw ValidationException\\n378|        EX-->>FE: 400验证错误响应\\n379|        Note over FE,EX: 激活Errored用例\\n380|        FE->>TC: 显示错误信息并要求重新输入\\n381|    else 验证成功\\n382|        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (valid)\\n383|        \\n384|        %% 检查ETOUR连接\\n385|        TS->>ECON: connectToETOUR()\\n386|        alt 连接中断\\n387|            ECON-->>TS: false (connection failed)\\n388|            TS->>ECON: retryConnection(3)\\n389|            alt 重试成功\\n390|                ECON-->>TS: true\\n391|            else 重试失败\\n392|                ECON-->>TS: false\\n393|                TS-->>EX: throw ETourConnectionException\\n394|                EX-->>FE: 503服务不可用\\n395|                Note over FE,EX: 中断连接处理\\n396|                break\\n397|            end\\n398|        else 连接正常\\n399|            ECON-->>TS: true\\n400|        end\\n401|        \\n402|        %% 数据验证和审计记录\\n403|        TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n404|        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n405|        TS->>AUDIT: createPreUpdateAuditLog(tourist, operatorId)\\n406|        AUDIT-->>TS: AuditLog\\n407|        \\n408|        %% 更新游客数据\\n409|        TS->>TS: tourist.updateFrom(request)\\n410|        TS->>REPO: save(tourist)\\n411|        REPO-->>TS: 更新的Tourist\\n412|        \\n413|        %% 步骤5：确认操作\\n414|        Note over FE,EX: 步骤5：请求操作确认\\n415|        TS->>TC: TouristResponse (needs confirmation, auditLogId)\\n416|        TC-->>FE: 响应（需要确认，包含auditLogId）\\n417|        \\n418|        %% 用户确认操作\\n419|        FE->>TC: POST /api/tourists/{id}/confirm/{auditLogId}\\n420|        TC->>TS: confirmUpdate(touristId, auditLogId, operatorId)\\n421|        \\n422|        %% 步骤6：存储修改后的数据\\n423|        Note over FE,EX: 步骤6：存储修改的数据\\n424|        TS->>AUDIT: confirmAuditLog(auditLogId)\\n425|        TS->>ECON: sendDataToETOUR(updatedTourist)\\n426|        ECON-->>TS: boolean (success)\\n427|        \\n428|        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(updatedTourist)\\n429|        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n430|        TS->>TC: TouristResponse.success(touristDTO)\\n431|        TC-->>FE: 成功响应（更新后的游客数据）\\n432|        \\n433|        %% 退出条件：系统报告更新信息\\n434|        Note over FE,EX: 退出：系统报告更新后的游客账户信息\\n435|        FE->>FE: 显示成功消息和更新后的账户详情\\n436|    end\\n437|```\\n438|\\n439|## Anything UNCLEAR\\n440|\\n441|1. **ETOUR服务器接口规格**：不清楚ETOUR服务器API的具体格式、认证方式和数据格式要求。需要进一步明确接口规范才能实现完整的集成。\\n442|\\n443|2. **搜索功能依赖**\''}, {'role': 'assistant', 'content': 'Based on the system design }\\n262|    \\n263|    class ValidationResult {\\n264|        +Boolean isValid\\n265|        +List~String~ errors\\n266|        +Boolean hasErrors() boolean\\n267|        +void addError(String error) TouristController\\n324|    participant TS as TouristServiceImpl\\n325|    participant VS as ValidationServiceImpl\\n326|    participant TV as TouristValidator\\n327|    participant EV as EmailValidator\\n328|    participant REPO as TouristRepository\\n329|    participant AUDIT as AuditService\\n330|    participant ECON as ETOURConnectionService\\n331|    participant DTO as TouristDTO\\n332|    participant EX as ExceptionHandler\\n333|    \\n334|    %% 步骤1：从SearchTourist结果中选择游客\\n335|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤1：旅行社操作员从列表选择游客\\n336|    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists?searchTerm="..."\\n337|    TC->>TS: searchTourists(searchTerm)\\n338|    TS->>REPO: findBySearchTerm(searchTerm)\\n339|    REPO-->>TS: List~Tourist~\\n340|    TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n341|    DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n342|    TS-->>TC: List~TouristDTO~\\n343|    TC-->>FE: JSON响应（游客列表）\\n344|    \\n345|    %% 步骤2：加载选中游客数据并显示在可编辑表单\\n346|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤2：加载选中游客数据\\n347|    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists/{id}\\n348|    TC->>TS: getTouristById(id)\\n349|    TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n350|    alt 游客存在\\n351|        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n352|        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n353|        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n354|        TS-->>TC: TouristDTO\\n355|        TC-->>FE: 游客详细信息\\n356|    else 游客不存在\\n357|        REPO-->>TS: Optional.empty()\\n358|        TS-->>EX: throw TouristNotFoundException\\n359|        EX-->>FE: 404错误响应\\n360|    end\\n361|    \\n362|    %% 步骤3：编辑表单字段并提交\\n363|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤3：编辑并提交修改\\n364|    FE->>TC: PUT /api/tourists/{id}\\n365|    TC->>TS: updateTourist(id, request, operatorId)\\n366|    \\n367|    %% 步骤4：验证信息（如果不完整则触发Errored用例）\\n368|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤4：验证信息\\n369|    TS->>VS: validateTouristData(request)\\n370|    VS->>TV: validate(request)\\n371|    TV->>VS: ValidationResult\\n372|    VS->>EV: isEmailValid(request.email)\\n373|    EV-->>VS: boolean\\n374|    \\n375|    alt 验证失败\\n376|        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (invalid)\\n377|        TS-->>EX: throw ValidationException\\n378|        EX-->>FE: 400验证错误响应\\n379|        Note over FE,EX: 激活Errored用例\\n380|        FE->>TC: 显示错误信息并要求重新输入\\n381|    else 验证成功\\n382|        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (valid)\\n383|        \\n384|        %% 检查ETOUR连接\\n385|        TS->>ECON: connectToETOUR()\\n386|        alt 连接中断\\n387|            ECON-->>TS: false (connection failed)\\n388|            TS->>ECON: retryConnection(3)\\n389|            alt 重试成功\\n390|                ECON-->>TS: true\\n391|            else 重试失败\\n392|                ECON-->>TS: false\\n393|                TS-->>EX: throw ETourConnectionException\\n394|                EX-->>FE: 503服务不可用\\n395|                Note over FE,EX: 中断连接处理\\n396|                break\\n397|            end\\n398|        else 连接正常\\n399|            ECON-->>TS: true\\n400|        end\\n401|        \\n402|        %% 数据验证和审计记录\\n403|        TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n404|        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n405|        TS->>AUDIT: createPreUpdateAuditLog(tourist, operatorId)\\n406|        AUDIT-->>TS: AuditLog\\n407|        \\n408|        %% 更新游客数据\\n409|        TS->>TS: tourist.updateFrom(request)\\n410|        TS->>REPO: save(tourist)\\n411|        REPO-->>TS: 更新的Tourist\\n412|        \\n413|        %% 步骤5：确认操作\\n414|        Note over FE,EX: 步骤5：请求操作确认\\n415|        TS->>TC: TouristResponse (needs confirmation, auditLogId)\\n416|        TC-->>FE: 响应（需要确认，包含auditLogId）\\n417|        \\n418|        %% 用户确认操作\\n419|        FE->>TC: POST /api/tourists/{id}/confirm/{auditLogId}\\n420|        TC->>TS: confirmUpdate(touristId, auditLogId, operatorId)\\n421|        \\n422|        %% 步骤6：存储修改后的数据\\n423|        Note over FE,EX: 步骤6：存储修改的数据\\n424|        TS->>AUDIT: confirmAuditLog(auditLogId)\\n425|        TS->>ECON: sendDataToETOUR(updatedTourist)\\n426|        ECON-->>TS: boolean (success)\\n427|        \\n428|        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(updatedTourist)\\n429|        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n430|        TS->>TC: TouristResponse.success(touristDTO)\\n431|        TC-->>FE: 成功响应（更新后的游客数据）\\n432|        \\n433|        %% 退出条件：系统报告更新信息\\n434|        Note over FE,EX: 退出：系统报告更新后的游客账户信息\\n435|        FE->>FE: 显示成功消息和更新后的账户详情\\n436|    end\\n437|```\\n438|\\n439|## Anything UNCLEAR\\n440|\\n441|1. **ETOUR服务器接口规格**：不清楚ETOUR服务器API的具体格式、认证方式和数据格式要求。需要进一步明确接口规范才能实现完整的集成。\\n442|\\n443|2. **搜索功能依赖**\''}, {'role': 'assistant', 'content': 'Based on the system design }\\n262|    \\n263|    class ValidationResult {\\n264|        +Boolean isValid\\n265|        +List~String~ errors\\n266|        +Boolean hasErrors() boolean\\n267|        +void addError(String error) TouristController\\n324|    participant TS as TouristServiceImpl\\n325|    participant VS as ValidationServiceImpl\\n326|    participant TV as TouristValidator\\n327|    participant EV as EmailValidator\\n328|    participant REPO as TouristRepository\\n329|    participant AUDIT as AuditService\\n330|    participant ECON as ETOURConnectionService\\n331|    participant DTO as TouristDTO\\n332|    participant EX as ExceptionHandler\\n333|    \\n334|    %% 步骤1：从SearchTourist结果中选择游客\\n335|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤1：旅行社操作员从列表选择游客\\n336|    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists?searchTerm="..."\\n337|    TC->>TS: searchTourists(searchTerm)\\n338|    TS->>REPO: findBySearchTerm(searchTerm)\\n339|    REPO-->>TS: List~Tourist~\\n340|    TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n341|    DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n342|    TS-->>TC: List~TouristDTO~\\n343|    TC-->>FE: JSON响应（游客列表）\\n344|    \\n345|    %% 步骤2：加载选中游客数据并显示在可编辑表单\\n346|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤2：加载选中游客数据\\n347|    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists/{id}\\n348|    TC->>TS: getTouristById(id)\\n349|    TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n350|    alt 游客存在\\n351|        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n352|        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n353|        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n354|        TS-->>TC: TouristDTO\\n355|        TC-->>FE: 游客详细信息\\n356|    else 游客不存在\\n357|        REPO-->>TS: Optional.empty()\\n358|        TS-->>EX: throw TouristNotFoundException\\n359|        EX-->>FE: 404错误响应\\n360|    end\\n361|    \\n362|    %% 步骤3：编辑表单字段并提交\\n363|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤3：编辑并提交修改\\n364|    FE->>TC: PUT /api/tourists/{id}\\n365|    TC->>TS: updateTourist(id, request, operatorId)\\n366|    \\n367|    %% 步骤4：验证信息（如果不完整则触发Errored用例）\\n368|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤4：验证信息\\n369|    TS->>VS: validateTouristData(request)\\n370|    VS->>TV: validate(request)\\n371|    TV->>VS: ValidationResult\\n372|    VS->>EV: isEmailValid(request.email)\\n373|    EV-->>VS: boolean\\n374|    \\n375|    alt 验证失败\\n376|        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (invalid)\\n377|        TS-->>EX: throw ValidationException\\n378|        EX-->>FE: 400验证错误响应\\n379|        Note over FE,EX: 激活Errored用例\\n380|        FE->>TC: 显示错误信息并要求重新输入\\n381|    else 验证成功\\n382|        VS-->>TS: ValidationResult (valid)\\n383|        \\n384|        %% 检查ETOUR连接\\n385|        TS->>ECON: connectToETOUR()\\n386|        alt 连接中断\\n387|            ECON-->>TS: false (connection failed)\\n388|            TS->>ECON: retryConnection(3)\\n389|            alt 重试成功\\n390|                ECON-->>TS: true\\n391|            else 重试失败\\n392|                ECON-->>TS: false\\n393|                TS-->>EX: throw ETourConnectionException\\n394|                EX-->>FE: 503服务不可用\\n395|                Note over FE,EX: 中断连接处理\\n396|                break\\n397|            end\\n398|        else 连接正常\\n399|            ECON-->>TS: true\\n400|        end\\n401|        \\n402|        %% 数据验证和审计记录\\n403|        TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n404|        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n405|        TS->>AUDIT: createPreUpdateAuditLog(tourist, operatorId)\\n406|        AUDIT-->>TS: AuditLog\\n407|        \\n408|        %% 更新游客数据\\n409|        TS->>TS: tourist.updateFrom(request)\\n410|        TS->>REPO: save(tourist)\\n411|        REPO-->>TS: 更新的Tourist\\n412|        \\n413|        %% 步骤5：确认操作\\n414|        Note over FE,EX: 步骤5：请求操作确认\\n415|        TS->>TC: TouristResponse (needs confirmation, auditLogId)\\n416|        TC-->>FE: 响应（需要确认，包含auditLogId）\\n417|        \\n418|        %% 用户确认操作\\n419|        FE->>TC: POST /api/tourists/{id}/confirm/{auditLogId}\\n420|        TC->>TS: confirmUpdate(touristId, auditLogId, operatorId)\\n421|        \\n422|        %% 步骤6：存储修改后的数据\\n423|        Note over FE,EX: 步骤6：存储修改的数据\\n424|        TS->>AUDIT: confirmAuditLog(auditLogId)\\n425|        TS->>ECON: sendDataToETOUR(updatedTourist)\\n426|        ECON-->>TS: boolean (success)\\n427|        \\n428|        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(updatedTourist)\\n429|        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n430|        TS->>TC: TouristResponse.success(touristDTO)\\n431|        TC-->>FE: 成功响应（更新后的游客数据）\\n432|        \\n433|        %% 退出条件：系统报告更新信息\\n434|        Note over FE,EX: 退出：系统报告更新后的游客账户信息\\n435|        FE->>FE: 显示成功消息和更新后的账户详情\\n436|    end\\n437|```\\n438|\\n439|## lombok.NoArgsConstructor;\nimport org.hibernate.annotations.CreationTimestamp;\nimport org.hibernate.annotations.UpdateTimestamp;\n\nimport java.time.LocalDate;\nimport java.time.LocalDateTime;\n\n/**\n * Entity class representing a Tourist account in the system.\n * Maps to the \'tourists\' table in the database.\n * Implements optimistic locking through @Version annotation.\n */\n@Entity\n@Table(name = "tourists")\n@Data\n@Builder\n@NoArgsConstructor\n@AllArgsConstructor\npublic class Tourist {\n    \n    @Id\n    @GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.IDENTITY)\n    private Long id;\n    \n    @Column(name = "first_name", nullable = false, length = 100)\n    private String firstName;\n    \n    @Column(name = "last_name", nullable = false, length = 100)\n    private String lastName;\n    \n    @Column(name = "email", nullable = false, unique = true, length = 255)\n    private String email;\n    \n    @Column(name = "phone_number", length = 20)\n    private String phoneNumber;\n    \n    @Column(name = "date_of_birth")\n    private LocalDate dateOfBirth;\n    \n    @Embedded\n    private Address address;\n    \n    @Column(name = "nationality", length = 100)\n    private String nationality;\n    \n    @Column(name = "passport_number", unique = true, length = 50)\n    private String passportNumber;\n    \n    @CreationTimestamp\n    @Column(name = "created_at", updatable = false)\n    private LocalDateTime createdAt;\n    \n    @UpdateTimestamp\n    @Column(name = "updated_at")\n    private LocalDateTime updatedAt;\n    \n    @Version\n    @Column(name = "version")\n    private Integer version;\n    \n    @Column(name = "is_active")\n    private Boolean active;\n    \n    /**\n     * Returns the full name of the tourist by concatenating first and last name.\n     * \n     * @return Full name as "firstName lastName"\n     */\n    public String getFullName() {\n        return firstName + " " + lastName;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Updates the tourist entity with data from the update request.\n     * Only updates fields that are not null in the request.\n     * \n     * @param request The update request containing new values\n     */\n    public void updateFrom(TouristUpdateRequest request) {\n        if (request.getFirstName() != null) {\n            this.firstName = request.getFirstName();\n        }\n        if (request.getLastName() != null) {\n            this.lastName = request.getLastName();\n        }\n        if (request.getEmail() != null) {\n            this.email = request.getEmail();\n        }\n        if (request.getPhoneNumber() != null) {\n            this.phoneNumber = request.getPhoneNumber();\n        }\n        if (request.getDateOfBirth() != null) {\n            this.dateOfBirth = request.getDateOfBirth();\n        }\n        if (request.getAddress() != null) {\n            this.address = request.getAddress();\n        }\n        if (request.getNationality() != null) {\n            this.nationality = request.getNationality();\n        }\n        if (request.getPassportNumber() != null) {\n            this.passportNumber = request.getPassportNumber();\n        }\n        this.updatedAt = LocalDateTime.now();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Validates the tourist entity for business rules.\n     * \n     * @return true if the tourist data is valid, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean validate() {\n        // Basic validation rules\n        if (firstName == null || firstName.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        if (lastName == null || lastName.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        if (email == null || email.trim().isEmpty() || !email.contains("@")) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        // Date of birth should not be in the future\n        if (dateOfBirth != null && dateOfBirth.isAfter(LocalDate.now())) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        // Active status should not be null\n        if (active == null) {\n            this.active = true; // Default to active\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n Replace lines from start_line to end_line (inclusive) with the new_content in the open file. All of the new_content will be entered, so makesure your indentation is formatted properly. The new_content must be a complete block of code. Example 1: Given a file \\"/workspace/example.txt\\" with the following content: ``` 001|contain f 002|contain g 003|contain h 004|contain i ``` EDITING: If you want to replace line 2 and line 3 edit_file_by_replace( \\"/workspace/example.txt\\", first_replaced_line_number=2, first_replaced_line_content=\\"contain g\\", last_replaced_line_number=3, last_replaced_line_content=\\"contain h\\", new_content=\\"new content\\", ) This will replace the second line 2 and line 3 with \\"new content\\". The resulting file will be: ``` 001|contain f 002|new content 003|contain i ``` Example 2: Given a file \\"/workspace/example.txt\\" with the following content: ``` 001|contain f 002|contain g 003|contain h 004|contain i ``` EDITING: If you want to remove the line 2 and line 3. edit_file_by_replace( \\"/workspace/example.txt\\", first_replaced_line_number=2, first_replaced_line_content=\\"contain g\\", last_replaced_line_number=3, last_replaced_line_content=\\"contain h\\", new_content=\\"\\", ) This will remove line 2 and line 3. The resulting file will be: ``` 001|contain f 002| 003|contain i ``` ", "signature": "(self, file_name: str, first_replaced_line_number: int, first_replaced_line_content: str, last_replaced_line_number: int, last_replaced_line_content: str, new_content: str) -> str", "parameters": "Args: file_name (str): The name of the file to edit. first_replaced_line_number (int): The line number to start the edit at, starting from 1. first_replaced_line_content (str): The content of the start replace line, according to the first_replaced_line_number. last_replaced_line_number (int): The line number to end the edit at (inclusive), starting from 1. last_replaced_line_content (str): The content of the end replace line, according to the last_replaced_line_number. new_content (str): The text to replace the current selection with, must conform to PEP8 standards. The content in the start line and end line will also be replaced."}, "find_file": {"type": "function", "description": "Finds all files with the given name in the specified directory. That is, the new content will start at the beginning of the specified line, and the existing content of that line will be moved down. This operation will NOT modify the content of the lines before or after the given line number. This function can not insert content the end of the file. Please use append_file instead, For example, if the file has the following content: ``` 001|contain g 002|contain h 003|contain i 004|contain j ``` and you call insert_content_at_line( file_name=\'file.txt\', line_number=2, insert_content=\'new line\' ) the file will be updated to: ``` 001|contain g 002|new line 003|contain h 004|contain i 005|contain j ``` ", "signature": "(self, file_name: str, line_number: int, insert_content: str) -> str", "parameters": "Args: file_name: (str): The name of the file to edit. line_number (int): The line number (starting from 1) to insert the content after. an existing plan to achieve the goal. A plan consists of one to 3 tasks.\nIf plan is created, you should track the progress and update the plan accordingly, such as Plan.finish_current_task, Plan.append_task, Plan.reset_task, Plan.replace_task, etc.\nWhen presented a current task, tackle the task using the available commands.\nPay close attention to new user message, review the conversation history, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to respond to new user requirement.\nNote:\n1. If you keeping encountering errors, unexpected situation, or you are not sure of proceeding, use RoleZero.ask_human to ask for help.\n2. Carefully review your progress at the current task, if your actions so far has not fulfilled the task instruction, you should continue with current task. Otherwise, finish current task by Plan.finish_current_task explicitly.\n3. Each time you finish a task, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to report your progress.\n4. Don\'t forget to append task first when all existing tasks are finished and new tasks are required.\n5. Avoid repeating tasks you have already completed. TouristController\\n324|    participant TS as TouristServiceImpl\\n325|    participant VS as ValidationServiceImpl\\n326|    participant TV as TouristValidator\\n327|    participant EV as EmailValidator\\n328|    participant REPO as TouristRepository\\n329|    participant AUDIT as AuditService\\n330|    participant ECON as ETOURConnectionService\\n331|    participant DTO as TouristDTO\\n332|    participant EX as ExceptionHandler\\n333|    \\n334|    %% 步骤1：从SearchTourist结果中选择游客\\n335|    Note over FE,EX: 步骤1：旅行社操作员从列表选择游客\\n336|    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists?searchTerm="..."\\n337|    TC->>TS: searchTourists(searchTerm)\\n338|    TS->>REPO: findBySearchTerm(searchTerm)\\n339|    REPO-->>TS: List~Tourist~\\n340|    TS->>DTO: FE,EX: 步骤2：加载选中游客数据\\n347|    FE->>TC: GET /api/tourists/{id}\\n348|    TC->>TS: getTouristById(id)\\n349|    TS->>REPO: findById(id)\\n350|    alt 游客存在\\n351|        REPO-->>TS: Optional~Tourist~\\n352|        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(tourist)\\n353|        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n354|        TS-->>TC: TouristDTO\\n355|        TC-->>FE: 游客详细信息\\n356|    else 游客不存在\\n357|        REPO-->>TS: Optional.empty()\\n358|        TS-->>EX: throw TouristNotFoundException\\n359|        EX-->>FE: 404错误响应\\n360|    end\\n361|    \\n362|    %% 步骤3：编辑表单字段并提交\\n363| (success)\\n427|        \\n428|        TS->>DTO: TouristDTO.fromEntity(updatedTourist)\\n429|        DTO-->>TS: TouristDTO\\n430|        TS->>TC: TouristResponse.success(touristDTO)\\n431| */\n@Embeddable\n@Data\n@Builder\n@NoArgsConstructor\n@AllArgsConstructor\npublic class Address {\n    \n    @Column(name = "street", length = 255)\n    private String street;\n    \n    @Column(name private String firstName;\n    \n    @Column(name = "last_name", length = 100)\n    private String lastName;\n    \n    @Column(name = "role", nullable = false, length = 50)\n    private String = "created_at", updatable = false)\n    private LocalDateTime createdAt;\n    \n    @UpdateTimestamp\n    @Column(name = "updated_at")\n    private LocalDateTime updatedAt;\n    \n    @ElementCollection\n    @CollectionTable(name = "operator_permissions", joinColumns = @JoinColumn(name = "operator_id"))\n    @Column(name = "permission")\n    @Builder.Default\n    private Set<String> permissions = new HashSet<>();\n    \n    /**\n     * Authenticates the operator by checking the provided password.\n     * Uses BCrypt for secure password hashing and comparison.\n     * \n     * @param password The plain text password to check\n     * @return true if authentication succeeds, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean authenticate(String password) {\n        if (password == null || password.isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder = new BCryptPasswordEncoder();\n        return passwordEncoder.matches(password, this.passwordHash);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Sets the password with secure hashing.\n     * \n     * @param password The plain text password to hash and set\n     */\n    public void setPassword(String password) {\n        if (password == null || password.isEmpty()) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Password cannot be null or empty");\n        }\n        PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder = new BCryptPasswordEncoder();\n        this.passwordHash = passwordEncoder.encode(password);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Checks if the operator has a specific permission.\n     * \n     * @param permission The permission to check (e.g., "TOURIST_MODIFY", "TOURIST_VIEW")\n     * @return true if the operator has the permission, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean hasPermission(String permission) {\n        if (permission == null || permission.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        // Check specific permissions first\n        if (permissions.contains(permission)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        // Check role-based permissions\n        return hasRolePermission(permission);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Checks role-based permissions.\n     * ADMIN role has all permissions.\n     * \n     * @param permission The permission to check\n     * @return true if the role grants the permission\n     */\n    private boolean hasRolePermission(String permission) {\n        if ("ADMIN".equals(role)) {\n            return true; // Admin has all permissions\n        }\n        // Define role-based permission mappings\n        if ("AGENCY_MANAGER".equals(role)) {\n            return permission.startsWith("TOURIST_");\n        }\n        if ("AGENCY_OPERATOR".equals(role)) {\n            return "TOURIST_MODIFY".equals(permission) || \n                   "TOURIST_VIEW".equals(permission);\n        }\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Updates the last login timestamp.\n     */\n    public void updateLastLogin() {\n        this.lastLogin = LocalDateTime.now();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Returns the full name of the operator.\n     * \n     * @return Full name as "firstName lastName" or username if names are not set\n     */\n    public String getFullName() {\n        if (firstName != null && lastName != null) {\n            return firstName + " " + lastName;\n        } else if (firstName != null) {\n            return firstName;\n        } else if (lastName != null) {\n            return lastName;\n        }\n        return username;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Validates the operator entity.\n     * \n     * @return true if valid, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean validate() {\n        if (username == null || username.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        if (passwordHash == null || passwordHash.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        if (email == null || email.trim().isEmpty() || !email.contains("@")) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        if (role == null || role.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        if (active == null) {\n            this.active = true; // Default to active\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Pre-persist hook for validation and default values.\n     */\n    @PrePersist\n    public void prePersist() {\n        if (active == null) {\n            active = true;\n        }\n        validate();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Pre-update hook for validation.\n     */\n    @PreUpdate\n    public void preUpdate() {\n        validate();\n    }\n}'}}, {'command_name': 'Editor.create_file', 'args': {'filename': '/home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/tourist-account-system/src/main/java/com/etour/entity/AuditLog.java'}}]

Operator who can manage tourist accounts.\\n * Maps to the \'agency_operators\' table in the database.\\n * Includes authentication and authorization functionality.\\n */\\n@Entity\\n@Table(name = \\"agency_operators\\")\\n@Data\\n@Builder\\n@NoArgsConstructor\\n@AllArgsConstructor\\npublic class AgencyOperator {\\n    \\n    @Id\\n    @GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.IDENTITY)\\n nullable = false, length = 50)\\n    private String role;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"is_active\\")\\n    private Boolean active;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"last_login\\")\\n    private
