an existing plan to achieve the goal. A plan consists of one to 3 tasks.\nIf plan is created, you should track the progress and update the plan accordingly, such as Plan.finish_current_task, Plan.append_task, Plan.reset_task, Plan.replace_task, etc.\nWhen presented a current task, tackle the task using the available commands.\nPay close attention to new user message, review the conversation history, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to respond to new user requirement.\nNote:\n1. If you keeping encountering errors, unexpected situation, or you are not sure of proceeding, use RoleZero.ask_human to ask for help.\n2. Carefully review your progress at the current task, if your actions so far has not fulfilled the task instruction, you should continue with current task. Otherwise, finish current task by Plan.finish_current_task explicitly.\n3. Each time you finish a task, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to report your progress.\n4. Don\'t forget to append task first when all existing tasks are finished and new tasks are required.\n5. Avoid repeating tasks you have already completed.        }\\n            if (newValues != null && !newValues.isEmpty()) {\\n                newValuesJson = objectMapper.writeValueAsString(newValues);\\n            }\\n        } catch          return objectMapper.readValue(json, Map.class);\\n        } catch (Exception e) {\\n            // Return empty map if parsing fails\\n            return new HashMap<>();\\n        }\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if this audit log contains actual changes.\\n     * \\n     * @return true if oldValues and newValues are different, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    public boolean   "path": "/home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/tourist-account-system/src/main/java/com/etour/dto/ValidationErrorDTO.java",\n            "content": "package com.etour.dto;\\n\\nimport lombok.NoArgsConstructor;\\n\\nimport java.time.LocalDateTime;\\nimport java.util.ArrayList;\\nimport java.util.List;\\nimport java.util.Map;\\n\\n/**\\n * Data Transfer Object for validation errors.\\n * Used to provide detailed validation error information in API responses.\\n * Standardizes error response format across the application.\\n */\\n@Data\\n@Builder\\n@NoArgsConstructor\\n@AllArgsConstructor\\n@JsonInclude(JsonInclude.Include.NON_NULL)\\npublic class ValidationErrorDTO {\\n    \\n    /** Timestamp when the error occurred */\\n    @JsonFormat(pattern = \\"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss\\")\\n    private LocalDateTime timestamp;\\n    \\n    /** HTTP status code */\\n    private int status;\\n    \\n    /** Error type/name */\\n    private String error;\\n    \\n    /** Detailed error message */\\n    private String message;\\n    \\n    /** Request path that caused the error */\\n    private String path;\\n    \\n    /** List of field-specific validation errors */\\n    private List<FieldError> fieldErrors;\\n    \\n    /** Global validation errors (not tied to a specific field) */\\n    private List<String> globalErrors;\\n    \\n    /** Additional error details (context-specific) */\\n    private Map<String, Object> details;\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Inner class representing a field-specific validation error.\\n     */\\n    @Data\\n    @Builder\\n    @NoArgsConstructor\\n    @AllArgsConstructor\\n    public static class FieldError {\\n        /** Name of the field with the error */\\n        private String field;\\n        \\n        /** Rejected value (if available) */\\n        private Object rejectedValue;\\n        \\n        /** Error message */\\n        private String message;\\n        \\n        /** Error code/category */\\n        private String code;\\n        \\n        /**\\n         * Creates a formatted string representation of the field error.\\n         * \\n         * @return Formatted error string\\n         */\\n        public String getFormattedError() {\\n            String valueStr = rejectedValue != null ? rejectedValue.toString() : \\"null\\";\\n            return String.format(\\"Field \'%s\': %s (value: %s, code: %s)\\", \\n                    field, message, valueStr, code);\\n        }\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates a ValidationErrorDTO from field errors.\\n     * \\n     * @param fieldErrors List of field-specific errors\\n     * @param path The request path\\n     * @return ValidationErrorDTO instance\\n     */\\n    public static ValidationErrorDTO fromFieldErrors(List<FieldError> fieldErrors, String path) {\\n        return ValidationErrorDTO.builder()\\n                .timestamp(LocalDateTime.now())\\n                .status(400)\\n                .error(\\"Validation Failed\\")\\n                .message(\\"One or more validation errors occurred\\")\\n                .path(path)\\n                .fieldErrors(fieldErrors)\\n                .globalErrors(new ArrayList<>())\\n                .build();\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates a ValidationErrorDTO for a single field error.\\n     * \\n     * @param field The field with error\\n     * @param rejectedValue The rejected value\\n     * @param message Error message\\n     * @param path The request path\\n     * @return ValidationErrorDTO instance\\n     */\\n    public static ValidationErrorDTO createFieldError(String field, Object rejectedValue, \\n                                                      String message, String path) {\\n        FieldError fieldError = FieldError.builder()\\n                .field(field)\\n                .rejectedValue(rejectedValue)\\n                .message(message)\\n                .code(\\"VALIDATION_ERROR\\")\\n                .build();\\n        \\n        List<FieldError> fieldErrors = new ArrayList<>();\\n        fieldErrors.add(fieldError);\\n        \\n        return fromFieldErrors(fieldErrors, path);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates a ValidationErrorDTO for global errors.\\n     * \\n     * @param globalErrors List of global error messages\\n     * @param path The request path\\n     * @return ValidationErrorDTO instance\\n     */\\n    public static ValidationErrorDTO fromGlobalErrors(List<String> globalErrors, String path) {\\n        return ValidationErrorDTO.builder()\\n                .timestamp(LocalDateTime.now())\\n                .status(400)\\n                .error(\\"Validation Failed\\")\\n                .message(\\"One or more validation errors occurred\\")\\n                .path(path)\\n                .fieldErrors(new ArrayList<>())\\n                .globalErrors(globalErrors)\\n                .build();\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Adds a field error to this DTO.\\n     * \\n     * @param fieldError The field error to add\\n     */\\n    public void addFieldError(FieldError fieldError) {\\n        if (fieldErrors == null) {\\n            fieldErrors = new ArrayList<>();\\n        }\\n        fieldErrors.add(fieldError);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Adds a simple field error.\\n     * \\n     * @param field Field name\\n     * @param rejectedValue Rejected value\\n     * @param message Error message\\n     */\\n    public void addFieldError(String field, Object rejectedValue, String message) {\\n        FieldError fieldError = FieldError.builder()\\n                .field(field)\\n                .rejectedValue(rejectedValue)\\n                .message(message)\\n                .code(\\"VALIDATION_ERROR\\")\\n                .build();\\n        addFieldError(fieldError);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Adds a global error message.\\n     * \\n     * @param errorMessage Global error message\\n     */\\n    public void addGlobalError(String errorMessage) {\\n        if (globalErrors == null) {\\n            globalErrors = new ArrayList<>();\\n        }\\n        globalErrors.add(errorMessage);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if there are any validation errors.\\n     * \\n     * @return true if there are errors, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    public boolean hasErrors() {\\n        boolean hasFieldErrors = fieldErrors != null && !fieldErrors.isEmpty();\\n        boolean hasGlobalErrors = globalErrors != null && !globalErrors.isEmpty();\\n        return hasFieldErrors || hasGlobalErrors;\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Gets the total number of validation errors.\\n     * \\n     * @return Total error count\\n     */\\n    public int getErrorCount() {\\n        int fieldErrorCount = fieldErrors != null ? fieldErrors.size() : 0;\\n        int globalErrorCount = globalErrors != null ? globalErrors.size() : 0;\\n        return fieldErrorCount + globalErrorCount;\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates a formatted summary of all validation errors.\\n     * \\n     * @return Summary string\\n     */\\n    public String getErrorSummary() {\\n        StringBuilder summary = new StringBuilder();\\n        summary.append(\\"Validation failed with \\").append(getErrorCount()).append(\\" error(s):\\\\n\\");\\n        \\n        if (fieldErrors != null && !fieldErrors.isEmpty()) {\\n            summary.append(\\"Field errors:\\\\n\\");\\n            for (int i = 0; i < fieldErrors.size(); i++) {\\n                FieldError error = fieldErrors.get(i);\\n                summary.append(String.format(\\"  %d. %s\\\\n\\", i + 1, error.getFormattedError()));\\n            }\\n        }\\n        \\n        if (globalErrors != null && !globalErrors.isEmpty()) {\\n            summary.append(\\"Global errors:\\\\n\\");\\n            for (int i = 0; i < globalErrors.size(); i++) {\\n                String error = globalErrors.get(i);\\n                summary.append(String.format(\\"  %d. %s\\\\n\\", i + 1, error));\\n            }\\n        }\\n        \\n        return summary.toString();\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Converts this DTO to a TouristResponse for API consistency.\\n     * \\n     * @return TouristResponse with validation error details\\n     */\\n    public TouristResponse toTouristResponse() {\\n        return TouristResponse.validationError(this);\\n    }\\n}"\n        }\n    },\n    {\n        "command_name": "Plan.finish_current_task",\n        "args": {}\n class Address {\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"street\\", length = 255)\\n    private String street;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"city\\", length = 100)\\n    private String city;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"state\\", length = 100)\\n    private String state;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"postal_code\\", length = 20)\\n    private String postalCode;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"country\\", length = 100)\\n    private String country;\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Returns the complete formatted address.\\n     * \\n     * @return Full address string in standard format\\n     */\\n    public String getFullAddress() {\\n        StringBuilder addressBuilder = new StringBuilder();\\n        \\n        if (street != null && !street.trim().isEmpty()) {\\n            addressBuilder.append(street);\\n        }\\n        \\n        if (city != null && !city.trim().isEmpty()) {\\n            if (addressBuilder.length() > 0) {\\n                addressBuilder.append(\\", \\");\\n            }\\n            addressBuilder.append(city);\\n        }\\n        \\n        if (state != null && !state.trim().isEmpty()) {\\n            if (addressBuilder.length() > 0) {\\n                addressBuilder.append(\\", \\");\\n            }\\n            addressBuilder.append(state);\\n        }\\n        \\n        if (postalCode != null && !postalCode.trim().isEmpty()) {\\n            if (addressBuilder.length() > 0) {\\n                addressBuilder.append(\\" \\");\\n            }\\n addressBuilder.append(\\", \\");\\n            }\\n            addressBuilder.append(country);\\n        }\\n        \\n        return addressBuilder.toString();\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if the address is empty (all fields null or empty).\\n     * \\n     * @return true if address is empty, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    public boolean isEmpty() {\\n        return (street == postalCode.trim().isEmpty()) &&\\n               (country == null || country.trim().isEmpty());\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Validates the address for basic correctness.\\n     * \\n     * @return true if address is valid, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    public boolean isValid() {\\n        // At minimum, city and country should be provided\\n        if (city == null || city.trim().isEmpty()) {\\n            return false;\\n        }\\n        if (country == null || country.trim().isEmpty()) {\\n            return false;\\n        }\\n        return true;\\n }\\n        PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder = new BCryptPasswordEncoder();\\n        return passwordEncoder.matches(password, this.passwordHash);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Sets the password           return true;\\n        }\\n        // Check role-based permissions\\n        return hasRolePermission(permission);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks role-based permissions.\\n     * hasRolePermission(String permission) {\\n        if (\\"ADMIN\\".equals(role)) {\\n            return true; // Admin has all permissions\\n        }\\n        // Define role-based permission lombok.NoArgsConstructor;\\n\\nimport java.time.LocalDate;\\n\\n/**\\n * Data Transfer Object for updating Tourist accounts.\\n * All fields are optional to support partial updates.\\n * Used when an agency operator modifies tourist data.\\n */\\n@Data\\n@Builder\\n@NoArgsConstructor\\n@AllArgsConstructor\\n@JsonInclude(JsonInclude.Include.NON_NULL)\\npublic class TouristUpdateRequest {\\n    \\n    @Size(min = 1, max = 100, message = \\"First name must be between 1 and 100 characters\\")\\n    private String firstName;\\n    \\n    @Size(min = 1, max = 100, message = \\"Last name must be characters\\")\\n    private String email;\\n    \\n    @Pattern(regexp = \\"^\\\\\\\\+?[0-9\\\\\\\\-\\\\\\\\(\\\\\\\\)\\\\\\\\s]*$\\", message = \\"Phone number format is invalid\\")\\n    @Size(max = 20, message = \\"Phone number must not exceed 20 characters\\")\\n    private String phoneNumber;\\n    \\n    @JsonFormat(pattern = \\"yyyy-MM-dd\\")\\n    private LocalDate dateOfBirth;\\n    \\n    private Address address;\\n    \\n    @Size(max = 100, message = \\"Nationality must not exceed 100 characters\\")\\n    private String nationality;\\n    \\n    @Size(max = 50, message = \\"Passport number must not exceed 50 characters\\")\\n    private String passportNumber;\\n    \\n    private Boolean active;\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if this update request is empty (all fields are null).\\n     * \\n     * @return true if all fields are null, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    public boolean isEmpty() {\\n        return firstName == null &&\\n               lastName ==               passportNumber == null &&\\n               active == null;\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if this update request contains any changes for the given tourist.\\n     * \\n     * @param touristDTO The current tourist data to compare against\\n     * @return true if there are actual changes, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    public boolean hasChanges(TouristDTO touristDTO) {\\n        if (touristDTO == null) {\\n            return !isEmpty();\\n        }\\n        \\n        // Compare each field if it\'s specified in the request\\n        if (firstName != null && !firstName.equals(touristDTO.getFirstName())) {\\n            return true;\\n        }\\n        if (lastName != null && !lastName.equals(touristDTO.getLastName())) {\\n            return true;\\n        }\\n        if (email != null && !email.equals(touristDTO.getEmail())) {\\n            return true;\\n        }\\n        if (phoneNumber != null && !phoneNumber.equals(touristDTO.getPhoneNumber())) {\\n            return true;\\n        }\\n        if (dateOfBirth != null && !dateOfBirth.equals(touristDTO.getDateOfBirth())) {\\n            return true;\\n        }\\n        if (address != null) {\\n            Address currentAddress = touristDTO.getAddress();\\n            if (currentAddress == null || !address.equals(currentAddress)) {\\n                return true;\\n            }\\n        }\\n        if (nationality != null && !nationality.equals(touristDTO.getNationality())) {\\n            return true;\\n        }\\n        if globalErrors;\\n    \\n    /** Additional error details (context-specific) */\\n    private Map<String, Object> details;\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Inner class representing a field-specific validation error.\\n     */\\n    @Data\\n    @Builder\\n    @NoArgsConstructor\\n    @AllArgsConstructor\\n    public static class FieldError {\\n        /** Name of the field with the error */\\n      \\n        /** Error code/category */\\n        private String code;\\n        \\n        /**\\n         * Creates a formatted string representation of the field error.\\n         * \\n         * .fieldErrors(fieldErrors)\\n                .globalErrors(new ArrayList<>())\\n                .build();\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates a ValidationErrorDTO for a single field error.\\n             .code(\\"VALIDATION_ERROR\\")\\n                .build();\\n        \\n        List<FieldError> fieldErrors = new ArrayList<>();\\n        fieldErrors.add(fieldError);\\n        \\n more validation errors occurred\\")\\n                .path(path)\\n                .fieldErrors(new ArrayList<>())\\n                .globalErrors(globalErrors)\\n                .build();\\n    }\\n "package com.etour.repository;\\n\\nimport com.etour.entity.Tourist;\\nimport org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository;\\nimport org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.Query;\\nimport org.springframework.data.repository.query.Param;\\nimport org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;\\n\\nimport java.time.LocalDate;\\nimport java.util.List;\\nimport java.util.Optional;\\n\\n/**\\n * Repository interface for Tourist entity.\\n * Provides CRUD operations and custom queries for tourist data access.\\n * Extends JpaRepository to inherit standard Spring Data JPA functionality.\\n */\\n@Repository\\npublic interface TouristRepository extends JpaRepository<Tourist, Long> {\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Finds a tourist by email address.\\n     * \\n     * @param email Email address to search for\\n     * @return Optional containing Tourist if found\\n     */\\n    Optional<Tourist> findByEmail(String email);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Finds a tourist by passport number.\\n     * \\n     * @param passportNumber Passport number to search for\\n     * @return Optional containing Tourist if found\\n     */\\n    Optional<Tourist> findByPassportNumber(String passportNumber);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Finds tourists by active status.\\n     * \\n     * @param active Active status (true/false)\\n     * @return List of tourists with the specified active status\\n     */\\n    List<Tourist> findByActive(Boolean active);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Finds tourists by nationality.\\n     * \\n     * @param nationality Nationality to search for\\n     * @return List of tourists with the specified nationality\\n     */\\n    List<Tourist> findByNationality(String nationality);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Searches tourists by first name (case-insensitive partial match).\\n     * \\n     * @param firstName First name or partial first name to search for\\n     * @return List of matching tourists\\n     */\\n    List<Tourist> findByFirstNameContainingIgnoreCase(String firstName);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Searches tourists by last name (case-insensitive partial match).\\n     * \\n     * @param lastName Last name or partial last name to search for\\n     * @return List of matching tourists\\n     */\\n    List<Tourist> findByLastNameContainingIgnoreCase(String lastName);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Searches tourists by full name (first name + last name, case-insensitive).\\n     * \\n     * @param firstName First name or partial first name\\n     * @param lastName Last name or partial last name\\n     * @return List of matching tourists\\n     */\\n    List<Tourist> findByFirstNameContainingIgnoreCaseAndLastNameContainingIgnoreCase(\\n            String firstName, String lastName);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Finds tourists born before a specific date.\\n     * \\n     * @param date The cutoff date\\n     * @return List of tourists born before the specified date\\n     */\\n    List<Tourist> findByDateOfBirthBefore(LocalDate date);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Finds tourists born after a specific date.\\n     * \\n     * @param date The cutoff date\\n     * @return List of tourists born after the specified date\\n     */\\n    List<Tourist> findByDateOfBirthAfter(LocalDate date);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Complex search query combining multiple search criteria.\\n     * Used by the SearchTourist use case referenced in ModifyTouristAccountData.\\n     * All parameters are optional - null parameters are ignored in the query.\\n     * \\n     * @param firstName First name (partial match, case-insensitive)\\n     * @param lastName Last name (partial match, case-insensitive)\\n     * @param email Email (exact match)\\n     * @param nationality Nationality (exact match)\\n     * @param active Active status\\n     * @return List of matching tourists\\n     */\\n    @Query(\\"SELECT t FROM Tourist t WHERE \\" +\\n           \\"(:firstName IS NULL OR LOWER(t.firstName) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', :firstName, \'%\'))) AND \\" +\\n           \\"(:lastName IS NULL OR LOWER(t.lastName) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', :lastName, \'%\'))) AND \\" +\\n           \\"(:email IS NULL OR t.email = :email) AND \\" +\\n           \\"(:nationality IS NULL OR t.nationality = :nationality) AND \\" +\\n           \\"(:active IS NULL OR t.active = :active) \\" +\\n           \\"ORDER BY t.lastName, t.firstName\\")\\n    List<Tourist> searchTourists(\\n            @Param(\\"firstName\\") String firstName,\\n            @Param(\\"lastName\\") String lastName,\\n            @Param(\\"email\\") String email,\\n            @Param(\\"nationality\\") String nationality,\\n            @Param(\\"active\\") Boolean active);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if a tourist with the given email exists (excluding a specific tourist).\\n     * Used for validation during updates to ensure email uniqueness.\\n     * \\n     * @param email Email to check\\n     * @param id Tourist ID to exclude from the check\\n     * @return true if another tourist with the email exists, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    @Query(\\"SELECT COUNT(t) > 0 FROM Tourist t WHERE t.email = :email AND t.id != :id\\")\\n    boolean existsByEmailAndIdNot(@Param(\\"email\\") String email, @Param(\\"id\\") Long id);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if a tourist with the given passport number exists (excluding a specific tourist).\\n     * Used for validation during updates to ensure passport number uniqueness.\\n     * \\n     * @param passportNumber Passport number to check\\n     * @param id Tourist ID to exclude class Address {\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"street\\", length = 255)\\n    private String street;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"city\\", length = 100)\\n    private String city;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"state\\", length = 100)\\n    private String state;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"postal_code\\", length = 20)\\n    private String postalCode;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"country\\", length = 100)\\n    private String country;\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Returns the complete formatted address.\\n     * \\n     * @return Full address string in standard format\\n     */\\n    public String getFullAddress() {\\n        StringBuilder addressBuilder = new StringBuilder();\\n        \\n        if (street != null && !street.trim().isEmpty()) {\\n            addressBuilder.append(street);\\n        }\\n        \\n        if (city != null && !city.trim().isEmpty()) {\\n            if (addressBuilder.length() > 0) {\\n                addressBuilder.append(\\", \\");\\n            }\\n            addressBuilder.append(city);\\n        }\\n        \\n        if (state != null && !state.trim().isEmpty()) {\\n            if (addressBuilder.length() > 0) {\\n                addressBuilder.append(\\", \\");\\n            }\\n            addressBuilder.append(state);\\n        }\\n        \\n        if (postalCode != null && !postalCode.trim().isEmpty()) {\\n            if (addressBuilder.length() > 0) {\\n                addressBuilder.append(\\" \\");\\n            }\\n addressBuilder.append(\\", \\");\\n            }\\n            addressBuilder.append(country);\\n        }\\n        \\n        return addressBuilder.toString();\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if the address is empty (all fields null or empty).\\n     * \\n     * @return true if address is empty, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    public boolean isEmpty() {\\n        return (street == postalCode.trim().isEmpty()) &&\\n               (country == null || country.trim().isEmpty());\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Validates the address for basic correctness.\\n     * \\n     * @return true if address is valid, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    public boolean isValid() {\\n        // At minimum, city and country should be provided\\n        if (city == null || city.trim().isEmpty()) {\\n            return false;\\n        }\\n        if (country == null || country.trim().isEmpty()) {\\n            return false;\\n        }\\n        return true;\\n }\\n        PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder = new BCryptPasswordEncoder();\\n        return passwordEncoder.matches(password, this.passwordHash);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Sets the password           return true;\\n        }\\n        // Check role-based permissions\\n        return hasRolePermission(permission);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks role-based permissions.\\n     * hasRolePermission(String permission) {\\n        if (\\"ADMIN\\".equals(role)) {\\n            return true; // Admin has all permissions\\n        }\\n        // Define role-based permission lombok.NoArgsConstructor;\\n\\nimport java.time.LocalDate;\\n\\n/**\\n * Data Transfer Object for updating Tourist accounts.\\n * All fields are optional to support partial updates.\\n * Used when an agency operator modifies tourist data.\\n */\\n@Data\\n@Builder\\n@NoArgsConstructor\\n@AllArgsConstructor\\n@JsonInclude(JsonInclude.Include.NON_NULL)\\npublic class TouristUpdateRequest {\\n    \\n    @Size(min = 1, max = 100, message = \\"First name must be between 1 and 100 characters\\")\\n    private String firstName;\\n    \\n    @Size(min = 1, max = 100, message = \\"Last name must be characters\\")\\n    private String email;\\n    \\n    @Pattern(regexp = \\"^\\\\\\\\+?[0-9\\\\\\\\-\\\\\\\\(\\\\\\\\)\\\\\\\\s]*$\\", message = \\"Phone number format is invalid\\")\\n    @Size(max = 20, message = \\"Phone number must not exceed 20 characters\\")\\n    private String phoneNumber;\\n    \\n    @JsonFormat(pattern = \\"yyyy-MM-dd\\")\\n    private LocalDate dateOfBirth;\\n    \\n    private Address address;\\n    \\n    @Size(max = 100, message = \\"Nationality must not exceed 100 characters\\")\\n    private String nationality;\\n    \\n    @Size(max = 50, message = \\"Passport number must not exceed 50 characters\\")\\n    private String passportNumber;\\n    \\n    private Boolean active;\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if this update request is empty (all fields are null).\\n     * \\n     * @return true if all fields are null, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    public boolean isEmpty() {\\n        return firstName == null &&\\n               lastName ==               passportNumber == null &&\\n               active == null;\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if this update request contains any changes for the given tourist.\\n     * \\n     * @param touristDTO The current tourist data to compare against\\n     * @return true if there are actual changes, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    public boolean hasChanges(TouristDTO touristDTO) {\\n        if (touristDTO == null) {\\n            return !isEmpty();\\n        }\\n        \\n        // Compare each field if it\'s specified in the request\\n        if (firstName != null && !firstName.equals(touristDTO.getFirstName())) {\\n            return true;\\n        }\\n        if (lastName != null && !lastName.equals(touristDTO.getLastName())) {\\n            return true;\\n        }\\n        if (email != null && !email.equals(touristDTO.getEmail())) {\\n            return true;\\n        }\\n        if (phoneNumber != null && !phoneNumber.equals(touristDTO.getPhoneNumber())) {\\n            return true;\\n        }\\n        if (dateOfBirth != null && !dateOfBirth.equals(touristDTO.getDateOfBirth())) {\\n            return true;\\n        }\\n        if (address != null) {\\n            Address currentAddress = touristDTO.getAddress();\\n            if (currentAddress == null || !address.equals(currentAddress)) {\\n                return true;\\n            }\\n        }\\n        if (nationality != null && !nationality.equals(touristDTO.getNationality())) {\\n            return true;\\n        }\\n        if error.\\n     */\\n    @Data\\n    @Builder\\n    @NoArgsConstructor\\n    @AllArgsConstructor\\n    public static class FieldError {\\n        /** Name of the field with the error */\\n      \\n        /** Error code/category */\\n        private String code;\\n        \\n        /**\\n         * Creates a formatted string representation of the field error.\\n         * \\n         * "package com.etour.repository;\\n\\nimport com.etour.entity.Tourist;\\nimport org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository;\\nimport org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.Query;\\nimport org.springframework.data.repository.query.Param;\\nimport org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;\\n\\nimport java.time.LocalDate;\\nimport java.util.List;\\nimport java.util.Optional;\\n\\n/**\\n * Repository interface for Tourist entity.\\n * Provides CRUD operations and custom queries for tourist data access.\\n * Extends JpaRepository to inherit standard Spring Data JPA functionality.\\n */\\n@Repository\\npublic interface TouristRepository extends JpaRepository<Tourist, Long> {\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Finds a tourist by email address.\\n     * \\n     * @param email Email address to search for\\n     * @return Optional containing Tourist if found\\n     */\\n    Optional<Tourist> findByEmail(String email);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Finds a tourist by passport number.\\n     * \\n     * @param passportNumber Passport number to search for\\n     * @return Optional containing Tourist if found\\n     */\\n    Optional<Tourist> findByPassportNumber(String passportNumber);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Finds tourists by active status.\\n     * \\n     * @param active Active status (true/false)\\n     * @return List of tourists with the specified active status\\n     */\\n    List<Tourist> findByActive(Boolean active);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Finds tourists by nationality.\\n     * \\n     * @param nationality Nationality to search for\\n     * @return List of tourists with the specified nationality\\n     */\\n    List<Tourist> findByNationality(String nationality);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Searches tourists by first name (case-insensitive partial match).\\n     * \\n     * @param firstName First name or partial first name to search for\\n     * @return List of matching tourists\\n     */\\n    List<Tourist> findByFirstNameContainingIgnoreCase(String firstName);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Searches tourists by last name (case-insensitive partial match).\\n     * \\n     * @param lastName Last name or partial last name to search for\\n     * @return List of matching tourists\\n     */\\n    List<Tourist> findByLastNameContainingIgnoreCase(String lastName);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Searches tourists by full name (first name + last name, case-insensitive).\\n     * \\n     * @param firstName First name or partial first name\\n     * @param lastName Last name or partial last name\\n     * @return List of matching tourists\\n     */\\n    List<Tourist> findByFirstNameContainingIgnoreCaseAndLastNameContainingIgnoreCase(\\n            String firstName, String lastName);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Finds tourists born before a specific date.\\n     * \\n     * @param date The cutoff date\\n     * @return List of tourists born before the specified date\\n     */\\n    List<Tourist> findByDateOfBirthBefore(LocalDate date);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Finds tourists born after a specific date.\\n     * \\n     * @param date The cutoff date\\n     * @return List of tourists born after the specified date\\n     */\\n    List<Tourist> findByDateOfBirthAfter(LocalDate date);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Complex search query combining multiple search criteria.\\n     * Used by the SearchTourist use case referenced in ModifyTouristAccountData.\\n     * All parameters are optional - null parameters are ignored in the query.\\n     * \\n     * @param firstName First name (partial match, case-insensitive)\\n     * @param lastName Last name (partial match, case-insensitive)\\n     * @param email Email (exact match)\\n     * @param nationality Nationality (exact match)\\n     * @param active Active status\\n     * @return List of matching tourists\\n     */\\n    @Query(\\"SELECT t FROM Tourist t WHERE \\" +\\n           \\"(:firstName IS NULL OR LOWER(t.firstName) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', :firstName, \'%\'))) AND \\" +\\n           \\"(:lastName IS NULL OR LOWER(t.lastName) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', :lastName, \'%\'))) AND \\" +\\n           \\"(:email IS NULL OR t.email = :email) AND \\" +\\n           \\"(:nationality IS NULL OR t.nationality = :nationality) AND \\" +\\n           \\"(:active IS NULL OR t.active = :active) \\" +\\n           \\"ORDER BY t.lastName, t.firstName\\")\\n    List<Tourist> searchTourists(\\n            @Param(\\"firstName\\") String firstName,\\n            @Param(\\"lastName\\") String lastName,\\n            @Param(\\"email\\") String email,\\n            @Param(\\"nationality\\") String nationality,\\n            @Param(\\"active\\") Boolean active);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if a tourist with the given email exists (excluding a specific tourist).\\n     * Used for validation during updates to ensure email uniqueness.\\n     * \\n     * @param email Email to check\\n     * @param id Tourist ID to exclude from the check\\n     * @return true if another tourist with the email exists, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    @Query(\\"SELECT COUNT(t) > 0 FROM Tourist t WHERE t.email = :email AND t.id != :id\\")\\n    boolean existsByEmailAndIdNot(@Param(\\"email\\") String email, @Param(\\"id\\") Long id);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if a tourist with the given passport number exists (excluding a specific tourist).\\n     * Used for validation during updates to ensure passport number uniqueness.\\n     * \\n     * @param passportNumber Passport number to check\\n     * @param id Tourist ID to exclude from the check\\n     * @return true if another tourist with the passport number exists, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    @Query(\\"SELECT COUNT(t) > 0 FROM Tourist t WHERE t.passportNumber = The new_content must be a complete block of code. Example 1: Given a file \\"/workspace/example.txt\\" with the following content: ``` 001|contain f 002|contain g 003|contain h 004|contain i ``` EDITING: If you want to replace line 2 and line 3 edit_file_by_replace( \\"/workspace/example.txt\\", first_replaced_line_number=2, first_replaced_line_content=\\"contain g\\", last_replaced_line_number=3, last_replaced_line_content=\\"contain h\\", new_content=\\"new content\\", ) This will replace the second line 2 and line 3 with \\"new content\\". The resulting file will be: ``` 001|contain f 002|new content 003|contain i ``` Example 2: Given a file \\"/workspace/example.txt\\" with the following content: ``` 001|contain f 002|contain g 003|contain h 004|contain i ``` EDITING: If you want to remove the line 2 and line 3. edit_file_by_replace( \\"/workspace/example.txt\\", first_replaced_line_number=2, first_replaced_line_content=\\"contain g\\", last_replaced_line_number=3, last_replaced_line_content=\\"contain h\\", new_content=\\"\\", ) This will remove line 2 and line 3. The resulting file will be: ``` 001|contain f 002| 003|contain i ``` ", "signature": "(self, file_name: str, first_replaced_line_number: int, first_replaced_line_content: str, last_replaced_line_number: int, last_replaced_line_content: str, new_content: str) -> str", "parameters": "Args: file_name (str): The name of the file to edit. first_replaced_line_number (int): The line number to start the edit at, starting from 1. first_replaced_line_content (str): The content of the start replace line, according to the first_replaced_line_number. last_replaced_line_number (int): The line number to end the edit at (inclusive), starting from 1. last_replaced_line_content (str): The content of the end replace line, according to the last_replaced_line_number. new_content (str): The text to replace the current selection with, must conform to PEP8 standards. The content in the start line and end line will also be replaced."}, "find_file": {"type": "function", "description": "Finds all files with the given name in the specified directory. That is, the new content will start at the beginning of the specified line, and the existing content of that line will be moved down. This operation will NOT modify the content of the lines before or after the given line number. This function can not insert content the end of the file. Please use append_file instead, For example, if the file has the following content: ``` 001|contain g 002|contain h 003|contain i 004|contain j ``` and you call insert_content_at_line( file_name=\'file.txt\', line_number=2, insert_content=\'new line\' ) the file will be updated to: ``` 001|contain g 002|new line 003|contain h 004|contain i 005|contain j ``` ", "signature": "(self, file_name: str, line_number: int, insert_content: str) -> str", "parameters": "Args: file_name: (str): The name of the file to edit. line_number (int): The line number (starting from 1) to insert the content after. an existing plan to achieve the goal. A plan consists of one to 3 tasks.\nIf plan is created, you should track the progress and update the plan accordingly, such as Plan.finish_current_task, Plan.append_task, Plan.reset_task, Plan.replace_task, etc.\nWhen presented a current task, tackle the task using the available commands.\nPay close attention to new user message, review the conversation history, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to respond to new user requirement.\nNote:\n1. If you keeping encountering errors, unexpected situation, or you are not sure of proceeding, use RoleZero.ask_human to ask for help.\n2. Carefully review your progress at the current task, if your actions so far has not fulfilled the task instruction, you should continue with current task. Otherwise, finish current task by Plan.finish_current_task explicitly.\n3. Each time you finish a task, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to report your progress.\n4. Don\'t forget to append task first when all existing tasks are finished and new tasks are required.\n5. Avoid repeating tasks you have already completed.        }\\n            if (newValues != null && !newValues.isEmpty()) {\\n                newValuesJson = objectMapper.writeValueAsString(newValues);\\n            }\\n        } catch          return objectMapper.readValue(json, Map.class);\\n        } catch (Exception e) {\\n            // Return empty map if parsing fails\\n            return new HashMap<>();\\n        }\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if this audit log contains actual changes.\\n     * \\n     * @return true if oldValues and newValues are different, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    public boolean   "path": "/home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/tourist-account-system/src/main/java/com/etour/dto/ValidationErrorDTO.java",\n            "content": "package com.etour.dto;\\n\\nimport com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonFormat;\\nimport com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude;\\nimport lombok.AllArgsConstructor;\\nimport lombok.Builder;\\nimport lombok.Data;\\nimport lombok.NoArgsConstructor;\\n\\nimport java.time.LocalDateTime;\\nimport java.util.ArrayList;\\nimport java.util.List;\\nimport java.util.Map;\\n\\n/**\\n * Data Transfer Object for validation errors.\\n * Used to provide detailed validation error information in API responses.\\n * Standardizes error response format across the application.\\n */\\n@Data\\n@Builder\\n@NoArgsConstructor\\n@AllArgsConstructor\\n@JsonInclude(JsonInclude.Include.NON_NULL)\\npublic class ValidationErrorDTO {\\n    \\n    /** Timestamp when the error occurred */\\n    @JsonFormat(pattern = \\"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss\\")\\n    private LocalDateTime timestamp;\\n    \\n    /** HTTP status code */\\n    private int status;\\n    \\n    /** Error type/name */\\n    private String error;\\n    \\n    /** Detailed error message */\\n    private String message;\\n    \\n    /** Request path that caused the error */\\n    private String path;\\n    \\n    /** List of field-specific validation errors */\\n    private List<FieldError> fieldErrors;\\n    \\n    /** Global validation errors (not tied to a specific field) */\\n    private List<String> globalErrors;\\n    \\n    /** Additional error details (context-specific) */\\n    private Map<String, Object> details;\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Inner class representing a field-specific validation error.\\n     */\\n    @Data\\n    @Builder\\n    @NoArgsConstructor\\n    @AllArgsConstructor\\n    public static class FieldError {\\n        /** Name of the field with the error */\\n        private String field;\\n        \\n        /** Rejected value (if available) */\\n        private Object rejectedValue;\\n        \\n        /** Error message */\\n        private String message;\\n        \\n        /** Error code/category */\\n        private String code;\\n        \\n        /**\\n         * Creates a formatted string representation of the field error.\\n         * \\n         * @return Formatted error string\\n         */\\n        public String getFormattedError() {\\n            String valueStr = rejectedValue != null ? rejectedValue.toString() : \\"null\\";\\n            return String.format(\\"Field \'%s\': %s (value: %s, code: %s)\\", \\n                    field, message, valueStr, code);\\n        }\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates a ValidationErrorDTO from field errors.\\n     * \\n     * @param fieldErrors List of field-specific errors\\n     * @param path The request path\\n     * @return ValidationErrorDTO instance\\n     */\\n    public static ValidationErrorDTO fromFieldErrors(List<FieldError> fieldErrors, String path) {\\n        return ValidationErrorDTO.builder()\\n                .timestamp(LocalDateTime.now())\\n                .status(400)\\n                .error(\\"Validation Failed\\")\\n                .message(\\"One or more validation errors occurred\\")\\n                .path(path)\\n                .fieldErrors(fieldErrors)\\n                .globalErrors(new ArrayList<>())\\n                .build();\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates a ValidationErrorDTO for a single field error.\\n     * \\n     * @param field The field with error\\n     * @param rejectedValue The rejected value\\n     * @param message Error message\\n     * @param path The request path\\n     * @return ValidationErrorDTO instance\\n     */\\n    public static ValidationErrorDTO createFieldError(String field, Object rejectedValue, \\n                                                      String message, String path) {\\n        FieldError fieldError = FieldError.builder()\\n                .field(field)\\n                .rejectedValue(rejectedValue)\\n                .message(message)\\n                .code(\\"VALIDATION_ERROR\\")\\n                .build();\\n        \\n        List<FieldError> fieldErrors = new ArrayList<>();\\n        fieldErrors.add(fieldError);\\n        \\n        return fromFieldErrors(fieldErrors, path);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates a ValidationErrorDTO for global errors.\\n     * \\n     * @param globalErrors List of global error messages\\n     * @param path The request path\\n     * @return ValidationErrorDTO instance\\n     */\\n    public static ValidationErrorDTO fromGlobalErrors(List<String> globalErrors, String path) {\\n        return ValidationErrorDTO.builder()\\n                .timestamp(LocalDateTime.now())\\n                .status(400)\\n                .error(\\"Validation Failed\\")\\n                .message(\\"One or more validation errors occurred\\")\\n                .path(path)\\n                .fieldErrors(new ArrayList<>())\\n                .globalErrors(globalErrors)\\n                .build();\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Adds a field error to this DTO.\\n     * \\n     * @param fieldError The field error to add\\n     */\\n    public void addFieldError(FieldError fieldError) {\\n        if (fieldErrors == null) {\\n            fieldErrors = new ArrayList<>();\\n        }\\n        fieldErrors.add(fieldError);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Adds a simple field error.\\n     * \\n     * @param field Field name\\n     * @param rejectedValue Rejected value\\n     * @param message Error message\\n     */\\n    public void addFieldError(String field, Object rejectedValue, String message) {\\n        FieldError fieldError = FieldError.builder()\\n                .field(field)\\n                .rejectedValue(rejectedValue)\\n                .message(message)\\n                .code(\\"VALIDATION_ERROR\\")\\n                .build();\\n        addFieldError(fieldError);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Adds a global error message.\\n     * \\n     * @param errorMessage Global error message\\n     */\\n    public void addGlobalError(String errorMessage) {\\n        if (globalErrors == null) {\\n            globalErrors = new ArrayList<>();\\n        }\\n        globalErrors.add(errorMessage);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if there are any validation errors.\\n     * \\n     * @return true if there are errors, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    public boolean hasErrors() {\\n        boolean hasFieldErrors = fieldErrors != null && !fieldErrors.isEmpty();\\n        boolean hasGlobalErrors = globalErrors != null && !globalErrors.isEmpty();\\n        return hasFieldErrors || hasGlobalErrors;\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Gets the total number of validation errors.\\n     * \\n     * @return Total error count\\n     */\\n    public int getErrorCount() {\\n        int fieldErrorCount = fieldErrors != null ? fieldErrors.size() : 0;\\n        int globalErrorCount = globalErrors != null ? globalErrors.size() : 0;\\n        return fieldErrorCount + globalErrorCount;\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates a formatted summary of all validation errors.\\n     * \\n     * @return Summary string\\n     */\\n    public String getErrorSummary() {\\n        StringBuilder summary = new StringBuilder();\\n        summary.append(\\"Validation failed with \\").append(getErrorCount()).append(\\" error(s):\\\\n\\");\\n        \\n        if (fieldErrors != null && !fieldErrors.isEmpty()) {\\n            summary.append(\\"Field errors:\\\\n\\");\\n            for (int i = 0; i < fieldErrors.size(); i++) {\\n                FieldError error = fieldErrors.get(i);\\n                summary.append(String.format(\\"  %d. %s\\\\n\\", i + 1, error.getFormattedError()));\\n            }\\n        }\\n        \\n        if (globalErrors != null && !globalErrors.isEmpty()) {\\n            summary.append(\\"Global errors:\\\\n\\");\\n            for (int i = 0; i < globalErrors.size(); i++) {\\n                String error = globalErrors.get(i);\\n                summary.append(String.format(\\"  %d. %s\\\\n\\", i + 1, error));\\n            }\\n        }\\n        \\n        return summary.toString();\\n    }\\n within the date range\\n     */\\n    List<AuditLog> findByPerformedAtBetween(LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Finds audit logs by IP address.\\n     * \\n     * @param ipAddress IP address\\n     * @return List of audit logs from the specified IP address\\n     */\\n    List<AuditLog> findByIpAddress(String ipAddress);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Complex query to find audit logs with multiple criteria.\\n     * All parameters are optional - null parameters are ignored in the query.\\n     * \\n     * @param action Action type\\n     * @param entityType Entity type\\n     * @param entityId Entity ID\\n     * @param performedBy Performed by\\n     * @param successful Success status\\n     * @param startDate Start date\\n     * @param endDate End date\\n     * @return List of matching audit logs\\n     */\\n    @Query(\\"SELECT a FROM AuditLog a WHERE \\" +\\n           \\"(:action IS NULL OR a.action = :action) AND \\" +\\n           \\"(:entityType IS NULL OR a.entityType = :entityType) AND \\" +\\n           \\"(:entityId IS NULL OR a.entityId = :entityId) AND \\" +\\n           \\"(:performedBy IS NULL OR a.performedBy = audit logs by entity type.\\n     * \\n     * @param entityType Entity type\\n     * @return Number of audit logs for the specified entity type\\n     */\\n    long countByEntityType(String entityType);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Counts audit logs by success status.\\n     * \\n     * @param successful Success status\\n     * @return Number of audit logs with the specified success status\\n     */\\n    long countBySuccessful(Boolean successful);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Counts audit logs by performed by user.\\n     * \\n     * @param performedBy Performed by user\\n     * @return Number of audit logs performed by the specified user\\n     */\\n    long countByPerformedBy(String performedBy);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Finds the most recent audit logs for a specific entity.\\n     * \\n     * @param entityType Entity type\\n     * @param entityId Entity ID\\n     * @param limit Maximum number of logs to return\\n     * @return List of recent audit logs for the entity\\n     */\\n    @Query(\\"SELECT a FROM AuditLog a WHERE a.entityType = :entityType AND a.entityId = :entityId \\" +\\n           \\"ORDER BY a.performedAt DESC LIMIT :limit\\")\\n    List<AuditLog> findRecentByEntity(\\n            @Param(\\"entityType\\") String entityType,\\n            @Param(\\"entityId\\") Long entityId,\\n            @Param(\\"limit\\") int limit);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Finds failed audit logs (unsuccessful operations).\\n     * \\n     * @param limit Maximum number of logs to return\\n     * @return List of recent failed audit logs\\n     */\\n    @Query(\\"SELECT a FROM AuditLog a WHERE a.successful = false \\" +\\n           \\"ORDER BY a.performedAt DESC LIMIT :limit\\")\\n    List<AuditLog> findRecentFailures(@Param(\\"limit\\") int limit);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Finds audit logs for tourist modifications.\\n     * Specifically looks for UPDATE_TOURIST actions.\\n     * \\n     * @param touristId Tourist ID\\n     * @param limit Maximum number of logs to return\\n     * @return List of modification audit logs for the tourist\\n     */\\n    default List<AuditLog> findTouristModifications(Long touristId, int limit) {\\n        return findRecentByEntity(\\"Tourist\\", touristId, limit)\\n                .stream()\\n                .filter(log -> \\"UPDATE_TOURIST\\".equals(log.getAction()))\\n                .toList();\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if an entity has been modified within a time period.\\n     * \\n     * @param entityType Entity type\\n     * @param entityId Entity ID\\n     * @param sinceDate Check modifications since this date\\n     * @return true if the entity has been modified since the date, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    @Query(\\"SELECT COUNT(a) > 0 FROM AuditLog a WHERE \\" +\\n           \\"a.entityType = :entityType AND a.entityId = :entityId AND \\" +\\n           \\"a.action LIKE \'%UPDATE%\' AND a.performedAt >= :sinceDate\\")\\n    boolean hasBeenModifiedSince(\\n            @Param(\\"entityType\\") String entityType,\\n            @Param(\\"entityId\\") Long entityId,\\n            @Param(\\"sinceDate\\") LocalDateTime sinceDate);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Deletes old audit logs before a specific date.\\n     * Used for audit log rotation and cleanup.\\n     * \\n     * @param cutoffDate Delete logs before this date\\n     * @return Number of logs deleted\\n     */\\n    @Query(\\"DELETE FROM AuditLog a WHERE a.performedAt < :cutoffDate\\")\\n    int deleteOldLogs(@Param(\\"cutoffDate\\") LocalDateTime cutoffDate);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Gets audit log statistics by date range.\\n     * Returns counts grouped by action type.\\n     * \\n     * @param startDate Start date\\n     * @param endDate End date\\n     * @return List of Object arrays where [0] = action, [1] = count\\n     */\\n    @Query(\\"SELECT a.action, COUNT(a) FROM AuditLog a WHERE \\" +\\n           \\"a.performedAt BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate \\" Operator who can manage tourist accounts.\\n * Maps to the \'agency_operators\' table in the database.\\n * Includes authentication and authorization functionality.\\n */\\n@Entity\\n@Table(name = \\"agency_operators\\")\\n@Data\\n@Builder\\n@NoArgsConstructor\\n@AllArgsConstructor\\npublic class AgencyOperator {\\n    \\n    @Id\\n    @GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.IDENTITY)\\n \\"first_name\\", length = 100)\\n    private String firstName;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"last_name\\", length = 100)\\n    private String lastName;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"role\\", nullable = false, length = 50)\\n    private String role;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"is_active\\")\\n    private Boolean active;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"last_login\\")\\n    private LocalDateTime lastLogin;\\n    \\n    @CreationTimestamp\\n    @Column(name = \\"created_at\\", updatable = false)\\n    private LocalDateTime createdAt;\\n    \\n    @UpdateTimestamp\\n    @Column(name = \\"updated_at\\")\\n    private LocalDateTime updatedAt;\\n    \\n    @ElementCollection\\n    @CollectionTable(name = \\"operator_permissions\\", joinColumns = @JoinColumn(name = \\"operator_id\\"))\\n    @Column(name = \\"permission\\")\\n    @Builder.Default\\n    private Set<String> permissions = new HashSet<>();\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Authenticates the operator by checking the provided password.\\n     * Uses BCrypt for secure password hashing and comparison.\\n     * \\n     * @param password The plain text password to check\\n     * @return true if authentication succeeds, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    public boolean authenticate(String password) {\\n        if (password == null || password.isEmpty()) {\\n            return false;\\n        }\\n        PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder = new BCryptPasswordEncoder();\\n        return passwordEncoder.matches(password, this.passwordHash);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Sets the password with secure hashing.\\n     * \\n     * @param password The plain text password to hash and set\\n     */\\n    public void setPassword(String password) {\\n        if (password == null || password.isEmpty()) {\\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException(\\"Password cannot be null or empty\\");\\n        }\\n        PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder = new BCryptPasswordEncoder();\\n        this.passwordHash = passwordEncoder.encode(password);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if the operator has a specific permission.\\n     * \\n     * @param permission The permission to check (e.g., \\"TOURIST_MODIFY\\", \\"TOURIST_VIEW\\")\\n     * @return true if the operator has the permission, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    public boolean hasPermission(String permission) {\\n        if (permission == null || permission.trim().isEmpty()) {\\n            return false;\\n        }\\n        // Check specific permissions first\\n        if (permissions.contains(permission)) {\\n            return true;\\n        }\\n        // Check role-based permissions\\n        return hasRolePermission(permission);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks role-based permissions.\\n     * ADMIN role has all permissions.\\n     * \\n     * @param permission The permission to check\\n     * @return true if the role grants the permission\\n     */\\n    private boolean hasRolePermission(String permission) {\\n        if (\\"ADMIN\\".equals(role)) {\\n            return true; // Admin has all permissions\\n        }\\n        // Define role-based permission mappings\\n        if (\\"AGENCY_MANAGER\\".equals(role)) {\\n            return permission.startsWith(\\"TOURIST_\\");\\n        }\\n        if (\\"AGENCY_OPERATOR\\".equals(role)) {\\n            return \\"TOURIST_MODIFY\\".equals(permission) || \\n                   \\"TOURIST_VIEW\\".equals(permission);\\n        }\\n        return false;\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Updates the last login timestamp.\\n     */\\n    public void updateLastLogin() {\\n        this.lastLogin = LocalDateTime.now();\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Returns the full name of the operator.\\n     * \\n     * @return Full name as \\"firstName lastName\\" or username if names are not set\\n     */\\n    public String getFullName() {\\n        if (firstName != null && lastName != null) {\\n            return firstName + \\" \\" + lastName;\\n        } else if (firstName != null) {\\n            return firstName;\\n        } else if (lastName != null) {\\n            return lastName;\\n        }\\n        return username;\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Validates the operator entity.\\n     * \\n     * @return true if valid, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    public boolean validate() {\\n jakarta.persistence.*;\\nimport lombok.AllArgsConstructor;\\nimport lombok.Builder;\\nimport lombok.Data;\\nimport lombok.NoArgsConstructor;\\nimport java.util.Map;\\n\\n/**\\n * Entity representing audit logs for tracking modifications to tourist accounts.\\n * Maps to the \'audit_logs\' table in the database.\\n * Stores detailed information about who changed what, when, and from where.\\n */\\n@Entity\\n@Table(name = \\"audit_logs\\")\\n@Data\\n@Builder\\n@NoArgsConstructor\\n@AllArgsConstructor\\npublic class AuditLog {\\n    \\n    @Id\\n    @GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.IDENTITY)\\n    private Long id;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"action\\", nullable = false, length = 50)\\n    private String action;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"entity_type\\", nullable = false, length = 100)\\n    private String entityType;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"entity_id\\")\\n    private Long entityId;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"performed_by\\", length = 100)\\n    private String performedBy;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"performed_at\\", nullable = false)\\n    private LocalDateTime performedAt;\\n    \\n    @Lob\\n    @Column(name = \\"old_values\\", columnDefinition = \\"TEXT\\")\\n    private String oldValues;\\n    \\n    @Lob\\n    @Column(name = \\"new_values\\", columnDefinition = \\"TEXT\\")\\n    private String newValues;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"ip_address\\", length = 45) // IPv6 max length\\n    private String ipAddress;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"user_agent\\", length = 500)\\n    private String userAgent;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"successful\\")\\n    private Boolean successful;\\n    \\n    @Column(name = \\"error_message\\", length = 1000)\\n    private String errorMessage;\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates an audit log entry for a tourist modification action.\\n     * \\n     * @param action The action performed (e.g., \\"UPDATE_TOURIST\\", \\"CREATE_TOURIST\\")\\n     * @param entityType The type of entity (e.g., \\"Tourist\\")\\n     * @param entityId The ID of the entity being modified\\n     * @param performedBy The username or identifier of who performed the action\\n     * @param oldValues Map of old values before modification\\n     * @param newValues Map of new values after modification\\n     * @param ipAddress IP address of the request\\n     * @param userAgent User agent string from the request\\n     * @return A new AuditLog instance\\n     */\\n    public static AuditLog logAction(String action, String entityType, Long entityId, \\n                                     String performedBy, Map<String, Object> oldValues, \\n                                     Map<String, Object> newValues, String ipAddress, \\n                                     String userAgent) {\\n        ObjectMapper objectMapper = new ObjectMapper();\\n        String oldValuesJson = \\"{}\\";\\n        String newValuesJson = \\"{}\\";\\n        \\n        try {\\n            if (oldValues != null && !oldValues.isEmpty()) {\\n                oldValuesJson = objectMapper.writeValueAsString(oldValues);\\n            }\\n            if (newValues != null && !newValues.isEmpty()) {\\n                newValuesJson = objectMapper.writeValueAsString(newValues);\\n            }\\n        } catch (JsonProcessingException e) {\\n            // Fallback to simple string representation if JSON serialization fails\\n            oldValuesJson = oldValues != null ? oldValues.toString() : \\"{}\\";\\n            newValuesJson = newValues != null ? newValues.toString() : \\"{}\\";\\n        }\\n        \\n        return AuditLog.builder()\\n                .action(action)\\n                .entityType(entityType)\\n                .entityId(entityId)\\n                .performedBy(performedBy)\\n                .performedAt(LocalDateTime.now())\\n                .oldValues(oldValuesJson)\\n                .newValues(newValuesJson)\\n                .ipAddress(ipAddress)\\n                .userAgent(userAgent)\\n                .successful(true)\\n                .build();\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates an audit log for a failed action.\\n     * \\n     * @param action The action that failed\\n     * @param entityType The type of entity\\n     * @param entityId The ID of the entity\\n     * @param performedBy Who attempted the action\\n     * @param errorMessage Error message describing the failure\\n     * @param ipAddress IP address of the request\\n     * @param userAgent User agent string\\n     * @return A new AuditLog instance marked as unsuccessful\\n     */\\n    public static AuditLog logFailure(String action, String entityType, Long entityId, \\n                                      String performedBy, String errorMessage, \\n                                      String ipAddress, String userAgent) {\\n        return AuditLog.builder()\\n                .action(action)\\n                .entityType(entityType)\\n                .entityId(entityId)\\n                .performedBy(performedBy)\\n                .performedAt(LocalDateTime.now())\\n                .ipAddress(ipAddress)\\n                .userAgent(userAgent)\\n                .successful(false)\\n                .errorMessage(errorMessage)\\n                .build();\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Generates a human-readable summary of the changes.\\n     * \\n     * @return Summary string describing what changed\\n     */\\n    public String getChangeSummary() {\\n        StringBuilder summary = new StringBuilder();\\n        summary.append(\\"Action: \\").append(action)\\n               .append(\\" on \\").append(entityType);\\n                \\n        if (entityId != null) {\\n            summary.append(\\" ID: \\").append(entityId);\\n        }\\n        \\n        summary.append(\\" by \\").append(performedBy != null ? performedBy : \\"Unknown\\")\\n               .append(\\" at \\").append(performedAt);\\n        \\n        if (successful != null && !successful) {\\n            summary.append(\\" (FAILED: \\").append(errorMessage).append(\\")\\");\\n        } else {\\n            summary.append(\\" (SUCCESS)\\");\\n        }\\n        \\n        return summary.toString();\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Parses old values from JSON string to Map.\\n     * \\n     * @return Map of old values, or empty map if parsing fails\\n     */\\n    public Map<String, Object> getOldValuesMap() {\\n        return parseJsonToMap(oldValues);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Parses new values from JSON string to Map.\\n     * \\n     * @return Map of new values, or empty map if parsing fails\\n     */\\n    public Map<String, Object> getNewValuesMap() {\\n        return parseJsonToMap(newValues);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Helper method to parse JSON string to Map.\\n     * \\n     * @param json JSON string to parse\\n     * @return Map representation of JSON, or empty map on failure\\n     */\\n    private Map<String, Object> parseJsonToMap(String json) {\\n        if (json == null || json.trim().isEmpty() || \\"{}\\".equals(json.trim())) {\\n            return new HashMap<>();\\n        }\\n        \\n        try {\\n            ObjectMapper objectMapper = new ObjectMapper();\\n            return objectMapper.readValue(json, Map.class);\\n        } catch (Exception e) {\\n            // Return empty map if parsing fails\\n            return new HashMap<>();\\n        }\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if this audit log contains actual changes.\\n     * \\n     * @return true if oldValues and newValues are different, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    public boolean hasChanges() {\\n        if (oldValues == null && newValues == null) {\\n            return false;\\n        }\\n        if (oldValues == null || newValues == null) {\\n            return true; // One is null, other is not\\n        }\\n        return !oldValues.equals(newValues);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Pre-persist hook to set default values.\\n     */\\n    @PrePersist\\n    public void prePersist() {\\n        if (performedAt == null) {\\n            performedAt = LocalDateTime.now();\\n        }\\n        if (successful == null) {\\n            successful = true;\\n        }\\n    }\\n}"\n        }\n    },\n    {\n        "command_name": "Plan.finish_current_task",\n        "args": {}\n    }\n]\n```'}, {'role': 'user', 'content': 'Command Editor.write executed.'}, {'role': com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonFormat;\\nimport com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude;\\nimport lombok.AllArgsConstructor;\\nimport lombok.Builder;\\nimport lombok.Data;\\nimport lombok.NoArgsConstructor;\\n\\nimport java.time.LocalDateTime;\\n\\n/**\\n * Standard API response wrapper for tourist-related operations.\\n * Includes status, message, timestamp, and optional data payload.\\n * Used for all tourist API responses for consistency.\\n */\\n@Data\\n@Builder\\n@NoArgsConstructor\\n@AllArgsConstructor\\n@JsonInclude(JsonInclude.Include.NON_NULL)\\npublic class TouristResponse {\\n    \\n    /** Response status (success, error, warning) */\\n    private String status;\\n    \\n    /** Response message for the user */\\n    private String message;\\n    \\n    /** HTTP status code */\\n    private int httpStatus;\\n    \\n    /** Timestamp of the response */\\n    @JsonFormat(pattern = \\"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss\\")\\n    private LocalDateTime timestamp;\\n    \\n    /** The actual data payload (e.g., TouristDTO) */\\n    private Object data;\\n    \\n    /** Error details if status is error */\\n    private Object errorDetails;\\n    \\n    /** Request ID       .status(\\"success\\")\\n                .message(message)\\n                .httpStatus(200)\\n                .timestamp(LocalDateTime.now())\\n                .data(data)\\n                .build();\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates a successful response for tourist update.\\n     * \\n     * @param touristDTO Updated tourist data\\n     * @return TouristResponse with update */\\n    public static TouristResponse retrievalSuccess(TouristDTO touristDTO) {\\n        return success(\\"Tourist account retrieved successfully\\", touristDTO);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates an error response.\\n     * \\n     * @param message Error message\\n     * @param httpStatus HTTP status code\\n     * @param errorDetails Detailed error information\\n     * @return TouristResponse with error status\\n     */\\n    public static TouristResponse error(String message, int httpStatus, Object errorDetails) {\\n        return TouristResponse.builder()\\n                .status(\\"error\\")\\n                .message(message)\\n                .httpStatus(httpStatus)\\n                .timestamp(LocalDateTime.now())\\n                .errorDetails(errorDetails)\\n                .build();\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates a validation error response.\\n     * \\n     * @param validationErrors Validation error details\\n     * @return TouristResponse with validation error status\\n     */\\n    public static TouristResponse validationError(Object validationErrors) {\\n        return error(\\"Validation failed\\", 400, validationErrors);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates a not found error response.\\n     * \\n     * @param message Specific not found message\\n     * @return TouristResponse with 404 status\\n     */\\n    public static TouristResponse notFound(String message) {\\n        return error(message, 404, null);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates a server error response.\\n     * \\n     * @param message Server error message\\n     * @return TouristResponse with 500 status\\n     */\\n    public static TouristResponse serverError(String message) {\\n        return error(message, 500, null);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates a confirmation required response.\\n     * Used when user confirmation is needed before proceeding.\\n     * \\n     * @param message Confirmation message\\n     * @param confirmationData Data to confirm\\n     * @return TouristResponse with confirmation status\\n     */\\n    public static TouristResponse confirmationRequired(String message, Object confirmationData) {\\n        return TouristResponse.builder()\\n                .status(\\"confirmation_required\\")\\n                .message(message)\\n                .httpStatus(200)\\n                .timestamp(LocalDateTime.now())\\n                .data(confirmationData)\\n                .build();\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if the response indicates success.\\n     * \\n     * @return true if status is \\"success\\", false otherwise\\n     */\\n    public boolean isSuccess() {\\n        return \\"success\\".equals(status);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if the response requires confirmation.\\n     * \\n     * @return true if status is \\"confirmation_required\\", false otherwise\\n     */\\n    public boolean requiresConfirmation() {\\n        return \\"confirmation_required\\".equals(status);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Gets a summary string for logging.\\n     * \\n     * @return Summary string\\n     */\\n    public String getSummary() {\\n        return String.format(\\"TouristResponse[status=%s, httpStatus=%d, message=%s]\\", \\n                status, httpStatus, message);\\n    }\\n}"\n        }\n    },\n    {\n errors.\\n * Used to provide detailed validation error information in API responses.\\n * Standardizes error response format across the application.\\n */\\n@Data\\n@Builder\\n@NoArgsConstructor\\n@AllArgsConstructor\\n@JsonInclude(JsonInclude.Include.NON_NULL)\\npublic class ValidationErrorDTO {\\n    \\n    /** Timestamp when the error occurred */\\n    @JsonFormat(pattern = \\"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss\\")\\n    private LocalDateTime timestamp;\\n    \\n    /** HTTP status code */\\n    private int status;\\n    \\n    /** Error type/name */\\n    private String error;\\n    \\n    /** Detailed error message */\\n    private String message;\\n    \\n    /** Request path that caused the error */\\n    private String path;\\n    \\n    /** List of field-specific validation errors */\\n    private List<FieldError> fieldErrors;\\n    \\n    /** Global validation errors (not tied to a specific field) */\\n    private List<String> globalErrors;\\n    \\n    /** Additional error details (context-specific) */\\n    private Map<String, Object> details;\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Inner class representing a field-specific validation error.\\n     */\\n    @Data\\n    @Builder\\n    @NoArgsConstructor\\n    @AllArgsConstructor\\n    public static class FieldError {\\n        /** Name of the field with the error */\\n        private String field;\\n        \\n        /** Rejected value (if available) */\\n        private Object rejectedValue;\\n        \\n        /** Error message */\\n        private String message;\\n        \\n        /** Error code/category */\\n        private String code;\\n        \\n        /**\\n         * Creates a formatted string representation of the field error.\\n         * \\n         * @return Formatted error string\\n         */\\n        public String getFormattedError() {\\n            String valueStr = rejectedValue != null ? rejectedValue.toString() : \\"null\\";\\n            return String.format(\\"Field \'%s\': %s (value: %s, code: %s)\\", \\n                    field, message, valueStr, code);\\n        }\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates a ValidationErrorDTO from field errors.\\n     * \\n     * @param fieldErrors List of field-specific errors\\n     * @param path The request path\\n     * @return ValidationErrorDTO instance\\n     */\\n    public static ValidationErrorDTO fromFieldErrors(List<FieldError> fieldErrors, String path) {\\n        return ValidationErrorDTO.builder()\\n                .timestamp(LocalDateTime.now())\\n                .status(400)\\n                .error(\\"Validation Failed\\")\\n                .message(\\"One or more validation errors occurred\\")\\n                .path(path)\\n                .fieldErrors(fieldErrors)\\n                .globalErrors(new ArrayList<>())\\n                .build();\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates a ValidationErrorDTO for a single field error.\\n     * \\n     * @param field The field with error\\n     * @param rejectedValue The rejected value\\n     * @param message Error message\\n     * @param path The request path\\n     * @return ValidationErrorDTO instance\\n     */\\n    public static ValidationErrorDTO createFieldError(String field, Object rejectedValue, \\n                                                      String message, String path) {\\n        FieldError fieldError = FieldError.builder()\\n                .field(field)\\n                .rejectedValue(rejectedValue)\\n                .message(message)\\n                .code(\\"VALIDATION_ERROR\\")\\n                .build();\\n        \\n        List<FieldError> fieldErrors = new ArrayList<>();\\n        fieldErrors.add(fieldError);\\n        \\n        return fromFieldErrors(fieldErrors, path);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates a ValidationErrorDTO for global errors.\\n     * \\n     * @param globalErrors List of global error messages\\n     * @param path The request path\\n     * @return ValidationErrorDTO instance\\n     */\\n    public static ValidationErrorDTO fromGlobalErrors(List<String> globalErrors, String path) {\\n        return ValidationErrorDTO.builder()\\n                .timestamp(LocalDateTime.now())\\n                .status(400)\\n                .error(\\"Validation Failed\\")\\n                .message(\\"One or more validation errors occurred\\")\\n                .path(path)\\n                .fieldErrors(new ArrayList<>())\\n                .globalErrors(globalErrors)\\n                .build();\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Adds a field error to this DTO.\\n     * \\n     * @param fieldError The field error to add\\n     */\\n    public void addFieldError(FieldError fieldError) {\\n        if (fieldErrors == null) {\\n            fieldErrors = new ArrayList<>();\\n        }\\n        fieldErrors.add(fieldError);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Adds a simple field error.\\n     * \\n     * @param field Field name\\n     * @param rejectedValue Rejected value\\n     * @param message Error message\\n     */\\n    public void addFieldError(String field, Object rejectedValue, String message) {\\n        FieldError fieldError = FieldError.builder()\\n                .field(field)\\n                .rejectedValue(rejectedValue)\\n                .message(message)\\n                .code(\\"VALIDATION_ERROR\\")\\n                .build();\\n        addFieldError(fieldError);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Adds a global error message.\\n     * \\n     * @param errorMessage Global error message\\n     */\\n    public void addGlobalError(String errorMessage) {\\n        if (globalErrors == null) {\\n            globalErrors = new ArrayList<>();\\n        }\\n        globalErrors.add(errorMessage);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Checks if there are any validation errors.\\n     * \\n     * @return true if there are errors, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    public boolean hasErrors() {\\n        boolean hasFieldErrors = fieldErrors != null && !fieldErrors.isEmpty();\\n        boolean hasGlobalErrors = globalErrors != null && !globalErrors.isEmpty();\\n        return hasFieldErrors || hasGlobalErrors;\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Gets the total number of validation errors.\\n     * \\n     * @return Total error count\\n     */\\n    public int getErrorCount() {\\n        int fieldErrorCount = fieldErrors != null ? fieldErrors.size() : 0;\\n        int globalErrorCount = globalErrors != null ? globalErrors.size() : 0;\\n        return fieldErrorCount + globalErrorCount;\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Creates a formatted summary of all validation errors.\\n     * \\n     * @return Summary string\\n     */\\n    public String authenticate\\n     * @return Optional containing AgencyOperator if found (password verification needed separately)\\n     */\\n    default Optional<AgencyOperator> authenticate(String username) {\\n        return findByUsername(username);\\n    }\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Finds agency operators with a specific permission.\\n     * This checks both direct permissions and role-based permissions.\\n     * \\n     * @param permission Permission to check (e.g., \\"TOURIST_MODIFY\\", \\"TOURIST_VIEW\\")\\n     * @return List of agency operators with the specified permission\\n     */\\n \'AGENCY_MANAGER\' AND :permission LIKE \'TOURIST_%\') OR \\" +\\n           \\"(a.role = \'AGENCY_OPERATOR\' AND (:permission = \'TOURIST_MODIFY\' OR :permission = \'TOURIST_VIEW\'))\\")\\n    List<AgencyOperator> findByPermission(@Param(\\"permission\\") String permission);\\n    \\n    /**\\n     * Finds agency operators created within a date range.\\n     * \\n     * @param startDate Replace lines from start_line to end_line (inclusive) with the new_content in the open file. All of the new_content will be entered, so makesure your indentation is formatted properly. The new_content must be a complete block of code. Example 1: Given a file \\"/workspace/example.txt\\" with the following content: ``` 001|contain f 002|contain g 003|contain h 004|contain i ``` EDITING: If you want to replace line 2 and line 3 edit_file_by_replace( \\"/workspace/example.txt\\", first_replaced_line_number=2, first_replaced_line_content=\\"contain g\\", last_replaced_line_number=3, last_replaced_line_content=\\"contain h\\", new_content=\\"new content\\", ) This will replace the second line 2 and line 3 with \\"new content\\".
